title: Ayla Nereo sunrise set ~ Abraxas @ THE BALL
description:
FRI morning at 7 AM ~ Ayla will sing in the heart to greet the dawning sun, on the back of the dragon. (At The BALL in deep playa.)   

With an array of loop-pedals by her side, she builds layer upon layer of vocal melodies into fierce, sweeping harmonies and weaves syncopated threads of guitar, kalimba, piano, and percussion into each live performance.  

Her lucid storytelling and lyrical imagery are water for the thirsty soul; words and sounds that crack open the heart, and embody the many folds of our own selves. 
Crafting an immersive soundscape we can dive into, Ayla’s performance becomes a journey: an inspired, wondrous experience that holds you by the heart and doesn’t let go. 
   
|| www.aylanereo.com || www.facebook.com/ayla.nereo.music || wwwsoundcloud.com/ayla-nereo
print_description: FRI morning at 7 AM ~ Ayla will sing in the heart to greet the dawning sun, on the back of the dragon. At THE BALL in deep playa.

title: Body Gallery
description: Begin with grounding and group exercises. Talk about body image and shaming. How do we experience this in the default world. How or is this different at burning man. Explaining that even compliments in this workshop must be consensual. Leading into 3-6 pods (based on numbers). Within the pods we take turns undressing each person.  This is like the Museum of Burningman Bodies. Within each pod we each have 2-3 minutes to tell our museum visitors about our body. Depending on group vibe and any time left, viewers may ask questions of the exhibit, or  request something they would like to be uplifted upon. The next person presents. This workshop will be tested this coming week at a regional burn. I‚Äôve started something without structure before at a workshop intensive of 18 people. Great experience. **90-120 min window ** will test out this weekend
print_description: Bare your body in a safe pace as we navigate feelings around body image and body shaming. Participation: comfort around nudity.

title: Tighty- Whitey Take-Out
description:
While carnival boardwalks and midways are perfumed with the smell of Coney dogs, and funnel cakes, and dotted with souvenir shops, we transform the people into the attractions for others to enjoy.  There is a juxtaposition of who receives the excitement and who gives the excitement with an ample supply of tighty-whitey under pants in various styles.  The inner artists can express their creativity and dusty taints through colored markers then don the one-of-a-kind art. Snap a picture (instant camera on site) for our “Taint Wall of Freaks” then take your art on a traveling show - the living canvas of “the self”.
Monday/Tuesday – Foreplay! To get one excited and invigorated.  “Manifest it Monday”, “Free for all Tuesday”. You call it; it’s yours, especially our bartenders.  Monday and Tuesday are the days we establish our regulars!  We play “The Game” until we just can’t stand it anymore (In a good way of course).  It’s all about introducing ourselves to our neighbors and making friends for the week, friends for a lifetime.
print_description: Watch as people become mobile art, visual masterpieces! Using underwear as a canvas, manifest your creativity with colored markers. Wear away!

title: 10 Principles Confessional
description:
You've only been at Black Rock City for a few days now and you've already violated several if not all of the 10 Principles.  Did you fail to chase down that moop headed to the trash fence?  Maybe you're all inclusive except for shirtcockers?  You probably can't name more than 3 of the 10 Principles.  If so, The Disciples of the Dust will be operating a confessional for those who have violated  the 10 Principles.  Confess your transgressions, accept your penance and receive absolution.  You can trust the Disciples...... we're trained professionals!    
We believe Larry will stop by and give us his blessing.  Have your picture taken with Larry or our facsimile of Larry descending the mount with the 10 Principles Tablet.
print_description: Failed to pick up some moop, not inclusive when it comes to shirtcockers,  then visit the 10 Principles Confessional for absolution.  Larry may visit.

title: 10th Anniversary Soul Brunch and Power Showers
description:
Soul food got its name in the 1960's from the commensality - or practice of eating together - of generations of Southerners who headed far from their family origins during the Great Migration. It reminded them of home.

Soul Brunch isn't just a party; it's like the backyard barbecues of home. It's like the cookouts of yesteryear. As your families invited your communities over, as the generations of soul families invited their communities over, so too does the Heroes & Super Villains family invite the Playa community over to eat together, drink together, get to know one another, dance with each other and uplift each other.

From morning until nightfall, our trained chefs serve up the freshest breakfast burritos on the Playa, accompanied by professionally made craft cocktails. Our collection of international DJs spin smooth beats until nightfall.

We also give revelers a chance to clean up with our Soul Power Showers; guests experience the rebirth and rejuvenation of cool, cleansing water sprayed forcefully from our pressurized washer system (imagine a water saving car wash inside our shower areas for guests). Baptized anew, heroes set out on their way spreading positive vibes.

DJ Lineup:
-Marques Wyatt
-Nicodemus
-Deep Woods
-Sabo
-Rafael de la Cruz
print_description: Breakfast burritos, craft cocktails, bumping bass, and power showers. A neighborhood block party from our family to yours.

title: 13th Annual Welcome the Sun Sunrise Cocktail Part
description:
Group W at Math Camp is hosting our 13th Annual Welcome the Sun
Sunrise Cocktail Party starting around 6:20 AM at Burning Man.

The bar will be excellent:  AWESOME Bloody Marys, Tequila Marys, maybe COFFEE (regular or Irish), Mimosas, bourbon, Scotch, water, Math Themed Drinks and who knows what else.

So whether you want a night-cap as you strut home in triumph or you need eye-open to start the day right, come on over!  Last year the final drinks were poured around midnight, so even if you sleep late Group W is
there waiting you.

Stop by any time for crunchy snacks or graham crackers!

alcoholic beverages.

title: 2015 Rock Star for a Day Celebration
description:
Nominees were accepted. Candidates were discussed. A Rock Star was chosen.
The 2015 Rock Star for a Day is Dani “Rat Lady” Moore!

Dani Moore has been the ring leader and endless spokesperson for Mobility Camp. Dani has helped spread word and expand knowledge about Mobility Camp’s goals and mission to build awareness and improved alternative abled access at Burning Man.

Dani is an incredible, living example of Burning Man’s radical inclusion principle. She is an inspiration and crates a lasting impact on our culture, maternally calling for inclusive accessibility and consciousness by us all.

Help us celebrate by participating in her Rock Star day with her! 

You can't make the event? 

* Search your local craigslist for Dani's Wish List items and drop them by Mobility Camp at Center Camp:

-- A gas powered golf cart with hand controls: to borrow for Burn or to own
-- Knee Scooters
-- Wheelchairs *with foot rests* all sizes, in particular XL/Bariatric
-- Crutches of all sizes; most needed size 4’6”-5’2” & 5’1”-5’9”
-- Walkers of all sizes
-- Handcycles to borrow for Burn
-- Photographer to capture Mobility Camp activities 

Dani will receive playa rock star treatment Thursday afternoon, including transportation and soulful beats via her "limo" the Charlie the Unicorn art car (Yay, thank you Unicorn Crew!) Come join in on the fun anytime! 

Radically Inclusive! Join Us! Everyone's welcome to hug the rock star, jump into the limo and participate! 

12:00pm Arrive at Mobility Camp, Center Camp 
Inner ring/6:00
Present Dani Moore with her Rock Star status.
1:00pm All participate in the accessibility obstacle course
1:45pm Transport Dani and anyone else to Kostume Kult
for rock star outfitting 6:45 & Esplanade
2:45pm Limo departs for an out on open playa adventure 
to be announced
3:00pm Special thank you surprise.
3:45pm Rock Star Charlie the Unicorn limo returns Dani 
and everyone else to Mobility Camp!
print_description:
Nominees were accepted. Candidates were discussed. A Rock Star was chosen.
The 2015 Rock Star for a Day is Dani “Rat Lady” Moore!
other_location: Beginning at Mobility Camp @ 7:30 & Center Camp Plaza & on Charlie the Unicorn

title: 20 min Clairvoyant Readings/Healings

These blocks and patterns can have roots in past lives or may be influenced from the energy of other people. title: 5Rhythms for Freedom
description: Ever feel uncomfortable in your own skin, like you just need to break free? Or stuck in the same, endless mental loop? You're not alone. But all it takes to end this vicious pattern is one step, consciously taken, then another, and another - and before you know it, you're dancing! Old or young, novice or expert, afraid or unworried, join us in sluffing off some unnecessary layers one simple step at a time. You will dance your way to a new sense of self.  With Mackenzie Amara

title: 7 Sins Lounge proudly serving Flaming Blue Phucks!
description: You are cordially invited to attend the annual Flaming Blue Phuck Thursday at 7 Sins Lounge.  Guests are welcomed to the friendliest little lounge on the playa by one of our host sinners and guided through the crowds to one of our welcoming bartenders.  These chemists will be hand crafting the legendary Flaming Blue Phuck for each of our guests with sinful care and great precision.  These time travel potions are sure to warm you to the core and settle your mind and soul into a sinfully blissful state.  Settle in for an hour or the night among friends.  Take a spin on the Wheel of Sins and receive absolution from our skilled staff from all your misdeeds.  Many have said that the year is not complete on playa until they've had their annual does of this flaming blue potion.  If you've yet to try yours, come pop your Blue Phuck cherry with us this year.
print_description: The infamous flaming drink returns for 1 night! Spin the Wheel of Sins for absolution and then take the sting out with our patented flaming libation!

Also check out our Flaming Basketball Hoop. It will be another amazing year!

title: A Capella Chorus Jam
description: Like to sing? Come to our vocal jam. A few years ago, we had a blast when a spontaneous chorus broke out in our camp, covering classic harmony-rich songs like Billy Joel's "For the Longest Time," and a tradition was born. We will gather and sing popular, well-known, or timeless songs in harmony (e.g., folk, pop, rock, opera, blues, barbershop, and on and on), without accompaniment (a capella). Song title lists provided to spark your vocal chords. All are welcome - no training needed.

title: Activate Your Super Hero - Jennifer Partridge
description: Jennifer takes you on a journey in to the mystical realms of your super hero identity! Move, open and shine from your heart, as you are guided back into your ancient memory of why you chose to be here on Earth during this time. With a delightful recipe of music, primal movement, guided imagery, memory recall and visioning, your super hero will soon be awake in the dream and transforming your life.
print_description: Journey in to the mystical realms with music, movement, guided imagery and visioning. Your super hero will awake transforming your life.

title: Activating Your Creative Feminine Magic
description:
This workshop is about working with the magical, creative energy of Burning Man to create a plan-of-action to bring your unique offering to the world.  When you are holding onto your creative expression, your gifts, your particular genius, or pretending not to know what it is, it's gets very uncomfortable after a while. It will start itching inside of you to be created in physical form, it's deepest desire is to be born out of the dream space. You came to Planet Earth to share this, now is your time. Calling all healers, conversation-starters, rebels, light-workers, and medicine women. This workshop is broken down into four magical sections. 

1) Connection. How relating to others is the number one function of your business or passion project. We begin the workshop with getting connected on the soul level to your fellow sisters.
2) Reclaiming Your Unique Brilliance. Refining your message and creating something in the world that is unique, contributive, and that people will pay for. 
3) Healing Your Relationship With Money. Girl, if you want to start or expand your business, you've got to look at your drama and trauma with money. What would it be like if money flowed to you with ease? What would it be like if you could actually receive it? We will dive into this exploration together.
4) Closing Ritual. Our closing ritual will include a beautiful ceremony to hold each others intentions and desires as we go create in the world. You will be let into a "light-share" experience.
print_description: Calling all healers, conversation-starters, rebels, light-workers, and medicine women. Reclaim your feminine power and your boldest leadership.

title: Aellworks - Energy Work
description: Electric works with the energy field that our mind and body is composed of. When the energy is properly distributed and circulating freely, the body is healthy. This field holds all your desires, believes and thought forms.The relationship each of us has with them is responsible for your emotions, health, success and happiness. Through connecting and redirecting of the energy streams, Electric recomposes and aligns the energy. Her work focuses on your inner strength. She stabilizes your main energy flows extends their power and brings them back into your awareness. Her techniques include gentle touch, crystals, stones, metal, sound and more. Her work is called AELLWORKS - only @ ShangriLa!

title: AI, mans quest to invent God. w/ Professor Stone
description: The download has begun. We are increasingly intertwining with our technology. We are symbiotically joining our data-selves within the Great Machine. Companies and our government record so much of what we do, what does this mean for humanity? In this talk we will be exploring : What is Singularity and why are people talking about it? How does My Digital Life create a Virtual Data Version of You? How can we program the future to include humanity and our hearts? What will Sex, Love and Empathy look like in our Next Evolution? At the end of this talk you will learn how our community spiritual self is the force for change.

title: Ali Bar-Bar
description:
Visit Ali Bar-Bar, the 'hottest' place in Silicon Village, to chill, drink, and dance. Our cozy Bedouin tent provides comfort and shelter day and night, while we serve drinks and entertain you.

Enter through the flashing Stargate to dance to our laser light show, watch or join in fire performances, and enjoy flaming cocktails that will burn you inside and out. Brave guests are invited to roll the dice and taste our 'burning balls'.

Sparkle Pony's Closet offers gently used Playawear in our Playa "store" where consultants will help you find your inner Sparkle Pony! 

Scheduled events:

Happy Hours: daily, 4pm-6pm, no cover, half price drinks. 
Flaming cocktails, ‘burning balls’, and fire performances: Tue, Wed, Thu 7pm-9pm, Fr 7pm-10pm. 
Late Night Blue Blazers: Thu, Fr, Sun, 2am-4am
Sparkle Pony's Closet: Tue, Wed, Thu, 10am-2pm.

title: [A]nnual Reddit r/burningman Meet-up
description: Leave your Overly Attached Girlfriends at center camp, but bring your Good Girl Ginas. Enjoy the "Friend Zone" hammock space 20 feet above the Esplanade in our ridiculously photogenic dome. Advice Mallard sa.......god. 5 years....... I have been doing these things for 5 years. Stupid line after stupid line. There is more to life them memes and pictures of fucking cats! I don't know what to write. Do you people even read these? I'm not a "clever man". Do You Have idea how long it took me to write the short description? Like any idea? I hate to write and that shit took me like 2 hours. Really! Like 2 entire hours. Trying to think of lame punchy puns just for your enjoyment. Trying to get The Burning Man Meet-Up "back to it's roots". I mean half you fucking people will still miss the event and be like "I meant to go, but 15 drag queens in an art car wanted to have mimosas at the trash fence". YOU HAD ONE JOB, make it to the meet-up and pretend to not hate people for like a couple hours, but no you couldn't get your dusty, sun burnt ass out of your hexayurt. I don't know what I was expecting. Honestly I don't even know why I bother. I'm just going to use the same description year after year and you wont even notice. Fuck you people!"

description:
Apres ski enjoys a rich cultural heritage at ski resorts throughout the world, and we bring this same magic to the Playa for our 10 YEAR ANNIVERSARY PARTY!

Human fruit machine,
Blindfolded-roly-poly-cuppa-tea-relay,
Lemon and spoon battle,
Morris prancing,
Human snake,
Robbie Burns' Remix Reeling,
Alongside these lovely games we will also have some S&M thrown in for some naughty measure. Beneath the thin veneer of respectability, all is never what it seems; we’ll offer soft (and comfortable) slipper spankings, corduroy chaps and lavender scented latex.

title: Artists and Models Drawing Session

Choose your favorite position/pose in our art studio: Stand, sit, or recline on either side of the “canvas” as the workshop artist or the on-stage model, and dwell in our Artists and Models moment. BYO drawing materials or any mediums you work  in, or use the pencils and pads we will have ready for you. All male and female models are welcome to participate. Sessions will range from 5 to 20 minutes. Our stage will not be easily visible from the street, just to our participating artists.

title: Art of Perspective Drawing Class
description: Ever wonder why we see the way we see? The way something looks to you, and to me?  Come learn how to draw, using proper perspective. It’s an art form to capture something long, or reflective.  Haven’t touched a pencil in years? Don’t worry my friend, I have guides, paper and tools!  It's a casual environment, so have no fear.  It's art we're making, and we're all learning here.  You'll go about your day afterward, with opened eyes and mind.  For perspective is the trick to viewing this trippy world correctly, you'll find.

title: ART TOUR - Bicycle Tour
description: See the Carnaval of Mirrors as envisioned by our artists!  This informal bike tour is hosted by volunteers from the ARTery (6:25 & Esplanade). A curated group of art projects will be visited and discussed. This tour will begin at 10:00 AM and run approximately 60-90 minutes, weather permitting. The tours are flexible so feel free to join us on playa if you see a bunch of bikes traveling in a pack, or drop out if you want. The tour starts promptly at the bike racks across from the ARTery (on the Esplanade). Note that there are also ART TOUR - Guided tour (search Playa Events), and self guided tours (paper copies) available at the ARTery. Most of the art on the playa is self-funded, so be sure to check out your favorite art projects on the Burning Man website now, and then help fund them or volunteer through their respective websites. It takes every single one of us to make Burning Man happen...
print_description: ARTery hosted bicycle tour of curated art projects, Temple and The Man.  Bring your bike and join the fun.  Departs promptly at 10 AM at ARTery.

title: ART TOUR - Guided
description: It's all about the ART projects and the fabulous ARTISTS and their teams who create them! Ride in style on a bus/mutant vehicle as volunteers from the ARTery provide information on curated art pieces, as well as the Temple and The Man. Guided Vehicle tours run Tue-Fri and begin at 11:00 AM at ARTery (6:25 & Esplanade). Vehicle tours are for people with mobility issues -- seniors, pregnant women, people with ongoing or temporary disabilities, accompanied children, and others who might face challenges in getting out and around the playa. You must have tickets in advance to get a seat on the bus. Tickets are available @ 10 AM the day of the tour at ARTery (6:25 & Esplanade). Also there are separate ART TOUR - Bicycles (search Playa Directory), or DO YOUR OWN TOUR! Self-guided (paper map) tours available at the ARTery (on Esplanade)
print_description: ARTery guided mutant vehicle/bus tours of the art.  For those with mobility issues, please.  Tickets given out at ARTery at 10 AM the day of the tour.

title: Ayla Nereo sunrise set @ Camp Mystic
description:
THURS morning at 6:30 AM ~ Join Ayla at Camp Mystic to sing in the wildness of the heart and greet the dawning sun. With an array of loop-pedals by her side, she builds layer upon layer of vocal melodies into fierce, sweeping harmonies and weaves syncopated threads of guitar, kalimba, piano, and percussion into each live performance. 

Her lucid storytelling and lyrical imagery are water for the thirsty soul; words and sounds that crack open the heart, and embody the many folds of our own selves. Crafting an immersive soundscape we can dive into, Ayla’s performance becomes a journey: an inspired, wondrous experience that holds you by the heart and doesn’t let go.

www.aylanereo.com
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/ayla.nereo.music
LISTEN: http://soundcloud.com/ayla-nereo
print_description: THURS morning at 6:30 AM ~ Join Ayla at Camp Mystic to sing in the wildness of the heart and greet the dawning sun.

title: BiGGEST gathering of BURNERS with SOMBREROS!
description:
*Be part of BOTH the BiGGEST gathering of BURNERS witH SOMBREROS on Playa and  take part in our funky BURNERS with SOMBREROS video... bring tequila and your AMiGOS!!! Arriba! Arriba!!

It is an undeniable fact: there are more sombreros than Mexicans on Playa! As a Mexican I just get giddy happy when I see my fellow Burners with colorful sombreros throughout Playa.... it simply evokes the festive nature of my culture: fiesta, spirits, baile, canto and some good food! I want to take it a step further and challenge 'cultural appropriation' stigmas out there by making it a WIN-WIN situation here: If you wear a Sombrero on Playa, you gotta KiSS A MEXiCAN! Come celebrate in the BiGGEST GATHERiNG OF BURNERS with SOMBREROS at Center Camp Cafe. Bring your SOMBREROS, your TEQUILA, and your AMiGOS... and together we'll go in search of MEXiCANS ON PLAYA and share the LOVE!!!

This year I am also gonna do something that IT'S SO OUT OF MY LEAGUE and make a ViDEO!!! SO come be part of the GIFT the GiVES and immortalize yourselves (and your SOMBRERO) in a funky video I got prepared for ya!! Arriba Arriba!!

title: Biodanza:  From Instinct to Inspiration
description:
Biodanza has been baring hearts since the 60's. Developed in S. America it is now a world wide phenomenon bringing joy, pleasure, balance, health and healing through music, dance and sincere interaction. Contact and caress are tools of our trade. We deal in deep human intimacy, through touch, eye contact, movement and body language. Not verbal communication. We feel each other, letting the mind and its ways take a back seat for a change. Biodanza has been baring hearts since the 60's. Developed in S. America it is now a world wide phenomenon bringing joy, pleasure, balance, health and healing through music, dance and sincere interaction. Contact and caress are tools of our trade. We deal in deep human intimacy, through touch, eye contact, movement and body language. Not verbal communication. We feel each other, letting the mind and its ways take a back seat for a change. We enhance our senses, our instincts and our state of consciousness. We perceive and experience ourselves and others differently when we do this. More authentically. More naked.

title: Bismuth or Bust
description: Bismuth is a metal with crazy crystalline properties. Apply heat and turn a featureless lump of dull grey metal into elaborate beautiful crystals. The process is fascinating to watch and the results are unique and beautiful.  Listen as we babble on about relevant topics in science or just make up facts as we go.  We'll show you how and you'll leave with a crystal of your own, supplies permitting. Mon-Fri 2-3pm
print_description: Extract unique Crystals by melting pure Bismuth Metal.  Watch as we make them and take one home with you.  Tue-Fri 2-3pm.  5th year running!

title: Bitch 'n' Tea Service
description: Have something to bitch about? Drama? Sweat in your ass crack? A bed full of playa dust? We'll lend an ear! Come bitch for some bitchin (iced) tea.

title: BJ Practicum
description:
This is an informative and participatory "mouth-on" workshop where we'll have a chance to ask questions, compare notes, share techniques, and generally learn from each other to be more skillful at this thing we love - or want to love - to do.  If you're interested in learning more about how to please a man orally, this is the place for you. . . . . . 

Come on ladies / givers, you know you've got some skills - and some questions!  Come share your favorite tips and techniques by words and demonstration.  If you're still exploring getting comfortable, or are curious about details you never dared ask anyone, come share questions that have been plaguing you. . . . . . 

	* How to protect yourself when the action gets intense? . . .
	* What about the gag reflex? . . .
	* Drool or dry?  . . .
	* How do you use hands and still go deep? . . .

And guys, you must have comments you'd like to pass on, other than simply "Yes, please"! . . . . .

	* Hate teeth?  Want teeth? . . .
	* What about deep throat? . . .

Here's your chance to make your requests - and pet peeves - heard! . . . . .

This is a participatory event open to couples of any combination, so long as one of them has some phallic protuberance and the other is applying lips, tongue, and maybe even throat to it.  No lookie-loos!  That said we also strongly welcome women still getting comfortable with giving oral pleasure, with or without a partner.  This is a really safe place to ask questions, in the group or in private conversation afterwards. . . . . .

This was a great fun event at previous Burns.  The presenter's been researching all year to find new tidbits and info to share.  (Hey, someone's gotta do the tough jobs.)  Come show off, learn stuff, and have fun. . . . . .

(Please bring a towel or sarong to lie on for your comfort.)
print_description: Fellate your partner. Watch others. Ask questions. Share tips. Enjoy yourselves in this couples-only workshop on giving better head to men.
other_location: Play Dome, in camp Playa 4 Play at 4:15 & G, within Sacred Spaces Village

title: Black Hole Black Light Party
description:
//BEGIN TRANSMISSION//
*********PHASE 2*********

We are The Bad Asstronauts, Colorado's sexiest, gayest, most bad ass space-faring camp. 

Having blasted off at the Bad Asstronauts Present: BLAST OFF - Up Uranus party, continue the journey through space with us as we battle gravitational forces and transport you to ultraviolet dimensions. YOU are hereby recruited.

Shake your UV-glowing cosmic ass to the beats of our own DJ ElectroFi!

MISSION SPECS: lasers! lights! music! oh my! UV-reactive body painting, black light chill lounge, blast off bouncy lounge, moonTANG (bring your cups!), cute boys dressed up like astronauts (need I say anything more?), lots of intergalactic fun 

MISSION REQS: YOU. 

MISSION TO BE CONTINUED...

title: Black Light Hamster Hoorah
description: Hamsters only wake up when the sun goes down and of course, they like to party like animals (because they are animals) after a full day's sleep. Come cool down from the hot sun in our night of blacklight body painting, music, and dancing under the illumination of black lights in our Sparkle Dome! Our hamsters will trade their spinning wheels for spinning limbs. We will trade our food pellets for power ballads. Instead of a sawdust covered floor, we've got booty shaking that'll leave you begging for more. You'll have more fun than a gerbil in Richard Gere's rear.

title: Black Rock Chamber Music
description:
Take a break from the techno and dub step and relax in our welcoming red domes with live classical music. Black Rock musicians will play string duets, trios, and quartets by Beethoven, Schubert, Bach, and more. 

If you are a violinist, violist, or cellist and you'd like to participate, please get in touch.

description: Come run 5k with us. We'll start at runner's HQ, Pink Lightning! Then we'll run to Esplanade, and then to the Man and turn around at whatever point it's a 5k! YAY!

title: Black Rock City Airbrush “You Say It We Spray It”
description: Black Rock City Airbrush has been a playa tradition for seven years with our motto of “You say it, we spray it”. Come on by and see us spray art on bodies, T-shirts (bring your own) and more. Even better, come by to learn to airbrush yourself. Everyone can learn and be a volunteer here. Have fun interacting by painting others. Are you already an airbrush artist? Come here to meet new people and gift some art.
print_description: You say it we spray it on bodies, T-shirts and more. Expect to interact or maybe learn to airbrush yourself. Volunteers are always welcome here.

title: Black Rock City Communist Party
description: BRCCP (Black Rock City Communist Party) 1st Dustinational meeting of the Playaburo to discuss plug and plays, commercialization, boutique hotels and world marketing of Burner Culture. Tours of 1st Camp outliers along K and L street will be included to show what we are up against.

title: BLACK ROCK CITY HIGH’S HOMECOMING
description: Black Rock City High School celebrates High School as it should have been, featuring all the freaks and geeks, jocks in jockstraps, cheerleaders, drama queens, lunch ladies and everything in between. Dust off your pom-poms, boom boxes, and neon shades as we take it back to the old school with a sunset dance party, a homecoming photo booth and some seriously spiked punch all to celebrate your Black Rock City Pride!
print_description: BRCHS celebrates High School as it should have been, featuring all the freaks and geeks, jocks and cheerleaders, and everything in between.

title: Black Rock City Pub Crawl Reception
description: Join over 400 NAKED bikers at the end of the annual Black Rock City Pub Crawl for: (1) delicious cocktails (bring a cup); (2) cheerfully gorgeous, naked guys serving cocktails; and (3) enjoy the Afterglow Tent and our house DJs as we tear it up!
print_description: Join hundreds of NAKED bikers at the end of the annual Black Rock City Pub Crawl for cocktails, nudity and music in the Afterglow tent.

title: Black Rock City Self-Service Abortion Clinic
description: Providing yummy jelloshot abortions for the last 10 years at the burn in a lovely living room space, the BRSSAC provides service with a smile (and fetuses full of jelloshot).  They're fetalicious! Remember our motto, "We Bring Out the Kid in You." C'mon in, relax, and have a thoughtfully prepared taste of the unborn. Coat hangers and other accessories available upon request.
print_description: C'mon in and have a jelloshot abortion-they're nutritious and fetaliscious. We bring out the kid in you! Try a taste of the unborn!

title: Black Rock City Town Hall Meeting
description: Join our live, improvised, pseudo-official, satirical meeting where citizens of Black Rock City come together to debate proposed changes to the event!
print_description: Join our live, improvised, pseudo-official, satirical meeting where citizens of Black Rock City come together to debate proposed changes to the event!

title: Black Rock Playa Dust - what's in it?
description: Geologist George Davis will give a full explanation of the chemical and mineralogical data from a playa sample inside of BRC in 2010.  Find out the good and bad things about playa dust. Ever had trouble cleaning up after the trip to BRC? Learn a great recipe which involves simple household ingredients which removes playa dust once and for all. In addition, it's environmentally friendly and non-toxic. REAL 'Better living through chemistry' with a demo.
print_description: Geologist George Davis will explain what chemicals and minerals are in playa dust!  'Better living through chemistry' with a demo.

title: Black Rock Solar’s Solar Playa International
description:
Join Black Rock Solar at its annual event Solar Playa International. While sipping on a cool libation, you will get a chance to meet the staff and crew of Black Rock Solar as well as other Burners doing meaningful and innovative work around the country.  The purpose of this event is to bring together all of the different groups and individuals on playa doing work in renewable energy, climate change, environmental outreach, and policy.  Tell us about your projects and learn about ours. 

Since 2007 Black Rock Solar has been building solar arrays in Nevada and giving them away at little or no cost. To date, BRS has built over 5.5 megawatts of clean renewable energy.  BRS prioritizes installations for schools, hospitals, rural communities, non-profit groups, and Native American tribes.
print_description: Sip a cold drink, learn about Black Rock Solar, tell us what you’re doing in the world of renewable energy, climate change & environmental outreach.

title: Blast Off Challenge: Rocket Ship Building
description: Come visit Space Jam and construct a space worthy vehicle that will be launched into the stratosphere. We’ll provide the thrust.
print_description: Come visit Space Jam and construct a space worthy vehicle that will be launched into the stratosphere. We’ll provide the thrust.

title: Blender Bar Pre-Sexploration
description: Join us for this lubricating bar-licious event to prepare yourselves for the Sexploration Party! Come drink, mingle, play games, & get your sexy on! Experience our amazing bunny bar - complete with the bunny wheel of fortune - turn, turn, turn and let the wheel tell you what you must do to receive a drink. Enjoy beautiful, sexy, hot, wonderful, queer-licious, trans-glorious, fantastic people who you will hopefully really get to know at our play party later in the evening. Catch someones eye during this super flirtatious blender bar event. Both alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks will be served. All genders welcome all ways. We mean this - you can be trans, cis, boy, girl, gay, bi, dyke, king, queen, loving these words, hating these words, our neighbors, or from far-away lands across the playa this night is for you. So lets enjoy ...each other!

print_description: Callling all Bluegrass bands for a jam session in the 430 Portal.  Bring yer band, yer fiddle, yer mandolin, yer whatever you got and lets get it on.

title: Bluegrass Music at Rootpile Camp
description: Howdy ya'll, we are Rootpile camp, home of hillbilly culture, moonshine, live bluegrass music and BBQ!! We have a live stage where we will be picking every night from 10 to midnite and during the day we will have workshops where you can try out bluegrass instruments!! We have bbq too! Ya'll come!!
print_description: Tired of thump, thump? Want to hear real people, real instruments? Come to Rootpile camp for your fix of live bluegrass, bbq and hillbilly culture!

title: Bluegrass music lessons at Rootpile camp
description: From noon to 2 pm we will be hosting a lessons of how to play bluegrass music and a jam, we will have instruments for you to play on our bring your own and jam! This is for complete beginners, intermediate players who play an instrument but don't know how to play bluegrass or even advanced players who want to jam but didn't bring their instruments to the playa. Ya'll come!
print_description: From noon to 2 pm we will be hosting a lessons of how to play bluegrass music, we will have instruments for you to play on our bring your own and jam!

title: "Blue Room" Comfort Concierge, by Cartoon Commune
description:
When on duty, our polite and handsomely-dressed concierges are your humble servants to enhance your johnny-on-the-spot experience.  Line up behind the velvet rope.  Enter the orange-mint scented stall.  Rest easy, knowing your port-o-john will not be disturbed in any way. title: Boca Raton Social Club
description: The Boca Raton Social Club (BRSC) is an octogenarian’s oasis, serenity for senior citizens, and a respite for the retirees of burning man. BRSC promises fiber-infused fermented beverages, a Rat-pack soundtrack, and plastic covers on the chairs. It is best to stay regular before heading to the OrgyDome. Come for the hard candy, but stay for the drinks and the continued questioning of “Why don’t you come and visit your bubbee more?” and “Have you met any nice girls out here in the desert?”. title: Developing "Sense of Place"
description:
an investigation into pattern analysis and permaculture. 
How do we Identify with where we are? In a globalized world it becomes easy to view the beauty and Majesty of a place as an observer. This workshop will give you tools to develop a "sense a place" through pattern identification to be present in mind, body, spirit and location. To understand and view the world as a series of patterns that apply anywhere is to unlock the language of the natural world. Discussion led by Jesse Hernreich

title: BOOTIE BRC 10-Year Anniversary Mashup Party
description:
OMG! MUSIC WITH WORDS! Now in its 10th year on the playa, A Plus D bring BOOTIE BRC, the internationally-infamous bootleg mashup party, back to Black Rock City!

Bootie BRC celebrates (and satirizes) pop culture both past and present, keeping your brain guessing and body dancing with creative song combinations. Mixing and matching every musical genre, era, and style into one big dance party, it's the soundtrack for the A.D.D. generation -- with free mashup CDs given away like candy!

Launched by DJ duo A Plus D in 2003 in San Francisco, Bootie was the first club night dedicated solely to the burgeoning artform of the bootleg mashup, and is now the biggest mashup event in the world, with regular parties in several cities on four continents. Bootie BRC is presented in part by the BRC Weekly, Black Rock City's independent newsweekly. 

Bootie ... because one song at a time just isn't enough.
print_description: OMG MUSIC WITH WORDS FOR 10 YEARS! Dance to the best crazy mashups, celebrating (& satirizing) pop culture both past and present. Free CDs all night!

title: Bottom Like A Rockstar: A Guide To Basic Bottoming
description: Good scenes are more than just doing something kinky. We will explore how to prepare ourselves for play, including learning about yourself, your body, your desires, and establishing limits. We’ll teach you how to be safe and still have fun! Our class will  highlight how to process sensations and emotions from the scene for maximizing your BDSM experience. 18+ ID required.
print_description: Come learn how to negotiate, communicate, prepare for a scene, and process pain with Suspended Animation. 18+ ID required.

title: Bottoms Up Yoga
description: This is a playful yoga class, hosted by the Booty Hunters. Did you have a loooong drive to Black Rock City? Is your butt so sore from all that sitting in line? We are here to help! Come by Booty Hunters HQ and wiggle out all that stiffness. Get your glutes ready for an epic Burn! Drinks available at the bar after class...or during, if you like to mix your detox with intox.
print_description: Learn some Ass-tastic Asanas and get those glutes up and ready for your burn! Much downdog. Such sun salutations. Wow.

title: Boundaries, Consent, and Communication
description: It was all fun and games, until the oxytocin and dopamine wore off! Now you're wondering, "What the hell was I thinking?" Don't leave the playa wishing you hadn't done something, or conversely, wishing you had, but didn't have the communication tools to ask for what you wanted. Communication is sexy, consent is sexy, and good boundaries make all the difference between having a great experience and wishing you could, turn back time. SexPositive World has developed  fun and interesting exercises that help you get in the habit of feeling into what you really want, asking for that, and gently and lovingly saying no when preferable. If you're not sure, we've got great negotiation techniques to teach you how to get to a situation that is a win-win for all concerned. These are skills that will be with you, long after the playa dust settles: you will find yourself using them, not just in areas of sex and relationship, but with your family, friends, and employers too. Class size is limited to 30 participants. Join Gabriella and the other "sexperts" and love perveyors at Play4Play and get ready to have the experiences YOU want. Class recommended for women and couples, but good for everyone!
print_description: Saying, NO when you mean no, Hell Yes! when you mean yes, and explore, Maybe, in a safe and same way. Don't "play" on the playa, without this class!

title: Boundaries vs. Barriers: Your Truth on the Playa
description: What are your barriers on the playa? What are your boundaries? What’s the muthafuckin difference? Come to Camp BBW for a discussion on how to stay true to you, while totally open to the unique opportunities at Burning Man.
print_description: What are your barriers and boundaries? What’s the difference? Learn to stay true to you while open to the unique opportunities at Burning Man.

Head to deep playa!

Meet 12 o'clock side of the man at sunset. We roll out an hour later for deep playa to have a Bike Party!!!"

title: BRC Gay Pride
description:
Join us Friday for an annual event with details to come. Celebrating our growing presence at Black Rock City and the unique and special dynamic of the LGBTQ++ presence. Honoring the Gayborhood and it history.

Be sure and read http://queerburners.com/news/burner-history-x when you can. There will be new information added to it through the year as already so many accomplishments have been made.

Queer Burner History and Burning Man History are very telling in the development of our vie of the 10 Principles and how we have brought them into our lives.

We are celebrating the special flavor lgbtq burners have brought to Burning Man and our refusal to be simply integrated by radically express our specialness and invite everyone to join us on the journey; and let's invite everyone to join us in the celebration, too!

More details to come!!!!! Join the BRC Gay Pride Parade Facebook group and share in the discussion!
print_description: Join us Friday for an annual event with details to come. Celebrating our growing presence at Black Rock City

title: BRCH3 Red Dress Run
description: The Black Rock City Hash House Harriers are proud to sponsor the 8th running of the BRCH3 Red Dress Run. Meet at the Man with your red dress, running shoes, a drinking vessel and a sense of humor. We will lay a Hash House Harriers-style trail that you can run, jog, walk, slide, or bike that ends with a cold brews, silly songs and guaranteed debauchery. No red dress? So what! Anything red will do. Don’t run? No problem — bring your bike. Trail will be clearly marked with flags and there will be beverage stops along the way. On-on!

title: BRC Writing Marathon
description:
A writing marathon is a magical experience for anyone who loves to write, and the playa and BRC provide a wealth of imaginative material. This model was based on Natalie Goldberg's concept in "Writing Down the Bones," and developed into a moving art form by the Southeastern Louisiana Writing Project. In brief: we choose a location, sit and write for ten minutes or so, share what we have written, and move on to another location. The only response we give to each others' writing is "thank you." 
We will likely depart from the Midway around 3:50 after we get ourselves organized and sit down to "write out the cobwebs." Participate for as long as you wish. Depending on interest, we may even publish our work online after the event. Visit writingmarathon.com to get a taste of how we do this in the Big Easy!
print_description: Join us to write on the playa! BYO pen, journal, & wheels and meet at the New Orleans Sunken City Sideshow. Writers of all ages are invited!
other_location: Midway - New Orleans Sunken City Sideshow

title: Breakthrough Your Fear Closet (Arrow-Breaking)
description: Fear often gets in our way in realizing our life goals and achieving our highest potential. Fear sometimes get embedded deep in our psyche and will remain there until and unless we choose to address them. Granted it is easy to ignore our fears and stay in the comfort zone, yet imagine life's possibilities if we confront our fears. In this workshop, we will breakthrough our fears by breaking an arrow with our throat as a metaphorical exercise. It can be fear related to us growing up as queer individuals or any other personal fears that gets in our way to becoming our full two-spirit beautiful self. Participants must be sober to participate. Limited arrows available. Led by Blitzy.
print_description: In this workshop, we will breakthrough our fears by breaking an arrow with our throat as a metaphorical exercise. Limited # of arrows. Must be sober.

Event:  Bubble Brigade Parade
Host: Strawberry 
Time: 11am

title: Bubbles and Bass Sunrise Parties
description: We'll be rockin' you out from 5am til Noon, Wednesday through Sunday mornings, with bubbly bass-tastic house music as you watch the sunrise over the playa and dance the AM hours away... and drink some bubbly while you boogie. We want to create a home of warmth and positive energy during the AM hours. Together with a team of artists, musicians, circus performers, dancers, planners, bartenders, builders, architects, thinkers, dreamers, and lovers, we are going to bring invigorating house music to the Burning Man community and a dance floor that gets everyone moving and shaking. We'll offer you champagne to relax and a comfy chill space to enjoy the sounds while resting your feet. We want to provide an environment conducive to connecting: spiritually, conversationally, and energetically.
print_description: We'll be rockin' you out from 5am til Noon, Wed through Sun, with champagne and bass-tastic house music as you watch the sunrise over the playa!

title: Bucky Dome open-house
description: Did you just spend a few hours setting up a dome? Then you should check out this new method of dome building that sets up in under an hour. Using the geometry of the truncated icosahedron, aka Bucky Ball, this dome frame features uniform pole lengths, isometric vertices, and a modified tensegrity system to stabilize and distribute loads. 15’-25’ diameter domes can be erected by two people in under an hour.
print_description: Did you just spend a few hours setting up a dome? Then you should check out this new method of dome building that sets up in under an hour.

title: Budokan Yoga: Yoga   Martial Art
description: Experience this dynamic blend of contemporary yoga asana influenced by ancient martial arts. This Budokon Yoga series is a seamless transition-based flow with circular rotation and challenging dynamic movements, which brings grace, concentration, fluidity, power, and creativity to hatha yoga in an authentic expression. Intermediate/Advance level.
print_description: Experience the dynamic blend of contemporary yoga asana influenced by ancient martial arts in this seamless, challenging flow.

title: Build a Drum!
description:
Dr. Thelonious D. Rum and his Gypsies, Tramps and Thieves, each with their peerless pedigree, shall 
collude to captivate and inspire the naïve. Lured by the dark emotional caress of their own inner 
wisdom, not to mention the rhythm-making bait, (drums!) lying just beyond reach, players vie for a 
chance to build their own drum by playing 5 not-so-traditional Carnival games. They'll trawl the crowds,
 luring and enticing Burners with games of chance. This then shall determine who will be the lucky 
ones to express their creativity with skin, wood and rope. ALL candidates will be gifted with carny 
totems and icons, but only the courageous will stay and build a drum, those perennial souls who hurl 
themselves into the unknown of their personal darkness and light AND who aren’t too bad at tossing a 
ring.  * JOIN US any time during Midway hours, but the hours POSTED BELOW are ESPECIALLY auspicious 
today. (wink wink) Find our website here https://medicinalhealingexcursion.wordpress.com/
print_description: Build a Drum with Dr. Thelonious and Company but only after winning at their five games of chance and skill! Step right up! One at a time please!
other_location: On the Midway at the foot of THE MAN

description: All you need to defuse that bomb is... that foil gum wrapper you MOOPed this morning. Don't you wish you had a MacGyver Survival Kit? Stop by and get one - you custom stock it from our selection of extremely useful household objects, we tell you how to use them to fix a wide range of problems, on- and off-playa. (Guaranteed to defuse bombs or your money back.)

title: BUNNY MARCH THURSDAY Modern Partner Dancing
description: Learn to New Style Hustle with Jason Lam - to jazz, house, you name it. Learn modern partner dancing with other bunnies on the playa!! ;) Bring your ears, tail, and a partner if you have one. If you don't, come anyway!! Here's a preview of what you'll learn: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gZg_n50k-JI. After the workshop, join us for the pregame and camp hop for the Billion Bunny March Against Humanity. At the end of the March, our fire spinners will be spinning at The Man.

title: BURN2 Regional Member's Happy Hour
description: BURN2 is Burning Man's Virtual Regional out there on the net with real animated avatars in a simulated environment with real burners from all over the world.  Meet your BURN2 online friends. Bikeport yourself over and meet-up using your real-life avatar.  Enjoy a cocktail or mocktail but bring your own animations to this happy hour.  Never heard of us and BURN2 curious?  You're invited too.   BURN2 is a great place to decompress, precompress, and self-express your artistic side and your burner personality- all within the boundaries of the principles of Burning Man that you've come to know and love.  All the burn without the real-life dust.  Well, we do have dust storms on our virtual playa sometimes.
print_description: BURN2 Virtual Burning Man burners meet in their physical avatar on the real-life playa.  Landmark/Bikeport to  EBB and Glow Village happy hour.

title: BURN DEEP - Fire Circle at Comfort & Joy
description:
A dazzling fiery collaboration featuring fire dancers from Ministry of Flow and from all over the dusty plains burning deep to the beats of the BAAAHS Art Car (Big-Ass Amazingly Awesome Homosexual Sheep). 

Fire dancers of all tricks and skill levels welcome. Fuel will be provided but feel free to bring your own so we'll burn brighter and deeper. Fire safety will be available on hand. Volunteers welcome.

Please contact Blitzy at blitzyburn@gmail.com to volunteer and/or collaborate.
print_description: A dazzling fiery collaboration of fire dancers from Ministry of Flow to the beats of the BAAAHS Art Car (Big-Ass Amazingly Awesome Homosexual Sheep).

title: Burner Bike Bellhop Service for Burner Express Bus
description: Burners Bus Bike Bellhop Service will offer random newbs and rubes a lift for their luggage, coolers and tents from the Burner Express bus stop to their camp…or to some camp. We have bikes with trailers ready to assist you with your travel needs. If you arrive in Black Rock City on the bus we can help you transport gear to camp. Look for our cheerful grifters with their grubby hands and dusty grins as you get off the Burner Express bus in Black Rock City. Feel safe as you allow some complete stranger in goofy clothes to carry away all your possessions needed for the week, secure in the knowledge that there are 70,000 people for us... I mean... them, to get lost in. Burner Bus Bike Bellhop Service; A lot of Bs an S.
print_description: Offering random newbs and rubes a lift for their luggage, coolers and tents from the BRC Burner Express bus stop  to their camp…or to some camp.

title: Burner Bingo
description:
The biggest collaborative game on the playa! 

Over 50 theme camps are participating in our game of Burner Bingo.

Visit Discordia to pick up a bingo card then visit the camps listed to complete challenges and get stamps. 

Return the card for daily prizes!
print_description: The biggest collaborative game on the playa! Get stamps from the theme camps on your bingo card to win prizes! Cards available from Discordia daily.

title: Burner Energize Thyself!
description: Energize yourself. Learn a 5 min routine of easy exercises to boost your energy health.
print_description: Energize yourself. Learn a 5 min routine of easy exercises to boost your energy health.

title: Burner Express Potluck/Happy Hour
description:
Hey Burner Express riders!!

Whether you decided to camp with HOVerlandia or elsewhere, ALL are invited for a potluck/happy hour to reconnect with old busmates and meet new friends who also HOVered in :-D

By 7pm, all the Wednesday buses should be in, the Burner Express staff should be off and ready to hang out, and it's still early enough that we all have the rest of the evening, if you want to tear up the night or call it a night.

So bring a friend, bring a snack, bring a bottle of something, and we'll see you at the shade structure! )'(
print_description: Hey Burner Express riders!! Whether you decided to camp with HOVerlandia or elsewhere, ALL are invited for a potluck/happy hour to re/connect!

title: Burner Family Feud
description:
Come join us on the Silicon Village stage for the first round of our Burner Family Feud!

We surveyed 100 Burners for their responses to our survey questions. Two teams of contestants (which could include you) will compete to pick the top answers and win prizes! Everyone wins as we find out more about our fellow burners!
print_description: Come join us on the Silicon Village stage for our own Burner Family Feud!

title: Burner Portraits Studio
description: Fashion! Lights!! Action!!! Show off your playa fashion, get exposed by a professional photographer in a timeless moment to keep for years to come.
print_description: Fashion! Lights!! Action!!! Show off your playa fashion, get exposed by a professional photographer in a timeless moment to keep for years to come.

title: Burners Without Borders 10-Year Celebration!
description: Come celebrate Burner's Without Borders 10-year anniversary with us!  Daily music featuring live musicians and chill beats, alongside our annual 'Live Screen Printing' where you can adorn your clothes with custom graphics & select Burning Man  art projects.
print_description: Join us in celebrating daily with live musicians and chill beats. Come adorn your clothes with our custom graphics at our live screen printing booth.

title: Burners Without Borders Speakers Series
description: Our community is making a difference everyday, and you are invited to discover how you can make an impact in your community. Join us in discussing the resources and network that is available to you year-round and get involved.
print_description: Join us in discussing sustainability and community resiliency, and learn how you can make an impact in your community year round through our network.

title: Burners Without Borders Tea Service and Conversati
description: Join us for tea and conversation at our art space directly across Esplanade from our camp.
print_description: Join us for tea and conversation at our art space directly across Esplanade from our camp.

title: Burners Without Matches
description: Make your own necklace medallion with a magnifying glass. Every day 10 to 2 at DragonAss Camp, in the Sac Valley Alley.
print_description: Stop by DragonAss camp and burn one with us. We provide magnifying glasses and wood medallions for you to burn your own creation. Every day 10~2.

title: Burner Toastmasters Get Together and Speak-A-Thon
description: Like to speechify? Pontificate? Step up to ye olde soap box? We have you covered. While there's some jargon in here we admittedly don't understand, we assume Toastmasters folks will get it. Note:"If you’re a Toastmaster and couldn’t be in Vegas for their August International Convention, then bring your CC/CL/other manuals you’d like to advance in, and join us (with friends) for a real Toastmasters meeting - and photos! We plan to cram in speeches, evaluations, and table topics into a one hour session, or more if demand exists for it, so on time is a good thing. Prompt arrivals will have the best chances for the most fun and credit.Looking to join in? Cartoon Commune camp, Tuesday, 1-2PM.  Email: Gerflash (at) socal (dot) rr (dot) com. so we can plan ahead and count you in.Just maybe - the pix we take might make it into the TI Magazine! You’ll actually be Toastmastering on-Playa!
print_description: We’re back, so let’s do it again! Are you a Toastmaster? Bring your manual, friends. Join us for a great meet-up, photos, and fond memories!

title: Burning Dawn
description: Sunrise is a beautiful time to spin fire. Been spun all night but haven't actually done any spinning yet? Head on over to Prometheatrics for Burning Dawn! We still do it up every morning and it's totally a thing. You can even use our fuel. (Though extra awesome if you bring some.) Come start your day off right or finish up an epic all-nighter @ 2:45 and Esplanade.
print_description: Sunrise is a beautiful time to spin fire. Been spun all night but haven't actually done any spinning yet? Head on over to Prometheatrics!

title: Burning Ham
description:
Get your pork on! Since we've got a bunch of foodies over at Camp Calico, including a professional chef, we figured it would be fun to share our culinary escapades with our BRC family! Come and enjoy a whole pig roast on the playa! We will be working on it all day, so stop by before to get a look at what we're up to, or just head over with your plates when you're ready to eat! See you there! 

WARNING: Pork sweats inevitable.
print_description: Get your pork on! Camp Calico is roasting a whole pig on the playa. Bring your plates, it might get messy. WARNING: Pork sweats inevitable.

title: Burning Man 2100 Planning Party!
description: It is never too early to plan for the day when even Black Rock reaches capacity and the BLM finally pulls the plug. Fortunately there's lots of empty space in outer space, and nuclear fireworks can be the very best kind. Join us for a relaxed discussion with appropriate libations as we figure out if Mars dust is worse than playa dust, if cometary ice delivery is practical, just when a rocket is a Mutant Vehicle, and what to do when you're on the moon and people STILL complain that the music is too damn loud!
print_description: Come help us plan our burn at Tsiolkovskiy Crater or Olympus Mons, where there really will be space for everyone. (Bring your own oxygen.)

title: Burning Man Arts cocktail hour & panel discussion
description: A panel discussion about possibilities for the "afterlife" of playa art, followed by a cocktail reception for artists and supporters.
print_description: A panel discussion about possibilities for the "afterlife" of playa art, followed by a cocktail reception for artists and supporters.

title: Burning Man Confessional
description: Confess your deepest, darkest secrets about the Burn and beyond to Madame Mysteria, or write your confession and put it in the Confession Box to be burned at the Temple. Will your penance be something naughty, or something nice? YOU DECIDE!
print_description: Confess your deepest, darkest secrets about the Burn and beyond to Madame Mysteria, or write your confession and put it in the Confession Box!

title: Burning Manniversary Block Party
description: Celebrate your event with us: 5 or more burns, birthdays, anniversaries, engagements, weddings, divorces! Special IDs, contests, prizes.
print_description: Celebrate your event with us: 5 or more burns, birthdays, anniversaries, engagements, weddings, divorces! Special IDs, contests, prizes.

title: Burn Your Face 50th Celebration
description: Shadyvil and Camp HTFU welcome you to celebrate & reminisce about the times we've had and reconnect with spirit of the music.  Bring your favorite shows & jams, bring a story, bring your special lot food, bring some burgundy wine or just bring yourself and getaway from the wumpa wumpa.
print_description: Shadyvil, HTFU and the spirit of Papa Bear welcome you to celebrate the music of the Grateful Dead.

title: Burningman Studio Open Mic
description: Release your inner star.  Bring your hidden talent down to burningman studios, step up to the mic, and show everyone your star power.
print_description: Release your inner star.  Bring your hidden talent down to burningman studios, step up to the mic, and show everyone your star power.

title: Burning Man Ultramarathon
description: Run 31 miles around the playa with your favorite friends. We'll do a loop course, and there will be tons of fun! Bring a gallon of water and running snack to share as we run ourselves silly in the funnest place on earth. Pre-register here: https://ultrasignup.com/register.aspx?did=29683
print_description: Come out and run 50 kilometers-yep, 31 miles!-with the craziest on the playa! Bring water & snack. Run what you can. Register on Mon/Tues if possible.

title: Burning Man Unicycles Unite!
description:
Our 11th year riding counter-clockwise around the esplanade. Meet at the 9:00 Plaza with your wheel and join our annual flock of Burning Man Unicyclists.
Off-Playa, connect with the Burning Man Unicycles Unite group on Facebook and keep in touch!
print_description: Our 11th year riding counter-clockwise around the esplanade. Meet @ the 9:00 Plaza with your wheel & join our annual flock of Burning Man Unicyclists!

title: BurningMUN: Burning Man Model UN
description: Announcing Burning Man's first ever Model UN! Debate BRC's biggest issues, like 'Shirtcocking: Respectable Attire, or Just Fucking Take Your Shirt Off Already', 'Dicks and Tits: Is Bigger Always Better?', and 'Turnkey Camps: Should they be Banned?' Prizes for master debaters and cunning linguists!
print_description: Debate BRC's biggest issues, 'Shirtcocking: Respectable Attire?, 'Dicks and Tits: Is Bigger better? Prizes for master debaters & cunning linguists!

title: Burning Salsa
description:
Hey YOU with the feet and the hips!

Bring that sexy body over here and join us for Burning Salsa, where the dance moves are hot but you’ll be cool.

We’re teaching a 3 day progressive salsa workshop on the Playa. No partner is needed and all levels are welcome. We'll show you some footwork, turns, and partner patterns and we start each day by going over previous material so no worries if you missed one. So come learn some new moves and stay to dance.

Take a break from the heat. Classes are taught on our shaded dance floor. We’ll also be serving delicious refreshments.

Groove On!
print_description: We’re teaching a 3 day progressive salsa workshop on the Playa. No partner is needed and all levels are welcome.

title: Burn Sleeve Mania
description: The Man Burn would be perfect if only you were rockin' a stellar tat sleeve.  We can make that happen with our rubber stamp tattoos.  Really.

description: Stay 'til Tuesday! We follow the yellow Joyism art car to the man platform, reminisce, eat 'smores, dance to '90s music, and use up our booze.
print_description: Stay 'til Tuesday! We follow the yellow Joyism art car to the man platform, reminisce, eat 'smores, dance to '90s music, and sue up our booze.

title: Busty Bacon Brigade & Bacon Bloody Marys
description: Are you achin for some bacon? Well get a gussied up in your finest pork belly attire & join us for the greasiest dust crawl of them all! Meet up at 9am and start Sizzling off to the Man at 10am.  Bacony Gifting encouraged!!
print_description: Achin for some bacon? Get dressed in your best bacon attire and join us for a dust crawl. From Dusty Bumm to The Man. Bacony gifting encouraged.

description: Bring your guitar and your favorite camp songs.  Want to lead a song? Great! Don't want to lead a song?  Great! Limited number of camp song books available.

title: Butoh Ritual Workshop
description: Butoh, improv, physical theater, and ritual allow dancers to foster deeper connections with themselves and community. All welcome, limited space.

title: Butt-Cheeky Run
description:
Come get your burn started – with the sun's soft caresses on your butt cheeks!
The Ancient Greeks always trained and competed naked – in fact the ’gym’ comes from the word ‘gymnos’, meaning ‘naked’ in Greek. Come experience the amazing freedom of running and jumping and exercising free of clothing! Or at least come and see what a great spectator sport it is :) We'll do a warm-up at the camp and then run wild in the 'hood!
print_description: Start your Burning Man experience with an eye-opener: unleash your inner beast and run free! Naked!

title: Butterfly Wing-Making Workshop
description: Celebrate the beauty of migration by making your own Monarch Butterfly Wings to wear on the playa. Collaborate with artist/activist Favianna Rodriguez in designing a wearable statement that you support immigration reform.
print_description: Celebrate the beauty of migration by making your own Monarch Butterfly Wings to wear on the playa with artist/activist Favianna Rodriguez.

title: Button Down Da Hatch!
description: Kick off your week with a DIY button to commemorate the Carnival of Mirrors, or whatever you want. Create a unique button for yourself and a friend. We've got a prolific Badge-making machine for the magic to accommodate our materials, and you can add a photo or trinket for an extra special souvenir! Our able machinist will convert your creativity into a lasting memento for only you. Then pin your own, unique shwag on whomever. Light refreshments and other stuff are on us. Bring a cup!
print_description: Create a unique button for yourself and a friend. Materials provided, but you can bring a photo or memento for an extra special souvenir!

title: Button UP!
description:
Button for You, Button for Me, Button for the Playa Bunny!
To make your very own pin-on Burn Button, bring your button-making talent & a drink cup!
Button Experts, Button Machine and Art Stuff supplied ad libitum.
Let your Button enhance the entire Playa!
print_description:
Button 4 You, Button 4 Me!
Bring your talent & drink cup! Button Experts, Machine & Art Stuff ad libitum.
Let your Button enhance the entire Playa!

title: BYO Couch Party
description: Love to party, hate to stand up.  Let's have a dance party without getting off the couch.  BYO Couch.  Easy chairs also welcome.

title: BYOUke
description: Come by with your Ukulele and share in some music and laughter at our BYOUke Workshop.  Learn a thing or two...or three about rhythm, harmony, and melody on this wonderful little instrument!
print_description: Come by with your Ukulele and share in some music and laughter at our BYOUke Workshop.  Learn a thing or 2...or 3 on this wonderful little instrument.

title: Cabernet Cabaret!
description: A Cabernet Cabaret! Come join us for this live musical showcase at sunset, where various acts of live music, burlesque, theater, & more will be presented. And want you! And your friends! And your little dog too! Bring a cup for some cabernet! Musicians, clowns, jugglers, contortionists, dancers, magicians, burlesquers... whatever your talent or joy! Or send your friends in our direction! Let's put together an ALIVE, energetic, sexy, silly show! If you can do something entertaining for 15 minutes or more, WE WANT YOU!
print_description: Come join us for this live musical showcase at sunset, where various acts of music, burlesque, & theater will be presented. Bring a cup for cabernet!

title: CaesarBar @ LiL'CrackWhore Camp
description:
That's right! You heard it correctly; head to the Lil Crack Whores at 7:30 and B for your chance to get your 
v e r y o w n B l o o d y C a e s a r, 
compliments of the powers that be.

Best chances are during the great Hang Over hours of 12pm to 2pm but that's a definite playa time range.

Stick around and sample some puckered lips at the kissing booth or play a game of giant-Jenga!

oooooo ¡ Looking forward to seeing you all there ! xxxxxx

DON'T forget to also check out the Whore Happy Hour on Wednesday September 2nd, between 4 and 6!

https://www.facebook.com/events/1458470364477040/
---------------

Disclaimer:
Twenty one and over; please bring your own cup, please advise us of any allergies to seafood or shellfish or mollusks of any kind.
print_description: Head over to CrackWhore Camp for the great Bloody Caesar hangover cure!

title: Café Sŭrprïsé Dinner Service
description:
Bonjour mes amis! Dine with us in our fine French Bistro. Let our glowing chandiliers and soft french music soothe your dubstep-addled soul as our waiters cater to your every whim. Perhaps you will try the escargot, non? 
Reservations can be made with our maître d' on playa and are recommended but not required.
print_description: Bonjour mes ami! Dine with us in our fine French Bistro. Reservations can be made with our maître d' on playa and are recommended but not required.

title: Café Sŭrprïsé French Fries
description: Perhaps you need a little something this afternoon, yes?  French fries, or as we like to call them Pomme Frites. 30 pounds made fresh, daily. Get them while they're hot.
print_description: Perhaps you need a little something salty this afternoon, yes?   French fries, or as we like to call them Pomme Frites. 30 pounds made fresh daily.

title: Calibrator College
description:
At the Wheel of Self Reflection, we will have Carny Calibrator College from 1 to 5 on Monday, leading up to the parade and party that night.

This is where we will share our riffs and steal from yours on the finer points of calibration.  It's open to all aspiring calibrators.  We have some notion of a cosmology boot camp at the same time in our chill space.  This is secret shit, so there will be gauzy curtains.  It's like OCS.  Not OCD, OCS (officer candidate school).  The coursework involves fortune writing, rolling and taping, then the bag toss that holds what is in effect the protoplasm that feeds the Wheel its raw material.  We capture these from the temporal ether space, the memes of the day.
print_description: At the Wheel of Self Reflection, we will have Carny Calibrator College from 1 to 5 on Monday, leading up to the parade and party that night.

title: Calming Touch for the non-verbal
description: Is there a person in you life who has difficulty communicating what they like and don't like about touch?  Then this workshop is for you.  Learn how to create a somatically based experience that lead to calm, peace, love that don't require a lot of verbal interaction.
print_description: Is there a person in you life who has difficulty communicating what they like and don't like about touch?  Then this workshop is for you.

title: Calm Inside
description: Wake up with a blissful dose of Live Music...yawn and stretch, breathe, meditate, set the course for your wonderfully, adventurous day. Calm Inside is designed to let you center your day, before all the hub bub and commotion...thumps thumps and sirens...the inescapable thrills of mayhem and delight. The Live Music will be of a more ambient, soul-filling, relaxation...happiness genre....so come and be at peace!!! After Calm Inside, enjoy our very popular Live Music Yoga in the Morning…where music meets the pose! On Wednesday and Friday, a portion of Calm Inside will include guided meditation.
print_description: Meditate, yawn, stretch, and breathe to Live Music...set the course for your wonderful, adventurous day. Stay for the yoga class after...

title: CamelKnuckleToe Party
description: Celebrate those inevitable wardrobe moments in style. All humps welcome.
print_description: Celebrate those inevitable wardrobe moments in style. All humps welcome.

title: Camp Awesomeness - Authentic Relating Games
description: Fun, highly-interactive exercises that explore new ways of seeing, connecting and appreciating each other on a deeper level. Expect fun, play, provocation, with just enough tension to make things more than interesting.
print_description: Fun, highly-interactive exercises that explore new ways of seeing, connecting and appreciating each other on a deeper level.

title: Camp Awesomeness - Clothing Optional Twister
description: Join us for some Twister Madness.  There will be good beats, some surprises and a whole lot of fun! Clothing is optional.
print_description: Join us for some Twister Madness.  There will be good beats, some surprises and a whole lot of fun! Clothing is optional.

title: Camp Awesomeness - EVO Room Experience
description:
THE EVO ROOM is a portal taking you to the lifestyle you truly desire.  It is a fun way to practice personal growth and EVOLVE WITH FLAVOR. 

Once you step into THE EVOROOM, you are taken on a fun, transformative, and integrative journey to unleash your powerful potential and the unlimited possibilities awaiting you.

At the event, our featured guest speakers and lifestyle designers will share valuable tools and information to inspire growth in the areas of NUTRITION, PHYSICAL WELL-BEING, EMOTIONAL WELL-BEING, RELATIONSHIPS, and MONEY.

We've hacked the personal growth experience to accelerate the transformation process and made it more effective by making it easier to apply what you learn.
print_description: THE EVO ROOM is a portal taking you to the lifestyle you truly desire.  It is a fun way to practice personal growth and EVOLVE WITH FLAVOR.

title: Camp Awesomeness - Healing & Forgiveness Workshop
description: Self Love and Healing shared in a space of exploration. We'll redefine what Forgiveness is and create some major energy shifts together.
print_description: Self Love and Healing shared in a space of exploration. We'll redefine what Forgiveness is and create some major energy shifts together.

title: Camp Awesomeness - Kizomba Lessons
description: Join World Champion 'E' in learning the basics to this fast-becoming popular dance from Angola & Cape Verde called Kizomba. Kizomba is more like Tango mixed with other Latin dances like Salsa and Bachata. Whether you're a couple or alone, there's always room for everyone to learn the basics and show of some new moves in the playa or in the default world.
print_description: Join World Champion 'E' in learning the basics to this fast-becoming popular dance from Angola & Cape Verde called Kizomba.

title: Camp Awesomeness - Playa Workout
description: Bring gloves, two full water bottles and a canvas shopping bag w/handles. Our resident Ironman is going to make you sweat!
print_description: Bring gloves, two full water bottles and a canvas shopping bag w/handles. Our resident Ironman is going to make you sweat!

title: Camp Awesomeness - Silent Disco
description: A surreal party experience where 3 channels of awesome music is shared through wireless headphones. A crazy sight to behold and even crazier to partake in.
print_description: A surreal party experience where 3 channels of awesome music are shared through wireless headphones.

title: Camp Awesomeness - Spoken Word, Poetry & Song
description: Poetry/spoken word slam and original songwriting showcase - Open Mic- come on by to Camp Awesomeness and sign up- there will be a sign-up sheet 2 days prior, Theme; Personal Transformation- in verse or song – prose, story telling a la “The Moth” or slam; We wish to create a safe place and platform for sharing our creativity and inspiring each other!! Bring an instrument, bring your poetry, and bring yourself.

title: Camp Make-up
description: Camp Make-up: Are you fighting with your Bestie, BF, or GF? Or do you just want do be done up like a Diva or Drag Queen?  Come to the Freestyle Palace for Making up or a Make-over. Non-licensed mediators and Make-up Artists provided & invited. On-going. Check-in at the Freestyle Palace Bar.

title: Camp Questionmark's~Born Of The Desert~Experiences
description:
"An oasis in a dusty ocean of repetitive waves"
Come gather together and celebrate the true atmosphere of the desert. Celebrate the creativity born from the dust. Celebrate with music inspired by the playa that you can really (((feel))) 

Rather than recreating a default world 'nightclub', we summon a unique desert experience to stimulate the less mainstream dwellers of the dust )?( 

All Day / All Night - from TUES to BURN NIGHT (*with a special Surprise Party for Mama-M. on Burn Night) Come help us 'Surprise' her! 

Check at the camp on-playa for the most updated lineup of artists. *Also the Camp? website & alternate BM lineup outlets. 
Basically we like interesting beat patterned, well represented low end bass music. To accent & enhance the experience of celebrating together out in the desert. 

~ Enjoy something different ~ )?( ~ Keep Burning Man Weird ~
print_description: Gather @ Camp? Tues-Sat for a unique desert experience all day & all night."An oasis in a dusty ocean of repetitive waves" Keep Burning Man Weird )?(

description: Capoeira: Capoeira is an Afro-Brazilian art form that combines martial arts, music and dance. The workshop will explore some of the basic movements and how they fit together to create a dialogue between players.  Come play!

title: Captain Scurvy's Shanty Grog-along
description: Arrgh me boys!  Let the seafaring ballads of old (and our playa grog) take you away to the high seas!  Got a Shanty? Bring and sing a shanty!  We'll be whaling away the afternoon with traditional and playafied ballads, hauls, pilot songs, and Sea Porn.

title: Carnal Healing: The Circle of Sexuality
description: Come join Diva Nation for a night of Sexual Magic!  Cast aside your old hang-ups, self-doubts, and frustrations as we cast a circle to invoke and honor sexual deities from around the world and ask for their healing support both for ourselves and the world at large.  Our neo-pagan ceremony will take place in our interactive sacred art space called Sexual Babel which we welcome you to visit and be a part of at any time during the burn.  This is an opportunity to honor sexual deities and expressions of sexuality throughout history while increasing awareness of our personal relationships with sexuality for a hotter tomorrow.
print_description: Join Diva Nation for a night of Sexual Magic as we cast a circle to invoke and honor global sexual deities and ask for their healing and support.
