title: Carnival of Smoothies - The Gayborhood Party!
description:
Come to our very own queerborhood carnival of smoothies and escape all those boring straight parties! 

The whole queerborhood is invited for smoothies, dance, whirl the rabbit wheel of bar fortune for a magical beverage of your choice, sexy gender blender games, toss the monkey make-out, and all around queer love fest. Special shout out to Glam Cocks, Comfort & Joy, Beaverton, Fe Boy Collective, Astropups, Stella, Suspended Animation, PolyParadise, ShamanDome, Yes Please, all the camps that were at the Queer Burner Summit, and all you other fabulous queer camps - if we didn't mention you please show up so we can mention you next year. Our goal is to create the largest ever and most epic queerborhood event. So come and enjoy smoothies and tails! All genders welcome always. (and don't worry if your straight but not narrow you are welcome too...besides by the time you leave you probably will be bent - that's right we recruit!). We will have both alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages.

title: Cartoon Commune Green Reflections’ Eco Camp Tour
description:
Build up your eco-consciousness for Playa life. We’ll show you how we reuse, recycle, repurpose, and redesign. See our solar cooker, rocket stove cooker, solar power, evapotron, and much more. Consider the Playa’s ecosystem, and the gear and food that are right for a trip into this world.Be ready for your next vacation with Mother Nature.	Nothing seems more natural than spending time in nature, but it’s easy to forget eco-attitudes when away from concrete cities.
     We’ll discuss prepping for a trip, being alert to pack only what we need: e.g., first aid kit, weather-appropriate clothing/gear, water & food. We leave packaging at home to minimize trash on-Playa. If we can, we pre-buy local fruit, veggies, and nuts; pre-make dishes and seal them in lightweight reusable containers. Reuse these to avoid disposables. We seal our food well, store trash, compost and recycle our waste.
We’ll be happy to hear your own ideas and consider them for additions to our Playa eco-practices.
print_description: Join us to see the eco-components of our Camp. Add to your eco-consciousness. See solar power, rocket stove, evapotron, and repurposing.

title: Cartoon Commune’s Ninth Anniversary ’60s Dance
description: Our camp’s 9th Anniversary year rolls on as you join each other to enjoy those oldies but goodies, tunes from the 60’s, along with light refreshments and beyond. Bring your own cup to keep it so green, and enjoy your pleasure. Mix plenty of fun with a classic Cartoon Commune soiree of rock and roll dancing and good conversation as you meet new friends and old. A wide open dance contest just for the fun of it. We’ll have the music you like, light refreshments, and beyond. Guess what else? A few surprises to add plenty smiles.
print_description: Enjoy ’60s oldies but goodies rock & roll, lite refreshments and more. BYO cup. Mix plenty of fun with a classy dance soiree, and then some!

title: Cartoon Workshop
description: Cartooning is a powerful art-form that can entertain and influence, but is simple to learn and accessible to all.  Come learn from a professional cartoonist to practice this expressive and enjoyable skill.  All skill levels welcome; you do not need to have any prior training or experience.  Learn all the basic skills like character creation, layout, composition, perspective, and comedy writing.  Brush up on advanced techniques like human and animal figure drawing, proportion, and color.  We end with an improvisational art game using the cartooning skills we've learned.  Supplies provided, or bring your own.
print_description: Anyone can cartoon! Learn & practice an expressive, enjoyable skill. Any skill level welcome. Learn basic/advanced techniques of a powerful artform.

title: Castle Blocks
description:
Castle Blocks provides you the opportunity to design and build your own brick castle or other structure using many large cardboard blocks.

You can satisfy your architecture or construction interests by building structures that may be original, that represent real world architecture, or perhaps one that is as tall as you can engineer.

More importantly, you can then share the artist's childhood by spectacularly toppling your structure with your friends after it's determined complete, which is sometimes a matter of varied opinions ...

Awards will be named in several categories based on photos you submit of your work and its destruction.
print_description: Build imaginative structures using 200 "castle" blocks.  Share a thrill from the artist's childhood by knocking them down spectacularly!

title: Catching Out:  How to Hop Freight Trains
description: 35 year veteran railroad conductor and past boomer/hobo gives a tutorial on riding freight trains in the new millennium.  How to be safe on the rails, not get arrested, and enjoy a rugged adventure.   Hitchhiking sucks!   Freight trains don't go everywhere but they can get you far and fast toward your destination.  Having no destination is even better!   Learn what to carry with you, where to ride on a train, and how to keep a low profile.  Also learn how freight trains operate, where they stop, and how to find a 'friendly' railroad worker with whom to communicate.  Familiarize yourself with the 'Do's and Don'ts' of freight train hopping and discover the last shred of what real freedom means in America.
print_description: Hitchhiking sucks!   Riding a freight train can be adventurous, but dangerous.  Learn how to do it safely and get to where you want to go.

title: Chakraland Game!
description: Come play the adult version of Candyland...called Chakraland! The Chakraland game is a 22×30 foot vinyl flooring of a multicolored human sized game that participants play by rolling the giant dice and moving towards the different colored squares, each square representing a different chakra. The layout is similar to the child’s game “Candyland”. The squares will all have different quests written on them that need to be completed in a certain timeframe, or players have to go back to the previous square of the same color. There are some short cuts, wild pink squares, and black lose-a-turn squares. The winner makes it to the end of the colored path and gets loved up by the colorful game jesters. Yay, so much fun!
print_description: Come play the adult version of Candyland called Chakraland! The winner gets a prize and gets loved up by the colorful game jesters. Yay, so much fun!

title: Chanting of the Lotus Sutra: Nam Myoho Renge Kyo
description: Join us in the Lotus Dome for the daily recitation of Nam Myoho Renge Kyo and morning gongyo (the practice of chanting two chapters from the Lotus Sutra). In the Lotus Sutra, Shakymuni Buddha revealed that every human being can attain enlightenment in their present form. Through chanting Nam Myoho Renge Kyo, an individual is able to awaken this enlightenment the Buddha revealed and reveal their own Buddha nature. A practitioner of this Buddhism, through chanting and study, can transform their life and create a state of unshakable happiness, overcoming the sufferings of birth and death. Buddhism is a practice and everyone is welcome to join. Each day after chanting, together we will study a Buddhist concept, answer questions, and share experiences about the practice and its application to our daily life. All are welcome to join us. Novices, new practitioners, and curious souls welcome.
print_description: Join us in the Lotus Dome to chant the Lotus Sutra. Chant, meditate, reflect, and reveal your inner Buddha. Novices and curious souls welcome!

title: Chanting the Gayatri Mantra - 108 Repetitions
description: The Gayatri Mantra is one of the oldest known mantras in human history. It was forbidden to women for a long time. It is said that chanting the Gayatri Mantra purifies the chanter and purifies the listener, it removes all obstacles in our path to increase wisdom, happiness and spiritual growth. Come and chant with us this mantra for 108 repetitions. Why 108? It has been said that the number 108 has been a sacred number in the yoga world. We believe by chanting this mantra during Burning Man, you will find what you are looking for!
print_description: It is said that chanting the Gayatri Mantra purifies the chanter and purifies the listener. It removes all obstacles in our path to happiness & growth

description: "A refined palate is a certain path to disappointment" - H. E. Homes, 1862. Come to camp L Melon O P to test your cheap beer taste test skills! No microbrews or complex cask-conditioned ales here. Only the cheapest of beers for your tasting - and drinking - pleasure.

title: Childhood Abuse & Healing Circle
description:
There is a lot of hidden abuse in our country and only a few outlets that offer a safe environment and tools for healing. 
OmHuSaaRa went through a lot of abuse as a kid, both physically, verbally and sexually. He was able to find ways to overcome and heal  his trauma and the resulting PTSD. In this workshop, you will learn tools that help one overcome trauma or at least introduce one to the possibility of healing these wounds. 
 
Let's face abuse together and heal together as one. 
One person at a time.
print_description: A discussion and exercises for people to discuss past abuses: physical, emotional, and sexual. Held in the Chakralicious Temple Dome.

title: Chill Spot
description: Stop by our sacred Chill Spot! ShangriLa is known as an imaginary remote paradise on earth, utopia so to speak. Also known as a distant and secluded hideaway, usually of great beauty and peacefulness. Our group is very much looking forward to create an ambiance and space where people from all over the world can spend the entire day hanging out.  A “ShangriLa,” by extension, is an ideal refuge from the troubles of the world...also known as Burning Man / Home :-)
print_description: Stop by our sacred Chill Spot! Our group is creating a space where people from all over the world can spend the entire day hanging out!

title: CHOCOLATE MARTINI BLUEGRASS PARTY
description: Chocolate Martini Party! Delicious chocolate martinis while they last, with live music performance by Blackrock Bluegrass from 9 to 10pm.
print_description: Chocolate Martini Party! Delicious chocolate martinis while they last, with live music performance by Blackrock Bluegrass from 9 to 10pm.

title: Chocolate Tasting Party
description: Come sample some fine chocolate and bring yours to share. Event is held in the bar area.
print_description: Come sample some fine chocolate and bring yours to share. Event is held in the bar area.

title: Chris Hadfield Moustache Appreciation
description: Canadian astronaut superstar Chris Hadfield is beloved by his nation and revered by moustache-growers. Come and admire him up close and personal.
print_description: Canadian astronaut superstar Chris Hadfield is beloved by his nation and revered by moustache-growers. Come and admire him up close and personal.

title: Chris & Teegan's Playa Wedding
description:
Chris and Teegan met at the 2013 burn and in May this year they tied the knot officially. You may have heard the story of their wedding rings made from nails dug out of the man burn ashes. 

They're going to be swapping burner inspired vows on Monday night and YOU'RE INVITED! 

Come celebrate the magic of the playa that brought these two lovebirds together and get the week started on a celebratory note. The newlyweds would love to hear your stories of playa joy and share a glass of bubbly with you. Following the ceremony there will be a procession to the open playa for a fire spin jam.
print_description: Come help Chris & Teegan celebrate their love for each other and the playa. There will be flow arts, dancing, drinking and maybe even cake...

title: Christmas Caroling, Burning Man Edition
description:
Does your love for Christmas tunes extend far beyond the holiday season?  Come in your holiday best and get ready to dispense some Christmas Cheer to the neighborhood! 

Instrumentalists and people who can actually sing are welcome, though the organizer is neither.  All are welcome!

(If you're wondering why this is being hosted by Time Colony--well, Santa was definitely a time traveller to have reached all those houses in time. Santas from all times welcome, even you, A**less Chaps Santa!)
print_description: <3 Xmas 4rlz? Spread some holiday cheer and candy canes with Santa, world time traveller! Instrumentalists, singers, & Santas of all levels welcome!

title: Cigar Appreciation Cabaret Lounge
description:
Freud said, “Sometimes a cigar is just a cigar”. 

Your host HolyMan says, “Sometimes a cigar is an entryway into an underground culture filled smokin’ men and women!” 
Join host HolyMan for a cool cock-tale and a hot cigar. He will show you how to choose, cut, light and smoke a stogie. Beware, just like Burning Man, your life may never be the same afterwards!
print_description: Join host HolyMan for a cool cock-tale and a hot cigar.  Learn to choose, cut, light and smoke a stogie.

title: Cinematic Automatic-Recall Wall
description: From the campy to the badass, the riské to the lame, these are not your every-day "Here's looking at you kid" quotes. This is a delicate collective, from carefully selected, films done in the past 30-or-so years. A flick-o-phile you call yourself! Ha! We’ll see, young child. See if your brain remembers ‘that quote from that one movie, remember?? I haven’t seen it in a while.’ These are films that have grown in cult-like fashion, among people who enjoy their cinematic art with passion. Complete as many as you want, it’ll be there all day. Through the night, and the week, pass through or come stay!
print_description: You a movie buff? Test your skills and guess the film on this MASSIVE wall featuring some of the most iconic quotes from the past 30 years of cinema.

title: Circle of Men at SSV w/ Jim Rennie (Curious Being)
description: Intro to the work of the ManKind Project. Stand in your power and be the man you have always wanted to be. What stands in your way?
print_description: Intro to the work of the ManKind Project. Stand in your power and be the man you have always wanted to be. What stands in your way?

title: Circle of Men: From Boyhood to Adulthood
description: Join a Circle of Men and explore new ways of being present. Find and acknowledge the Little Boy to unleash the Wild Man within.
print_description: Join a Circle of Men & explore new ways of being present.Find & acknowledge the Little Boy to unleash the Wild Man within.Men only in the Temple Dome.

title: Circling
description: Circling is an organic, in-the-moment interpersonal process that's equal parts art form, meditation, and group conversation - all designed to allow a visceral experience of connection and understanding of another person's world, celebrating who and where they are right now. It's practicing using our genuine curiosity to better understand and become a connoisseur of another person's world through present moment awareness while breaking through the assumptions and projections we have about each other. Different than sitting on a meditation cushion by yourself, Circling is a relational practice. And though it works exquisitely in intimate relationships of all kinds, it can be applied in ALL areas of life because it's so organic, non-analytical, effective, and fun.
print_description: Use your genuine curiosity to better understand and become a connoisseur of another person's world through present moment awareness.

title: Circling

It’s practicing using our genuine curiosity to better understand and become a connoisseur of another person’s world though present moment awareness while breaking through the assumptions and projections we have about each other.
print_description: An in the moment interpersonal process designed to allow a visceral experience of connection and understanding of another person's world.

title: Circuscape
description: Circuscape is an interactive circus of the senses. Come lose yourself in one or all of our activities. In Mindscape, you'll participate in sensory illusions that will make you doubt what is real. In Moonscape, you'll be transported onto an alien world as you traverse our low-gravity obstacle course. In Spiritscape, you'll take inventory of your soul's baggage lighten your emotional load.
print_description: Circuscape is an interactive circus of the senses. Come lose yourself in our mind bending, body stretching, emotion unburdening activities!

title: Circus Church
description: Come to Circus Church and repent for last week's sins! Circus performances! Burlesque! Games and questionable prizes! Confess your sins on stage!
print_description: Come to Circus Church and repent for last week's sins! Circus performances! Burlesque! Games and questionable prizes! Confess your sins on stage!

title: Circus Inversions
description: Learn how to do circus style handstands and headstands. We will also incorporate techniques from yoga, breakdancing, and contortion. Prerequisites: must have good upper body strength, must be well-hydrated, and must be sober!
print_description: Learn how to do circus style handstands and headstands. Pre-requisites: must have good upper body strength, must be well hydrated, and must be sober!

print_description: Wear your fanciest garb & enjoy playing fun carnival games while gorging on our tasty funnel cakes and gulping down our signature carny-themed drinks.

title: Cirque Surreal Carnival Party
description: Come get your Freak On at Black Rock Boutique's Cirque Surreal Carnival party from 12-4 with fabulous clothing in stripes, polka-dots and jewel toned then Strut your stuff on our runway.
print_description: Get your Freak On at Black Rock Boutique's Cirque Surreal Carnival party with Stripes, Polka dots and jeweled toned clothing.

title: Clarity and Consent
description: "Clarity and Consent" is about clearly stating desires and boundaries, how to arrive at consent, and how to handle problems with consent.
print_description: "Clarity and Consent" is about clearly stating desires and boundaries, how to arrive at consent, and how to handle problems with consent.

title: Clashing With Cash
description:
Money Shadows: Creating Abundance by Dancing with The Unconscious.
 
The Playa is a magical place where the gifting economy reigns. Yet, some of us spend big bucks preparing and getting to Black Rock City. So, even here money talks even if we pretend not to listen.
 
Still some of us struggle off the Playa with not  having enough,  wrestle with “it is never enough” or believe financial issues are too taboo to explore out loud, 
 
Perhaps for the first time, we will really listen to the voices we hear in our heads or the ones we don’t even know exist which block us from creating abundance and banishing scarcity.
 
So, in a safe and supportive environment come sing with your shadows, dance with the almighty dollar  and wake up to where you are financially   so you can return to your life away from Burning Man ready to make money your ally and not your enemy.
print_description: Come ready to make money your ally and not your enemy. Move towards creating abundance while banishing scarcity. Cash Not Provided.

title: Classical Journey w/Thomas Harter @ RhythmWave
description: Midday, moving, in-bodied meditation. Let the music of ancient masters pick up our bodies however they may be... lazy, ecstatic, curious, sizzling with the midday heat or wafting on the wind. Melding the sounds of the classics with the rhythm of the playa and the energy of our bodies, as all move through the Wave. Please join Thomas Harter for this Classical Dance Journey at RhythmWave.
print_description: Melding the sounds of the classics with the rhythm of the playa and the energy of our bodies, as all move through the RhythmWave.

title: Classical Music Hour
description: Ears need a rest? Are you craving some Bach? Handel? Mozart? Rachmaninoff?  Us too!    Come relax and enjoy some great tunes.  Or symphonies as the case may be.
print_description: Ears need a rest? Are you craving some Bach? Handel? Mozart? Rachmaninoff?  Us too!  Come enjoy these musical masters!  Tea and cookies provided.

title: Classy as Ever!
description: Flap around, shake your tail feathers, slip a flask in your garters, and get ready to scoff at prohibition.  Gatsby aint got nothin on this 1920's dance party!
print_description: Flap around, shake your tail feathers, slip a flask in your garters, and get ready to scoff at prohibition.  Gatsby ain't got nothin on us!

title: clearing chakras workshop
description: Your body and mind will experience a cleansing clearing of charka blockages causing an awakening of the seven chakras cause a transformation of consciousness in the body. When a chakra awakens it spins or turns, and the sensation can be felt in the body.
print_description: Your body and mind will experience a cleansing clearing of charka blockages causing an awakening of the seven chakras cause a transformation.

title: Clit-tails: Lesbian/Queer Mixer
description: Come to Camp Beaverton and meet the Beaver babes! Enjoy some delicious Clit-tails, make new friends, and possibly find a date before the Strap-on-a-Thon play party on Wednesday night. Open to all!
print_description: Meet the Beaver babes! Enjoy some delicious Clit-tails, make new friends, and possibly find a date for the Strap-on-a-Thon. Open to all!

title: Clit-talks
description: Beavers make a special guest appearance at Comfort and Joy's "Cocktalks" series, facilitating a discussion on misogyny and exclusion within the gay community and how we can become a more unified community.
print_description: Beavers make a special appearance at Comfort and Joy's "Cocktalks" series, facilitating a discussion on misogyny & exclusion within the gay community.

title: Clit Talks Hosted by Camp Beaverton
description: Misogyny is rampant in the queer male culture and we have become a self-segregated community. As the only Lesbian-focused theme camp on playa, Beaverton will offer an important perspective as we start the discussion on unifying the queer community.
print_description: Discussion on misogyny - it is rampant in the queer male culture and we have become a self-segregated community.

title: Closing Blessing w/Feather & Visudha @ RhythmWave
description: Please join RhythmWave as we cleanse the bamboo and ourselves, and say farewell to another amazing year in Black Rock City.
print_description: Please join RhythmWave as we cleanse the bamboo and ourselves, and say farewell to another amazing year in Black Rock City.

title: Clothing-Optional Qi Gong With Nogoodnik!
description:
QI: The life energy that flows through and permeates all things, according to Ancient Eastern Medicine (AEM).  Their version of The Force, essentially.  According to AEM, slow or weak qi is the reason we feel weak.  Stagnant qi is the reason we feel PAIN.

GONG: A lifelong process for improving, enhancing and perfecting something.

QI GONG: A lifelong process for improving, enhancing and perfecting your qi.

CLOTHING OPTIONAL: If you don't know what this means, I won't be the one to tell you.

AEM teaches us that sweat is chi leaving the body, so if there's anywhere you need this, it's on the playa.  Come build that nourishing life energy every morning after breakfast with your favorite Seattle burner!

(This event is DAILY from Tuesday to Sunday, from 10:30 am to 11 am.)

DISCLAIMER: I am not, and don't claim to be, any sort of qi gong master.  I'm just someone who knows a thing or two about it and would like to share it with the playa.
print_description: Move.  Stretch.  Stimulate pressure points.  These easy, super-low-impact techniques from Ancient Eastern Medicine will help keep you strong all week!

title: Clown Orgy Bar Takeover!
description: The Clowns take over Sunset Lounge and Bar. Clowns, Clowns and more Clowns, come all Clowns and join us for drinks. Bring your nose, rubber chickens and get ready to get cream pied!
print_description: The Clowns take over Sunset Lounge and Bar. Clowns, Clowns and more Clowns, come all Clowns and join us for drinks. Get ready to be cream pied!

title: Clown Trauma Support Group
description:
It has happened to us all.  You're having a great time, easy and happy, dancing through the weeds of your own small life, and suddenly -- a clown.  He's trying to be funny at you.  He's a burlesque.  Or a Bozo.  Or a body comedian.  You can't punch him because that would be wrong.  You can't cry because you're terrified.  And you can't laugh because the life has been sucked out of you.  So you push it down, deep inside.  Where the clown trauma festers in its own silent and pressurized tank of suppressed rage and fear.

These incidents have been seen with increasing frequency as clowning has infiltrated our community.  Clowns are easy.  Clowns are anonymous.  Clowns are everywhere.  And clowns are dangerous.  They are the death knell of participation culture, just as the deadbeats were the death knell of hippie culture.  They embody the cheap, the quick, and the easy, and they should not be allowed to take over.

Come to our shaded bar and snack on our snacks with us.  Learn the story of clowns, past, present, and future.  Drink your health in a clown-free zone.  Crush the red nose of clown oppression.  And embed a new mantra into your soul: 

I will never be clowned again.
print_description: Clowns are anonymous. Clowns are everywhere. Clowns are dangerous. Drink your health in a clown-free zone. Crush the red nose. Shaded bar & snacks.

title: Clues to the Cleu
description: In this Carnival of Mirrors, it is easy to get lost in all the swirling colors and lovely distractions of all kinds. The Cleu pendant is a prize you won't want to miss, and the Cleu brainwashing is an ecstatic experience that is both relaxing and exhilarating.  To find CleuCamp, you may want to first visit the "Include the Cleu" labyrinth on the playa where you can walk the circles of the Universe, Earth, Life, and Consciousness. Look inside the magic box for a clue to our address. You may also want to find the "Clue to the Cleu" waystation kiosk in the theme camp area, another way to follow clues to our location. If you've never been to CleuCamp, you'll be glad you made the journey. Time to get dusty, playa pilgrims! Got a clue? We'll be waiting for you.
print_description: Visit CleuCamp for a Cleu pendant & brainwashing too! For more clues, visit  "Include the Cleu" labyrinth or find "Clue to the Cleu" waystation kiosk.

title: Cocksucker Certification!
description: Come get certified as a cocksucker by engaging the three phallus of our super heroes!  Do them all and become an official Card Carrying Cocksucker!  21 and older only!
print_description:
Engage the phallus of our three super heroes, swallow the product thereof, and become a Card Carrying Cocksucker!
21 and older only!

title: CockTalks: Putting action to the default world
description: Hosted by GlamCocks. We will close our series with panel discussion on how to put the concepts we covered to use. Including how to be a responsible member of the community with practical harm-reduction and talking points, and building a unified queer community.
print_description: Discussion on how to be a responsible with practical harm-reduction and building a unified queer community. Hosted by GlamCocks

title: Cocktalks with Dr. Cox Hosted by GlamCocks
description: LGBT Health Specialist, Dr. Ben Cox and queer mental health clinician, Colin Troost, MFT will facilitate a discussion on physical and mental health topics important to the queer male community. With a special focus on HIV prevention and PrEP and well as shaming within our community.
print_description: Discussion on physical and mental health topics important to the queer male community with a focus on HIV prevention and PrEP and well as shaming.

title: Coconut Milk Ice Cream Soiree
description: As the sun scorches, servants of Pink Heart gift you cold coconut ice cream bliss. Delicately lick your frozen desires into disappearance or reality while relaxing in the shade on our pink fuzzy couches.
print_description: As the sun scorches servants of Pink Heart gift you cold coconut ice cream bliss. Delicately lick your frozen desires into disappearance or reality.

title: Cocoona Matata: Guided movement ritual
description: The Cocoon is sheer, stretchy enclosure made of colorful spandex and a zipper. From the outside, the Cocoon embodies architecture as a live, morphing sculpture, based on the forces of the body. From the inside, the Cocoon is a blank slate, out of which you have the freedom to create and stylize your experience. In order to go through great transformations, we must let our out-of-date stories die so a new paradigm can be born. In this workshop we will re-enact that experience of death and re-birth, emerging through a "birth canal" with the support and assistance of the group to guide us towards a transformed self.
print_description: Re-wire for more positivity! Using props to fortify the body-mind-spirit flow, shed your old skin and see a worry-free butterfly emerge

title: Cocoon Workshop
description: The Cocoon is performed architecture. Inside the Cocoon we physically create the space and structure with our bodies. Chanting, dancing and other ritualistic strategies will generate a massive collective energy. No experience necessary!  For the generally creative and outgoing. It manifests a collective spirit as we create a sacred space for transformation and rebirth. Inspiration, identity and rebirth take morphing, sculptural form. The Cocoon is a hand-crafted stretchy fabric enclosure created by Sherry Aliberti, an architect and performance artist based in New York City. Structurally, these postures represent a scale model of an architecture and materiality based on the forces of the body. The Cocoon Project is a multi-disciplinary collaborative performing the Cocoon with movers, live projected visuals and soundscape. The performed-installation conveys a primordial one-ness of many bodies within the sheer membrane. CocoonNYC performs site-specifically in galleries, music venues and alternative spaces. The Cocoon experience can be emotionally powerful for every age and/or background.
print_description: get inside, emerge rejuvenated! Cocoon is an architecture life-form. Experience energetic freedom of movement expression, transformation and rebirth

title: Coffee and Cookies
description: Come get a mid afternoon pick-me-up.  Nothing like sugar and caffeine to cut all the booze or god knows what you have been consuming.
print_description: Come get a mid afternoon pick-me-up.  Nothing like sugar and caffeine to cut all the booze or god knows what you have been consuming.

title: Coffee Service

description: Tired from all the building and camp prep? Come enjoy cold beer and lawn games hosted by Camp ZaZen and the Pink Bunny art car. Take a break from the electronica, enjoy our Soul Atomic Sunset Dance party and some old fashion Americana. The Pink Bunny art car will be leaving ZaZen at 4:30 and headed to 1:00 and Deep playa for a 5:00 pm start.

title: Cold Brew (Coffee) in the morning!
description:
Cold brew coffee refers to the process of steeping coffee grounds in room temperature or cold water for an extended period. 
End results. Delicious coffee with a high level of caffeine. gNarnia will be serving our own cold brew coffee every morning, Monday through Sunday from as soon as we get ice(9ish) to noon. We will provide ice, sugar and a variety of creamers(vegan friendly), you bring your cup and a conversation! Let's get our gNar on.
print_description: COFFEE! Get your gNar back in the morning with a cup of cold brew coffee. We serve from as soon as we get ice(9am ish)-noon, Monday through Sunday!

title: College Football Tailgate & Viewing Party
description:
We'll begin the day by watching the end of the early games. Here is the lineup for the rest of the day:
12:30 BYU at Nebraska
12:30 Virginia at UCLA
12:30 Louisville vs Auburn
4:00 Arizona vs Texas A&M
4:30 Texas at Notre Dame 
5:00 Wisconsin vs Alabama

Note that we've moved the Michigan Wolverines at Utah Utes game to Thursday night at 5:30 pm in coordination with the rest of our camp events. Not all college athletic departments were as cooperative! If you have a request for a particular college game, the management of the Harmonic Cafe will try to accommodate :-)

Bring some food and drinks to share :-)

title: Communication mastery: from bedrooms to boardrooms
description: Communication is at the foundation of every interaction we have.  Come learn some of the most valuable tools you'll ever encounter – tools that work in any environment, with people of any age, to generate outstanding connection and rapport.  We'll explore active listening and positive intent, and learn a unique form of mirroring that naturally lifts any conversation – and has a remarkable impact on the voices in your head.

title: Conscious Burlesque Performance: Let's Play Doctor
description:
Let's Play Doctor: Join Madame Merci and camp Emerge-n-See Sparkle Pony Corral in an exploration of body, shadow, connection, and more through the art of Conscious Burlesque. 

Madame Merci, founder of Conscious Burlesque, will be MC for this special Let's Play Doctor themed burlesque show.  

Come dressed to impress and ready to play, hoot holler, and enjoy!  The Let's Play Dr. will be full of naughty nurses and doctors ready to resuscitate if necessary.   
Naughty nurse and Dr. attire is encouraged.

title: Conscious Burlesque Workshop: Let's Play Doctor
description:
Are you interested in exploring burlesque? Are you ready to just explore a new edge?  Come create an original burlesque dance with Madame Merci!

Join camp Emerge-n-See Sparkle Pony Corral in an exploration of body, shadow, connection, and more through the art of Conscious Burlesque. This workshop will be offered by Madame Merci, founder of Conscious Burlesque, she will guide you in creating an original burlesque dance- solo or duets (with a dance buddies and lovers) are welcome. The dances will be "Let's Play Dr." themed to go along with our ICU camp theme! Naughty nurse and Dr. attire is encouraged. 

You will have an opportunity to perform your original dance piece the day after the workshop at a "Let's Play Dr." burlesque show to be held at 7:00pm Friday (the following day) at the Emerge-n-See Sparkle Pony Corral Camp!

You will explore: 

Uncovering your secret fantasies
Birth your alter ego via your burlesque burlesque character
Learn & create original choreography, playing with humor, sass and the heart of seduction.
Learn the art of performance (for you/ and or another).

BONUS: Do’s and Don’ts video of costumes, avoid costume disasters and mishaps
BONUS: How to own your audience
BONUS: Character Development Visualization
BONUS: How to remove special clothing like a pro
print_description: Are you interested in exploring burlesque?

title: Sensual Sunset Partner Yoga
description:
I believe that loving relationships and friendships need constant nurturing, and loving attention.
This fun and playful Sensual Sunset Yoga class combines intimacy, connection and exercise and is so a perfect date for a Friday evening at Burningman.
Partner meditation, visualization and eye gazing will guide you to a place of complete awareness and presence. Powerful breath work, sensual opening poses and fun creative partner poses help to raise your sexual energy, build trust, teach us how to surrender and enhance our communication skills. 
There is no previous Yoga experience needed... Just an open heart and the willingness to connect with your friend or partner. Join me to this fun and sexy class!
Bring your friend or partner or join us alone and we’ll match you up!
print_description: Sensual Sunset Partner Yoga

title: Contradancing to live music
description: Contradancing all levels to live music - looped/ traditional/ celtic/ fusion/ techno; fast-paced yet easy to learn with a caller who instructs (but with room for dancers to improvise). Half the moves are with your partner, half with everyone else, resulting in a tribal vibe, where the Zen is flow, synchrony, and bonding (not footwork, not competition). If you are smiling, you are doing it right.  Kid friendly.  Possible for many disabled.  No need to bring your own partner. Everyone who shows up should have a good time.
print_description: Contradancing to live celtic/diverse music.  Lessons before each dance, inclusive& easy!  Vibe is flow, synchrony, tribal bonding.No specific footwork

title: Contraptionists Afternoon Snowcones.
description:
Join us in the shade, From 1 until 3, Mon through Sat, for an Afternoon SnowCone Party at the Contraptionists Shade tents. Ride the IceCycle and make a blizzard of snow for all to enjoy while you await the frozen treat of Our choice.

 Kids to the front of the line, and Overly heated Kids may check for a Cooldown Cone if we have the Ice for them and chill in the shade during any overly heated hours and.
Children are always invited to the front of the line to cool quickly.

Guests who wish to power our human powered shaving bike may do so, so we may split the crystallized H2O into a fine feathery powder of flakes ready to fully accept the flavors of Our choice, and encapsulate them into the jewel colored crystals that are so desired by the weary travelers visiting our humble establishment and we know you will enjoy.

Come chill in our shade and check out the art and events schedule for more Contraptionists talks and activities.
print_description:
Join us in the shade, 1 to 3 Mon - Sat for an Afternoon SnowCone Party!
Ride an IceCycle and make a blizzard of snow for all. Kids front of the line.

title: Cop Day
description: Have you or your friends been naughty? Bring them by to be arrested and locked up in jail. Or, join our cop force, and help us find misbehaving burners. Our jail is open all day everyday, so bring your misbehaving friends by for the full locked up experience. Thursday is our special Cop Day where we patrol the playa streets all in good fun and humor. There is no shortage of burners that volunteer to get cuffed and arrested by our squad to get taken into custody.  The theme song from "CHiPs" and other old school, cop inspired tunes -- provides the soundtrack for our shenanigans.  As the Force travels from club to club we stop to issue citations for infractions committed by burners that demonstrate the need for "special guidance."

title: Cory Doctorow on The Internet of Things
description:
"The Internet of Things: Poisoned at Birth by the Inkjet Printer Business-Model."

The computers that engulf your body (cars, planes, houses) and that
you insert into it (prosthesis, pacemakers, hearing aids) are subject
to a ridiculous Clinton-era copyright law that lets their
manufacturers lock them so that you can't use app stores or
replacement parts of your choosing -- but worse than that, to keep you
locked in, the law criminalizes telling you about flaws in the devices
that you depend on for life and limb.
The computers that engulf your body (cars, planes, houses) and that

title: Creative Visualization: Picture your future
description: Join us for a guided creative visualization meditation. We will help you picture the perfect day 10 yrs in your future. The process works by subconsciously shifting your decision making over the next 10 years eventually making your vision a reality. You don't know what that day looks like? Don't worry, most people don't, but your subconscious already knows what is important to it. The more amazing and compelling the vision that you let emerge, the more you will be drawn to it. How? Most people make between 80 to 400 decisions a day. A rich, compelling visualization with a lot of sensory "hooks" can shift those decisions towards your perfect future because the right choices will feel "right". We will start with a mindfulness of breath meditation, a gratitude exercise and then wake up the morning of your perfect day and explore it through a guided process. After, we will ask a few of those interested to share their visualization with the group. We look forward to sharing your future day together. Dr.Feelgood
print_description: Join us for a guided creative visualization meditation. We will help you picture the perfect day 10 yrs in your future.

title: Cristal Happy Hour with the Millionaires
description:
Come join us for an ultra exclusive happy hour with the playa's best millionaire featuring Light beverages by Cristal. 

We understand you - you are a millionaire. People complain about you. You're vilified in burner media, and you just don't get it. Well, good news...*we get you*! You've paid your $15,000 camp dues, flown into the desert, and want service dammit! We at millionaire camp understand your expectations and are here to provide you with the amenities you deserve while you are out here in the desert.

Millionaire lounge is open 24/7 to provide you the latest in playa pampering. From our exclusive reserved seating, complimentary fragrances, Segway parking, free wifi, phone charging stations, and secured location only accessible by wristband, Millionaire lounge offers the amenities you deserve while you are in the desert.

Please stop by one of our exciting hosted events over the week, or join us for a cocktail anytime, day or night. You never know who you'll meet at Millionaire Lounge!
print_description: Come join us for an ultra exclusive happy hour with the playa's best millionaires featuring Light beverages by Cristal.

title: Critical Sticks Stickman Parade
description:
COME JOIN CRITICAL STICKS!

Feel like there's less to you than meets the eye? Have only just enough artistic skill to draw a stick figure? You may be one of us! If you have one of these costumes, or want to make one, then get to it! We need you to join us as we dance across the darkness and spread joy throughout the land. Stickman BRC has been illustrating our EL wire childlike magic on the Playa since 2004, bringing art to life. Over the years, we've seen others infuse their creativity into the ranks of Stickhood and we think its time we unite. Nothing sadder than a lonesome Stickman.

Meet at (6:30/Esplanade) at 9:30pm Tuesday night, September 1st; at 10pm, we venture out to the Playa. We'll be on foot, route tbd, so wear your walkin'/dancin' shoes. We hope you can play with us!

Join the FB page (and check the files) for info on how to make one.

https://www.facebook.com/groups/StickmanBRC/events/

Need some inspiration?
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vEX1PghxkJY
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D_xSyoqRY_k&playnext=1&list=PLA7CCE3A2EAC0C945&feature=results_video
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nHqiRBeGdkk&feature=relmfu
http://www.youtube.com/watch?NR=1&v=LxyjhofF6Lw&feature=endscreen
print_description: We need you to join us as we dance across the darkness and spread joy throughout the land. Be a celebrity Stick Person!

title: Crossroads Presents "Prince" - Epic Live Music!
description: Crossroads is back! Our epic live band is returning for our fifth year with the best live music on the playa, bar none! In that sea of EDM that swallows you on the playa we offer a soulful and funky alternative played by some of the best musicians, singers and dancers on the West Coast. Friday night we celebrate one the greatest artists of all time-- Prince! We will be celebrating our fifth year on playa by going back to our first year roots and throwing down the most awesome Prince jams of all time. Come sing and dance with songs that you simply cannot resist! We'll also be playing some of our greatest hits from previous theme nights! You won't want to miss it!  Before the show come enjoy our friendly bar and just hang out with the sexiest folks ever! Afterwards stay for delicious grilled cheese sandwiches served up in many tasty varieties by our village-mates MoonCheese!!
print_description: Come get your groove on with songs by the one and only Prince! Our live 15-piece band of SF/LA's best is celebrating Year 5 by going back to Year 1!

title: Crossroads Presents "The Club" - Epic Live Music!
description: Crossroads is back! Our epic live band is returning for our fifth year with the best live music on the playa, bar none! In that sea of EDM that swallows you on the playa we offer a soulful and funky alternative played by some of the best musicians, singers and dancers on the West Coast. Thursday night is all about getting your asses on the floor, so welcome to "The Club" our night of the best dance music of all time!! We know some of you love your EDM so we're gonna funk up songs by Disclosure, Bassment Jaxx, Depeche Mode and others and mash them up with the greatest dance hits of every decade of the past century by artists such as Missy Elliot, Janet Jackson, Outkast, Benny Goodman, Calvin Harris and more!  Before the show come enjoy our friendly bar and just hang out with the sexiest folks ever!  Afterwards stay for delicious grilled cheese sandwiches served up in many tasty varieties by our village-mates MoonCheese!!
print_description: Come experience the dance jams of yesterday & today at the best party ever, thrown by our pro live 15-piece band from SF/LA! Your life will change!

title: CS International Meat & Greet and Weenie Roast!!!!
description: Couch Burners invite all Couchsurfers to our 5th Annual International Meat-n-Greet(formally the CS topless weenie roast)! As always, it is a BYO-share event. Bring something to cobntribute to the bar/grill and festivities. Booze, international meat(or faux meat) for the grill, a fact, or a great travel story. Meet other CSers, surf the BusSofas together, break in our human fooseball court and giant pool table, play some international games, and make new and lasting connections all over the world. Participate in making the world a better place... one couch at a time. See you there with love, lust, and playa dust!

title: Daily Snow Cones at Paradise Motel
description: Step right up, ladies and gents, children of all ages, for the best refreshment you’ll find in this entire Carnival!  Keep your peepers peeled for the palm trees and pink flamingoes which indicate you’ve discovered none other than the infamous Paradise Motel, where weary carnival goers are invited to stop by for the best snow cones in the world while lounging in the shade in our chill lounge while enjoying the melodic beats of our world class digital music purveyors.   This year, you’ll find as our roadside attraction none other than a purveyor of prognostications as a teller of fortunes has set up a tent where you can find out what your future has in store!  Our opulent Motel will also include a concierge desk where you can discover all the goings on in this most flamboyant section of the carnival.  Gifts of (unopened) bags of ice are always appreciated.  And as always, if you show your junk, you get to cut to the front (of the snow cone queue).
print_description: Enjoy a snow cone and music while lounging in our shade. Gifts of (unopened) bags of ice welcomed. Remember, if you show your junk, cut to the front!

title: Dance of Liberation
description:
movement therapy that heals and frees physical, mental, emotional and spiritual blockages through ritual dance, breathwork, and contemporary Shamanism.
 a hands-on, physical experience of the ritual celebration.  The workshop begins with a ritual purification, connecting heart, body, mind, and spirit. Then it moves you into a deeper state of consciousness and closer to your individual and collective soul’s purpose. Utilizing dance, contemporary shamanism, hands on healing, drumming and global music, this powerful and beautiful soul work sheds inhibitions and heightens inner awareness in a safe and carefully monitored group setting. Dancers are blindfolded in the shamanic tradition and step beyond their conscious fears and limitations and allow their innermost creative sides to break free. Dancers tune in to sound and movement to take an inner journey exploring a trance-like state of self-discovery and self-realization.
print_description: movement therapy that heals and frees physical, mental, emotional and spiritual blockages through ritual dance, breathwork, and contemporary Shamanism

title: Dancing Freedom
description: A moving prayer space for people who want MORE LIFE. We dance an alchemical wave of the elements in sacred community as a way of inner and outer connection, deep transformation, and a great deal of FUN! Accessible to ALL. Come dance the sweet, authentic, hungry truth birthing in every breath of your beautiful human life. Dance your gratitude, your pain, your joy, and the beyond imaginable awesomeness of your deepest desires. Give it up! Sweaty prayers liberate our lives. Let your body make your prayer.

Join Dancing Freedom founder, Samantha Sweetwater, for an sublime movement journey to shake things up, free your body, mind and spirit and give wings and roots to your soul's design.

title: Dark n' Stormy Hip Hop Party
description: Looking outside it may seem as though Wednesday is sunny and clear but out on Ziza, the Roving Tea Cart, the weather will be decidedly "Dark and Stormy." Join the luscious lupine lovelies of Raised By Wolves from 1-5PM for ice-cold Dark and Stormy's and the best hip-hop tracks for you to shake your ass. Leaving from 9 and D, to an art installation TBD, but will be posted at camp. BYO cardboard for break-dancing.
print_description: Fresh beats and fresh dark n' stormy's served from 1-5pm on Wednesday. Location TBD but WILL be posted at our camp on the day of.
other_location: Art installation on playa/deep playa, to be determined

title: Dark Sparkle Burlesque Extravaganza
description: Dark Sparkle is the potent mix of the mysterious and the dangerous that makes something irresistibly attractive. It's what pushes people to the point of insanity; that unexplainable quality that pulls people to the dark side. Some days, Dark Sparkle is your alter-ego; other days it is your most natural feeling form. Dark Sparkle is Mona Lisa's smile, biscuits and gravy, the Fonz, the apocalypse. It is an adventurous way of life--physically, emotionally and mentally that citizens of BRC embrace. Our shows are an opportunity for Dark Sparklers and other BRC citizens to explore and showcase their Dark Sparkle through performance, storytelling, and tease. Featuring your favorite DS performers as well as guests from the BRC community. We'll also turn the tables with ample opportunity for participation. Contact: srodenburg@gmail.com
print_description: An exploration through performance, storytelling, and tease, featuring DS performers and guests from the BRC. Come ready to participate!

title: Darktard Hunting
description:
We hunt dark and unlit burners in deep Playa and give them blinkies! BRING BLINKIES TO GIVE AWAY (I order 200 extra for my hunting adventures). Hunting party goes out at 8 pm. Join us at 9 pm to share your victories. My record so far is 50 darktards and 2 unlit police officers. 
Our prey are invited to become next year's hunters (asked to bring extra blinkies to give away next year). A true Darktard Hunter cannot help but hunt their prey throughout the event. 
Darktards are dangerous to themselves and others and MUST SEE THE LIGHT!
(Do not ask for handouts, this is a 'bring your own blinky' event)
print_description: We hunt dark and unlit burners in deep Playa and give them blinkies! BRING LIGHTS TO GIVE AWAY. (Don't ask for handouts='bring your own blinky' event)
other_location: Meet at green ATV sortof near front of Planet Earth (4:30 and Esplanade). Ask for Leslie.

title: DATA BASH!   Diversity on the Playa
description: “Diversity on the Playa”  will be led by Vernon, who led the “Black on Playa” event last year and Scribble, who has done research on Playa on economic and racial diversity.   You’ll have a chance to hear about, discuss, and ask questions about our team’s research while mingling with other Burning Nerds and sipping mixed drinks.
print_description: Hear about and  discuss, the Census team’s research on diversity while mingling with other Burning Nerds and sipping mixed drinks.
other_location: Census Lab, Center Camp, across from Playa Info

title: DATA BASH!  Play & Transformation at Burning Man
description: Learn about research on the Power of Play and Transformative Experiences at the Burn.  Conversations will be led by Isabelle, who has done extensive research on play in the bonobo populations, and Countess, who is an anthropology researcher focused on play.  Learn about their research while mingling with fellow Burning Nerds and sipping mixed drinks.
print_description: Learn about research on the Power of Play and Transformative Experiences at the Burn, and mingle with fellow Burning Nerds while sipping mixed drinks.
other_location: Census Lab, Center Camp, across from Playa Info

title: DATA RELEASE BASH!	2015 Sampling Data Release
description: Be the first to hear about the preliminary results of our 2015 sampling at the gate and discuss the findings with Countess, Manager of the BRC Census Lab, and other BRC Census leadership. Nicole will lead a discussion of the Ten Principals and how they are applied in the default world.
print_description: Be the first to hear about our preliminary results of our 2015 sampling at the gate and discuss the Ten Principals as applied in the default world.
other_location: Census Lab, Center Camp, across from Playa Info

title: David & Kismet get married on the playa!
description:
Meet us at the Music Savages sound camp at 9 & Illusion between 330 and 4pm before we all head off to the playa (maybe Fire Tetris) for our ceremony, to be officiated by Ryan the Quizmaster.  
Even if we haven't yet been introduced, don't let that stop you from joining us on this magical day and then coming back to our camp for the reception party with music from our great friend, Psyrus Black.
We will have libations for 21+ w/ id and I've decided to smuggle in a cake from Kismet's favorite local bakery (hopefully she doesn't see this listing)

title: Decompression Detox
description: Come to the gardens and join our Shaman for an informative one-hour lecture on how to restore and heal the body naturally using herbs and supplements. After this incredible week of extremes, you can use these tools to adapt back into the default world, lessen decompression time, and keep your physical and emotional bodies operating at their fullest. Or if you're struggling and need a second wind to get through this last weekend, learn some tips and try some herbal remedies that will give you new life! - Taught by Clinical Herbalist Joshua Farahnik
print_description: Come to the gardens and join our Shaman for an informative one-hour lecture on how to restore and heal the body naturally using herbs and supplements.

title: Defining a Planet
description: Talk by Ben Burningham, an astronomer with a penchant for remote sensing the atmospheres of brown dwarfs and giant planets. His talk will be about the difficulty of defining a planet which is directly related to his research and close to his heart. Discussion may lead into the mind boggling diversity of extra solar planets we’ve become aware of in the last decade.
print_description: An astronomer describes what makes a planet and how we define the term planet with the incredible diversity discovered in recent years.

title: Devi Flow Yoga w/ Juju Namjai
description: Devi Flow is a strong vinyasa practice with elements of dynamic heart opening movements (mudra-asana-prana-bhakti dance) set to undulating world rhythms and the sounds of the ocean. Devi Flow is a power class that strengthens the core, uplifts the spirit, calms and focuses the restless mind.  Devi Flow is an evolution of intentional movement and yoga blended soulfully to ignite the warrior spirit. Using simple mudras, heart opening dynamic movement and a traditional vinyasa flow, Devi Flow awakens the inner warrior/goddess within all Yogi’s - while receiving therapeutic benefits from the practice. Together we will explore as a collective and express as individuals, creating harmony with breath, beauty with movement; all to the sacred heartbeat within unique original music and the sounds of nature.
print_description: A strong vinyasa practice with elements of dynamic heart opening movements to uplift the spirit, calm and focus the restless mind.

Learn about honeybees and other pollinators. Got no antennae?  We'll feeler you up, no problem!  Bee buzzy, pollinate your mind & get your proboscis wet! Hydrate before you playa-date! We bee inviting you to learn about nature's indicator species the pollinators--bats, bees, birds, & butterflies.  Waggle dance with us in the dust.  >'='<

title: Discus-ish Throw in the dark... and in the buff
description: Discus (well, LED-lit frisbee) throw competition followed by ultimate frisbee game (or regular frisbee, depending on the mood). Bare your body, but wear lights! The Ancient Greeks always trained and competed naked – in fact the ’gym’ comes from the word ‘gymnos’, meaning ‘naked’ in Greek. Come experience the amazing freedom of running and jumping and exercising free of clothing! Or at least come and see what a great spectator sport it is :) This is our only night event, but don't worry about cold – movement will keep you warm!
print_description: Discus (well, LED-lit frisbee) throw competition followed by ultimate frisbee game. Bare your body, but wear lights!

title: Discussion with Ayahuascero Hamilton Souther
description: Join us for a discussion with Ayahuascero Hamilton Souther.
print_description: Join us for a discussion with Ayahuascero Hamilton Souther.

title: Discussion with John Gilmore, co-founder of EFF
description: Join entrepreneur and activist John Gilmore for a lively discussion ranging from freedom in cyberspace to drug policy reform. John Gilmore was the 5th employee of Sun Microsystems, the co-founder of the Electronic Freedom Foundation (EFF) and Cygnus Solutions, and he serves as a member of the board of directors for the Multidisciplinary Association for Psychedelic Studies and the Marijuana Policy Project.
print_description: Join entrepreneur and activist John Gilmore for a lively discussion ranging from freedom in cyberspace to drug policy reform.

title: Discussion with Rick Doblin, President of MAPS
description: Join Rick Doblin, PhD, President of Multidisciplinary Association for Psychedelic Studies, for his 2015 Palenque Norte talk "Psychedelics: From Mainstream to Counterculture and Back."
print_description: Join Rick Doblin, PhD, President of MAPS, for his 2015 Palenque Norte talk "Psychedelics: From Mainstream to Counterculture and Back"

title: Disney Dance Hour
description: Come shake your booty to classic Disney songs!  Sing out loud!  Act like a kid!  Families, costumes, and weirdos welcome!
print_description: Come shake your booty to classic Disney songs!  Sing out loud!  Act like a kid!  Families, costumes, and weirdos welcome!

title: Divine Feminine Empowerment
description: Come participate in a sacred womens circle. Join together with your sisters as we explore the theme of violence against women and how to heal from trauma, find our voices and unite in our power. This particular focus is on recovering from violence and understanding the oppression of the feminine in this age. And by understanding that past we can more consciously choose our future as empowered goddesses. This class integrates group and partner activities, reflections and sharing, learning and movement, indigenous spiritual wisdom to help heal women.
print_description: Come participate in a sacred womens circle. Join together with your sisters as we explore the theme of violence against women & how to heal frm trauma

title: Divine Intimacy
description: This workshop is all about creating the deepest meeting with another, and getting out of our own way in order that we can allow the magic to unfold through us.Using tantric tools to enter a portal beyond personal will, and allow the divine will to happen...entering states of bliss and divine union with those we connect with.
print_description: Tools to connect to others deeply in this present moment, and to allow true connection to unfold...

title: DIY Wood-Burned Pendant
description: Come to Camp Cut!Cut! and make your very own wood-burned burning man pendant! First come first serve a maximum of 25 people a day, so come early! I'll give you a quick and easy way to make your very own burning man wooden pendant, or you can get creative and make your own design! If you miss it, stay for our happy hour!

description: Let's get physical to the sounds of the 80s, disco and funk. Led by Kansas City's hottest dance choreographer, learn some moves and get a sweat going like it's summertime in Miami.

title: Dominance & submission 101
description: Have you fantasized about submitting to your partner or possibly taking charge in the bedroom? Or perhaps you’ve tried it and want to learn more. We’ll cover both sides of a variety of power-exchange relationships through demos and discussion. 18+, ID req.
print_description: For those who want to submit or take charge - we’ll cover both the submissive & dominant sides of power-exchange relationships. 18+, ID req.

title: Don't get caught arting without a license!
description: Are you an artist without a license? Apply for your Official Artistic License at The Happy Spot and you'll never get cited again. Bring proof of art.
print_description: Are you an artist without a license? Apply for your Official Artistic License at The Happy Spot and you'll never get cited again. Bring proof of art.

title: DOOF OFF on Neverwas Hall ,awesome guitar provided
description:
If you have seen Fury Road you know who the Doof Warrior is. We figured the Neverwas Haul needs to represent.  We have built a awesome playable guitar inspired by the movie, a small amp will be provided for you to tear off a few riffs.
 Feel free to bring a band if you have one. We will have a photographer and we will also have a elevated location for you to take pictures of your friends from. 
 Photos will be posted on Flickr under "Neverwas Doof Off". I a suitable # of Mad Max themed vehicles show up we may do a "chase" out onto the playa afterwards.
Hand made Bandannas for the first 25 Doof Warriors!
print_description:
Pose on Neverwas Haul with our custom DOOF guitar!
Fri 6:00 PM @2:30 and Fury (F) Photos will be taken and posted.
Swag for best costumes "WITNESS!"

title: Doors Last Whiskey Bar
description: Camp ZaZen will be opening our saloon doors for our third annual Doors Whiskey Bar. Entranced by the surreal lyrics of Mr. Mojo Risin', take a journey with us to another dimension and expand your mind. Doors tunes will be pumpin (with the ever so brilliant "Alabama Song" opening our festivities) and whiskey will be flowin'. So grab your snake skin pants, lose your shirt, and get ready to dance with the Lizard King.
print_description: A Tribute to Mr. Mojo Risin'. Join us for a celebration of Jim Morrison and the Doors with a healthy serving of whiskey. Don't forget your cup!

title: DO THE HONEYBEE WAGGLE DANCE
description: Join BEE lovers from all hives & wing a Flash Mob Waggle Dance!  Lyrics  to “Do the Honey Bee”  will bee provided prior to this 2 minute shake up.  Join KingBee Yoshin of bEE cHARGe & QueenBee RamonaMayhem of the BuzzInn as we shake our stingers and get the honey flow!  Get your Buzz On and wear your bizzyest pollinator costume!!!  (preview here:  www.youtube.com/watch?v=DpyY9_9y9Qw )
print_description: Join BEE lovers from all hives & wing a Flash Mob Waggle Dance w/the BuzzInn & bEEcHArge-- "Do the Honeybee!" Pollinator costumes highly encouraged!

title: Double Hoops Tech Shop with Jonathan Rodriguez
description: Intermediate/Expert double hoop workshop. Located at camp Stellar Dusty Moon 2:30 on Rod's Road outter circle (translates to 5:30 & A). BYO hoops & come learn a few different forms of caps and wraps in all directions. (:
print_description: Intermediate/Expert double hoop workshop. BYO hoops & come learn a few different forms of caps and wraps in all directions. (:

title: Down the Rabbit Hole
description: Come for a lecture to learn about the modern advances in neuroscience and the implications those discoveries have on our lives as well as society at large. Served with a complementary 'mind blown' cocktail.
print_description: Come learn about the modern advances in neuroscience and the implications those discoveries have on our lives.

title: Dragoncamp Armory
description: Dragoncamp armory will empower women to learn to use simple hand tools to make their own aluminum ARMOR BIKINI. Decorate with jewelry for a stunning look on the playa. The techniques use traditional metal cutting, hammering and forming  skills and take about 2hrs to complete a costume.  Yours to keep. Workshop every morning 9am-12 noon. Supplies limited however, come early.
print_description: Girls- come make your own ARMOR BIKINI for a sexy look on the playa. Decorate to suit and take home. Open mornings 9-12.

title: Dragon Lounge
description: An evening bar from 7 PM to 9 PM Wednesday thru Friday. We will be serving HOT & COLD Sake before the night begins.
print_description: An evening bar from 7 PM to 9 PM. We will be serving HOT & COLD Sake before the night begins.

title: Drama Dump
description: Deposit your drama in our sacred box and receive release.  Take an enchanted memento to keep you centered. Deposits will be burned at the temple. If our drama free divas are on hand, ask their indulgence and see what help they can provide.
print_description: Deposit your drama in our sacred box and receive release.  Take an enchanted memento to keep you centered. Deposits will be burned at the temple.

Captain Hammer will be serving beer at the bar. Live action performance encouraged!

Also, we may play it over and over and over..........

title: Drinking Games w/Camp Hot Mayo

print_description: Come to our Drinking Games party where you can come enjoy Kings Cup;Zoom, Schwartz, Perfigliano;Speed Quarters and others.  Brings your ID's and cups.

title: Dr. Placebo's Snake Oil Emporium
description:
You there! Yes, YOU!
Step right up! Have a look!

Welcome to Dr. Placebo’s Snake Oil Emporium where we have miracle cures from very reputable practitioners. 

From our home away from home in Black Rock City we will be bringing our exceptional treatments and elixirs for all occasions. 

Leave your sensibilities at the door and trust the Doc to find a cure for whatever ails you.
print_description: From our home away from home in Black Rock City we will be bringing our exceptional treatments and elixirs for all occasions.

title: Dr. Placebo's Snake Oil Emporium: Medicine Show
description:
You there! Yes, YOU!
Step right up! Have a look!

Welcome to Dr. Placebo’s Snake Oil Emporium where we have miracle cures from very reputable practitioners. 

From our home away from home in Black Rock City we will be bringing our exceptional treatments and elixirs for all occasions. 

Leave your sensibilities at the door and trust the Doc to find a cure for whatever ails you.

Enjoy Music, Merriment, and our hand selected Tonics and Elixirs.

And if you can't make it, don't fret! The Doctor will be around all week, so stop by for one of our miracle cures!
print_description: Welcome to Dr. Placebo’s Snake Oil Emporium where we have miracle cures from very reputable practitioners.

title: Dr. Scrote's Circumcision Wagon and Calamari Hut

title: Drunk 90s Singalong
description: Break out your skip-it’s, dust off your Tamagotchis and make some new friends while singing all your favorite 90’s hits! Live singing performances and an OPEN BAR that goes ‘til sunset! Look for the  cuddle puddle and alphabet blocks.
print_description: Break out your skip-its and come sing along to your old faves 'til sunset! Live performances/open bar! Look for the cuddle puddle & alphabet blocks.

title: Drunken Disney Sing-A-Long
description: In this Circle of Life we want to be Part of Your World because you ain't never had a Friend Like Me!  Okay...that was bad...but add whiskey and let your inner child free as we join Belle, Ariel and Jasmine in our second annual sing-a-long. Kids are welcome, but no whiskey for them!
print_description: In this Circle of Life we want to be Part of Your World because you ain't never had a Friend Like Me!  Add whiskey and let your inner child free!

title: Drunken Rant Poetry Readings and Bedtimes Stories
description: Have you ever wanted to watch a public oral performance? Here is your chance to watch or participate. Bring your writings, your diary or something you found on a bathroom wall and express you darker side publicly. Tasty snacks and beverages will be served in our comfortable living room.
print_description: Have you ever wanted to watch a public oral performance? Here is your chance!  watch or participate. Bring your writings and express yourself publicly

title: Duck Duck Caboose
description: Quack! Quack! Get your crack slapped and dust down memory lane. Come play our version of "Duck, Duck, Goose!" Meet at The Dusty Bumm Bar, then out to the playa for one helluva butt slapping good time!
print_description: Get your crack slapped and dust down memory lane. Come play our version of "Duck, Duck, Goose!" Meet at The Dusty Bumm Bar.

title: Duckpond Feathers and Fur

print_description: Dance like an animal and drink like a party-animal!  Special drinks for animal costumes we like!

title: Duckpond's Afternoon DJ Mother Lode Closing Party
description: Your favorite 9:00 o'clock dive bar is celebrating 10 years of serving up cocktails and shaking your bootie!  Come celebrate our Duckade Closing Party on the Playa with Dj Dan, Simon Shackleton and Dulce Vita!  It just might be our last!!!
print_description: Come celebrate Dockpond's Duckade Closing Party. 10 years on the Playa! Featuring DJ Dan, Simon Shackleton and Dulce Vita! It just might be our last!

title: Duckpond's Prom Through the Ages
description:
Whether your prom was 5 years ago or 50, we'll be playing music for you.  Come dance, shake, groove, dip, twerk, and electric slide the night away with the Ducks! 

Don't miss it - It's our last party on the Playa!
print_description: Time travel back to prom with the Ducks! Whether your prom was 5 years ago or 50, we'll be playing music for you. Our last party on the Playa! 9 & E!

title: ducks on the desert
description: “ducks on the desert” is now appearing in hushville! come find these child size tents throughout hushville and discover duck themed still lifes within. most likely, you’ll chuckle, be humored or laugh out loud. after the hunt. you can head on over to the fairy princess gift tent for a prize. “ducks on the desert” is open only during the day 8/31 9am through 9/4 4pm and resides within hushville. come through the main entrance (on the avenue) to the center town round. there will be a map to give you clues as to where the duck deviance takes place. quack!
print_description: enter hushville & discover humorous duck themed still lifes within some child size tents. enter on the avenue. hunt and then collect your prize-quack!

title: Duck Tape Style
description: Make your own wallet, coozie or cup. Many flavors of tape available to manifest your own useful creation. Accessorize yourself or decommoditize gear. Tape donations welcome.

title: Dude's Homebrew on tap and Reggae tunes

print_description: The Brew is ice cold & Dudes picked out all his favorites to play while you chill in the shade. Don't forget your cup! you can even pimp it out here

title: Dune: the Spice Must Flow
description: A shadow-cast performance of David Lynch's Dune; come yell at the screen, dress in costume, play along!  Like Rocky Horror, but with sandworms.  (Please note: if you dress as a sand worm, someone WILL jab hooks in you and try to ride you.)
print_description: A shadow-cast performance of David Lynch's Dune; come yell at the screen, dress in costume, play along!  Like Rocky Horror, but with sand worms.

title: Dusk on the Playa
description: Come Dance all day in the sounds of Wulfpack DJs at the Wulf Den! We'll have plenty of shade, mist, and phat beats for you to groove to.  Our lounge will be right next ti the dance floor so you can rest and relax for another round. Expect fun surprises!

title: DUST MARRIED Wedding Reception
description: Celebrate as the ABC Blocks spell DUST MARRIED. Bring your party for a memory in the dusty bliss. Cake provided. Bring Champagne to share
print_description: Celebrate as the ABC Blocks spell DUST MARRIED. Bring your party for a memory in the dusty bliss. Cake provided. Bring Champagne to share

title: Dusty Justice Court
description:
Everybody loves to sue everybody else in the good old U.S. of A!  So we here at Camp Dusty Justice are celebrating that practice and bringing an open, slightly impartial, fun venue for Burners of all stripes to get their dusty dirty day in court.  

Bring your case!  You will be heard!  Is it your noisy neighbor? (we had one!)  Did your best childhood friend make out with your girlfriend? (a real issue from last year)  Did a campmate drink your last cold beer?  Maybe it was just your turn to drive the art car.  Whatever the dispute, our jurist will sort it out.

We will hold court three times during the week or if an emergency arises.  Join us Monday afternoon, Wednesday afternoon and Friday afternoon from 4:30-6:30 for fun, laughs, and some serious judgments and some wicked punishments.
print_description: Dusty Justice Court

title: Dusty Poon @ Noon - Get Wobbly on Wednesday
description: Git on over to the Dusty Poon Saloon for a gun slingin' good time! Park your pony, check your pistol at the door, and belly up to the bar for one of our signature Poon-Tang libations! Come dressed in your best Western gear or get gussied up in what we provide and we'll shoot your photograph, but hopefully not you! You’re bound to have a shit kickin' good time here with dancin', drinkin', photo taking, and patent pending body buffing station and hell, maybe even a wild western showdown! And don’t forget to Download your pictures after the burn on our Facebook page.
print_description: Check your pistol at the door, and belly up to the bar for our signature Poon-Tang libations! We'll shoot you in our Wild Western Photo Booth!

title: Dye Day at Dye with Dignity
description: We provide the silk, dye, wine, snow cones, stilt walkers, entertainers, instructors, you provide yourself and the willingness to try something new! Spin the Wheel of Shame, become a part of the entertainment and come create your own one of a kind piece of functional art. A silk scarf! Silk is also an excellent dust mask.
print_description: Come create your own one of a kind work of art. Silk, dyes and supplies provided, along with wine, snow cones and the famous Wheel of Shame!

title: Dynamic African Dance- Malaika MaVeena
description:
Experience the ecstasy and joy of dancing and singing together to the beat of live drums! Come and express your inner village.
Malaika MaVeena brings a wealth of Earth Wisdom for personal and Planetary awakening having walked the Shamanic Path for a lifetime. She has over 25 years as a Global Movement facilitator and is the founder of 5Elements Dance Activation™- a powerful ecstatic dance meditation taking groups deep into the core of their soul, and transforming negativity into nectar! These expression sessions are Spirituality rooted in the body! Malaika is a qualified ISHTA yoga teacher, Water Dance practitioner, African Dancer and performer, speaker, Lomi Lomi practitioner, musician, and DJ -true Earth Goddess
print_description: Experience the ecstasy and joy of dancing and singing together to the beat of live drums! Come and express your inner village!

title: Dynamics Bike Tour
description: The playa under our feet seems featureless, but this vast lake bed is a dynamic, complex environment. Join an expedition searching for clues to the processes that constantly reshape the surface. How does our temporary city and art affect the environment? See how Burning Man endeavors to Leave No Trace
print_description: Join us searching for clues to the processes that constantly reshape the surface.; how does our temporary city and art affect the Black Rock?

title: Dynamic Therapeutics - Partner Yoga
description: This is a partner based workshop that will lead participants from two person poses all the way through four person postures! By lending a helping hand (or foot!), we can attain the full potential of our practice while being supported in our growth. This playful practice is based on human connection, supported growth, and active release techniques to bring you deeper into harmony not only with your own body, but the bodies and hearts of those around you.
print_description: This is a partner based workshop that will lead participants from two person yoga poses all the way through four person postures!

title: Earth Guardian Volunteer Training
description: Calling all Earth Guardians ready to volunteer to man our information desk where folks can come for information and help run the activities programs. We need YOU at our front line. This is a training session for all volunteers and all EG's staying at the EG camp on the esplanade are expected to do at least two shifts. Shifts run from 9-noon, noon-3 and 3-6pm each day of the event.

Our frustrations, resistances and blockages become rocket fuel for our transformation and awakening! This technique, based on teachings from a guru in Bali, raises the kundalini energy, raises our vibration, raises our consciousness. It is the place that orgasm becomes prayer and we can expand to touch the universe.
