title: Lecture:  OUR FUTURE IS FEMALE
description: The threat of nuclear war, the next extinction level event, climate change and economic enslavement, all point to the unsustainability of our current trajectory. With all of humanity's advances, why can't we achieve peace and prosperity for all? The underlying cause of our failure might be gender inequity:  women are our most underutilized natural resource. Past societies which overcame war and poverty were governed similarly to us, with one difference-- the existence of a fourth branch, consisting of post-menopausal women only. Following this historical precedent, how can we restore women's voice in government? And, can we do it in time?
print_description: The underlying cause of our failure to achieve peace/prosperity for all might be gender inequity: women are our most underutilized natural resource.

Come in your most outrageous costume, bribe the host, have that random item we call out for and you could find yourself on stage competing with another contestant for what is in the box! title: LiBEEdo Party and Swarm of the Man
description:
Join us for our annual LiBEEdo block party, we're stoked to make it bigger, badder and even more ridiculous than ever before! We will be serving our infamous LiBeedo cocktails (mojitos with honey) along with several badass DJs dropping tasty beats for us to get our Buzz on! Our new sound system will blow your stinger off and there will be a dance-off so bee prepared! Wear black and yellow to bee VIB (Very Important BEE!), you'll definitely want to join our hive for the day! 

Drinks & dancing start at 2:00 PM, then we are off to Swarm to Man at 6:00 PM, where we will buzz unsuspecting burners and delight them with the sweetness of our spicy stingers! Last year we had more than 100 bees on the swarm, this year will be sure to be even larger! Come make history!

Wear your black & yellow & join us if for the party you won't want to miss!
print_description: Our annual LiBEEdo party and Swarm of the Man! Dancing and drinks at 2pm, leaving camp to SWARM the Man at 6pm. Wear black and yellow!

title: Libertarian Ethics and Electronic Music

title: Life Coaching
description:
IMAGINEnation is a camp dedicated to the power of dreaming and radical honesty.
Our coaches provide daily life coaching workshops and one-on-one coaching to the people of the playa. We are offering 30 minute sessions, Monday thru Saturday 12-4pm to help you sort out your life.
Whether it's finding a job you love, fixing your relationship, losing 30 pounds or simply being ready for the next exciting chapter in life, the work you will do with your coach will provide immediate inspiration, serious results and lasting knowledge.

Our Life Coaches have been through a rigorous training process and utilize The Handel Method, which is also the foundation of the work we teach at MIT, NYU and Stanford.

Together we dig deep, play big and don’t stop until goals are fulfilled and lessons learned. We care, we love what we do and we walk our talk.
print_description: IMAGINEnation is a camp dedicated to the power of dreaming and radical honesty. We are offering 30 minute sessions coaching sessions!

title: Life-Force Dynamic: An Exploration of Human Energy
description:
" An introduction to human energetic system and how the ancient mystical traditions of India, China, and Europe interweave to create the foundational elements for an integral spiritual practice - the control of the human vessel through postures (asana) + breath control (pranayama)  + mental focus (mantra). Includes 2-hour physical practice of Qigong & Yoga that will prepare you for the burn.

There will be an explanation of Traditional Indian Medicine (Yoga/Ayurveda) and Traditional Chinese Medicine (Qi Gong/Taoism), two ancient healing systems over 2000 years old. There will be an exploration on the difference between the Indian Hinduism (Polytheistic) & Chinese Taoism (Monotheistic) theories and how we can integrate these two philosophies into our daily spiritual practice to empower ourselves.

The discussion will then be followed by a 2 hour Yoga & Qi Gong class which will blend together the elements of ancient India (Yoga) and China (Qi Gong) to provide a dynamic moving meditation focused on providing a balance of both Yang (active) and Yin (passive) elements, that will conclude with a healing Yoga Nidra (conscious deep sleep) meditation - leaving you empowered, focused, and energized - ready for the burn and the new year. "
print_description: An introduction to human energetic system using Qigong & Yoga that will prepare you for the burn (bring a yoga mat or towel) with Matthew Winke.

Whatever you would like to share, this is the place, at Life Rulez Camp... we are eager to learn, listen, watch, and receive.

title: Live Music with Cello Joe!
description:
Joey Chang aka CelloJoe is the world's only beatboxing, long distance bicycling, looping cellist.  He is the wildest beatboxing cellist in the west. By combining cello with beatboxing, he has created a unique genre: Classical Hip Hop. 

CelloJoe records live on stage with a loop pedal and produces intricate tapestries of harmony, melody, and rhythm. His beatboxing (vocal percussion) and funky cello grooves form a rich soundscape for intelligent lyrics and his music spreads love, joy, laughter and conscious vibrations.

title: LNT Outreach /BLM Compliance Team Training
description: In 2013, Earth Guardians volunteered to go out with BLM staff with GPS's and cameras to specific spots in the city, checking for oil drips, grey water spills, black water spills and burn barrel problems. BLM was checking for permit violations and we were along as both LNT advisors and cultural ambassadors.  It's a great opportunity to have 'boots on the ground' and share LNT love and we’re doing it again this year!  This is a training for our volunteers on the team, and a meal will be provided for the training.

title: Longevity Stick
description: The sun’s just up, but not too hot; clothing is optional here, so adults only, please. Come for an early hour of low impact exercise in the Longevity Stick Art (LSA) discipline of 12 low-impact exercises to build balance, flexibility, strength, mental focus, breathing capacity, and vitality, and open your points and channels. Bring your water or hydration liquid. We’ll provide sticks for you. Master Mai Bac Dao developed Longevity Stick Art discipline while he was a prisoner of war of the North Vietnamese. He helped his fellow prisoners restore and maintain health through LSA, and vowed if he was ever freed, he’d dedicate his life to spread its benefits, with the proviso that no trainer could ever charge for it. (Like "gifting," eh?) He was freed, moved to Southern California, and taught classes of students and future teachers. Today, weekly classes abound in So Cal, around the US, and the world.  See: www.longevitystick.org/Longevitystick.org/Home.html and www.filmbaby.com/films/2341 .
print_description: Sun’s up, not too hot, clothes optional. 1 hr of lo impact exercise for balance, open points, channels. Bring H2O. We’ll provide the sticks!

description: Some people think religion is a way to control the ignorant masses. Others turn to religion for solace and direction. Religious dogma can serve to uplift and inspire or separate and control. This ritual will help you strip away the confining, controlling aspects of religion to live peacefully and harmoniously. title: Lust & Marriage: A Woman's Journey into Polyamory
description: From the opening moments, we learn this solo show is about soul mates, and the search for love and lust. Emily is the hero of the story, a character very much a literary stand-in for author and performer Eleanor O’Brien. We meet her as a child, fascinated by romance novels and her father’s porn. The show traces her journey from awkward teen to college boyfriends, complete with disappointing first times and disastrous blowjobs. But then she discovers renown sex-columnist Dan Savage, her ‘gay fairy godfather’. Dan helps her learn to ask for what she wants (“I can touch my own clit during sex?”), and encourages her to be GGG (Good, Giving and Game). Emily goes on a spree of experimentation, culminating in the “grand prix of getting lucky,” Burning Man. At the world’s largest alternative event, she meets Matt, who turns out to be the love of her life-but he doesn’t identify as monogamous. Can they make it work? Emily asks Dan for advice as they navigate the thrills and valleys of opening the relationship: how to negotiate boundaries, deal with jealousy and keep from falling in love with other people. She thinks if they follow the rules they've set, they can keep their relationship safe. They can be “monogamish,” and keep the spark in their marriage. When a magical threesome drives her to utter meltdown, Emily insists on closing their marriage. But monogamy doesn’t solve all their problems. Emily and Matt discover they have different libidos - and the seven-year itch isn’t a myth. He encourages her to spread her wings, so she takes a lover. All's fine for a while, but soon she finds herself falling in love with Michael, her NSA partner for play. She is terrified of losing her marriage to Matt, and asks Dan again for advice. “Is polyamory a utopian ideal?” During an ayahuasca ceremony, Emily finally sees where she's been blind to how her behavior has stifled her marriage, and how she has to let go of the need for certainty, or controlling anyone else’s heart.
print_description: This one woman play by Eleanor O'Brien of Dance Naked Prod. received critical acclaim at this year's Canadian Fringe Festival. 75 minute running time

title: Mead Workshop @ the BuzzInn
description: Buzzinn to the dHive bar and delight in humankind’s original ambrosia!  Mead is the oldest alcoholic beverage known to man & we aim to share with you how easy it is to make at home. A honey based wine, mead requires a very small investment on your part. The variations of style are endless as you can make mead with fruit, ciders, herbs, different kinds of honey, dry or sweet, (i.e. has remaining sugar),  bubbly, (like sparkling wine), or still. We will explain how to make it, where to get it, and even have demo equipment available. 21+ and over can sample different varieties we've made and brought to share. You will come away with an understanding of:   Early Discoveries of Mead,  Mead in Religion and Culture, & the Techniques of Making Mead: -Overall concepts that mixing water, honey and yeast starts a reaction to convert the sugars in the honey to alcohol and release carbon dioxide gas. -The equipment needed such as a 1, 3 or 5 gallon water bottles, airlocks, tubes to siphon off the mead from the ‘lees,’ (sediment at the bottom of the fermentation container), bottles, and a few other items such as cleanser to keep everything clean. -Selections of honey to make mead and how the type of honey influences the end result flavor and the same for yeast selection. -Selections of ‘adjuncts’ which influence the flavor of your mead: the addition of spices such as cloves or cinnamon (known as metheglin), or the addition of fruits such as raspberries or strawberry (melomel).  We will finish up with tasting different styles! Bzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz!
print_description: Get your Buzz-On @ the BuzzInn & learn the homemade mead (honey wine) making process & what you need to ferment your own.  Sample Cyser & Melomels.

title: Memorial for Johnny "Irish" Considine
description: Johnny "Irish" Considine was a superb example of "hail fellow, well met."  His friends weren't surprised to discover that he was loved and admired by an extended sea of humanity and that is what we most hope to celebrate. Johnny was an integral member of the New York City Burning Man community and a loving "playa mama" to his campmates at Love Potion and Duck & Cover. We plan to toast him with a Happy Hour at Love Potion, then migrate to The Man, where some of his ashes will be in The Man's heart. From there, we will erect our memorial to him in The Temple and, finally, travel to deep playa to scatter his ashes at sunset. It will be festive and filled with joy, just as Johnny was. For us, it will be as if he is joining us on the playa one more time! Bring bikes and booze!
print_description: Join friends of Johnny Irish as we toast the man, visit The Man, erect our memorial in the Temple and scatter his ashes in deep playa.

title: Men's Authentic Personal Expression
description: I am a  woman who has focused herself over the last year on providing empowerment to already successful male entrepreneurs and thought leaders, supporting the purity of what legacy they leave behind by helping them with everything from how they deliver who they are to the world, to working out their heart and personal logistics, I have developed the "50 Points of Attractiveness" and tested it to success. I have 18 years coaching authentic self-expression, including 4 TEDx talks. 22 years studying people / human interaction via songwriting (and expressing my findings artfully). 28 years as a performer in various capacities, especially singing. In my career I've presented music and talks for over 100,000 people. Also, I've spent the last full year doing a deep dive into femininity/polarity studies. I am an advocate for men being empowered (especially as women claim their power more and more), and attaining the capacity to leave legacies. This includes knowing how to navigate matters of the heart. Overall, I really LOVE showing men how to feel happy and free professionally, publicly, and personally by learning how to express themselves authentically. So much of this revolves around a man's ability to limit drama and distraction in his life.

title: More Carrot - Black Rock City's Farmers Market
description: One of the best parts of exploring any city is checking out the farmer’s market- and Black Rock City is no exception! title: Moving Meditation Contemplative Dance
description:
Dancing with the Mind of Meditation
This Contemplative Dance workshop offers you an introduction to a variety of movement meditation techniques. We'll sense and feel the way that energy moves through the body with Qi Gong practice. We'll explore somatic training and the Body/Mind practices of Developmental Movement and Experiential Anatomy. We'll investigate our relationship to form, space, and each other through Viewpoints Space Awareness and Mudra Space Awareness. 

This class is a laboratory where we'll be working with the energy that animates our bodies. We'll be exploring how energy moves when the body moves and how mind can direct energy. We'll learn to harness the power of the breath and focus of the mind to attain higher performance outcomes.

The work is toward attaining a greater depth of expression of personal energy, achieving grace and ease in a variety of movement patterns, developing an equanimity of all body parts as initiators and supporters of movement in space, and gaining the ability to dance ecstatically with great amounts of energy without loss of awareness of where you are and what is around you. 

Everyone is welcome from dancers seeking to bring contemplation into their dance - to those wishing to bridge their sitting practice to their walking meditation practice to the rest of their active lives - to people who have never danced or meditated before.
print_description: An introduction to Mind/Body practices. Sensing Feeling and Action. Experiencing the body. Qi Gong energy work. Space Awareness.

title: Music as Spirit Quest
description: Music, whether experienced as player or listener, can be one of the most powerful modes we have of knowing and expressing the self. In this workshop, we will come together as players, listeners, and human beings to lift our hearts in song. One musician will share his relationship with music as a practice of self-exploration and invite others to share what it means to them. The result will be a mix of song and dialogue -- ideally, a union of the two. No musical experience necessary, just an open mind and heart!

title: Mutant Alternative Vehicles – bikes, scooters, etc
description: Did you know there are only 550 Mutant Vehicle licenses issued? What’s everyone else who can’t pull off an art car supposed to do? The next best thing that doesn’t need a license is a human-electric powered hybrid on 2-3 wheels. Gas scooters and electric with no human power are allowed, as long as they are stock, so they can’t be mutated. Burners are making amazing mutations with bikes and trikes. In this session, we’ll hear from some makers who stand out. This is a great way to learn how to hack your own mutant bike or alternative vehicle for next year.
print_description: Join us to explore how alternative transportation for the Playa is sourced and made. The hacks, engineering and technology behind it all. Show off!

title: Naked Oil Wrestling
description:
Wrestling is one of the most fun sports you can ever try. It’s also one of humanity’s oldest and was among the major events of the original Olympics. Long before we were kicking balls around we were rolling around in the dirt, putting each other in headlocks! It doesn’t matter if you’re a complete novice who’s never tried it in your life or an experienced fighter, come along and experience this amazing bonding experience in Gymnasium, Black Rock City’s Ancient Greek wrestling school (7:30 Portal).

We will start warming up and a workshop on wrestling basics at 10:30. This will be followed by competitions starting at 11:30. Participants will be provided showers at another camp.
print_description: Wrestling workshop followed by oil wrestling competitions, in the buff like in the original Olympics. Great bonding experience and exercise!

title: Naked Philosophy
description:
Nudity has the power to surprise and shock, yet why, on reflection, can something as mundane as the naked body inspire simultaneously so much passion and revulsion? To be naked in 21st century western society demands intense self-examination, the questioning and reappraisal of conventional conventions and morality. In this sense, naturism, as the cultural and political movement of nudism is often known, is an inherently philosophical practice. 

And what better way to do philosophy than naked? We’re sure your college seminars would have been much more fun nude.

Come and join us for lively discussions, debates and story-telling. We’ll be discussing naturism, body image, sharing experiences, debating body modification, if and how laws should be changed – really everything related to the human body.
print_description: Nudity has the power to surprise and shock, yet why, can something as mundane as the naked body inspire simultaneously so much passion and revulsion?

title: Naked Piggy-Back and Barrel-Run Race
description:
Bare with us for this fun athletic event! Bring your friends, but choose wisely, as you'll have to bear them on your back, bareback... or vice versa. Great bonding experience guaranteed!
The Ancient Greeks always trained and competed naked – in fact the ’gym’ comes from the word ‘gymnos’, meaning ‘naked’ in Greek. Come experience the amazing freedom of running and jumping and exercising free of clothing! Or at least come and see what a great spectator sport it is :) PS In ancient Olympics this would have been an equestrian event, but BMORG wouldn't let us bring horses...
print_description: Bare with us for this fun athletic event! Bring your friends, but choose wisely, as you'll have to bear them on your back... or vice versa

title: Naked Presence
description: As a group we will take off our clothing and leave any and all body shame behind.  A time for acceptance and non-sexual enjoyment of the human body.
print_description: As a group we will take off our clothing and leave any and all body shame behind.  A time for acceptance and non-sexual enjoyment of the human body.

title: Naked Pub Crawl
description: Since 2004, hundreds of burners meet at the Man and pedal off into the City for a few hours of bar hopping and good cheer! Multiple host camps will have bartenders standing by with icy libations prepared exclusively for the riders. This year’s host camps will be Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro, Duckpond, Cubhouse, Gaylactic Village, and Celestial Bodies, culminating in a legendary afterparty at Comfort & Joy hosted by a team of talented bartenders wearing nothing but hospitality. If you’re willing to meet the dress code, join us for one of the goofiest parties on the playa. We aren’t making a statement or pushing an agenda; we’re just riding our bikes, drinking some cocktails, and making new friends.  Oh yeah, and we’re naked.  Mugs for the first 500 riders (and yeah, we always run out). Cheers!
print_description: The name says it all. Host camps will have bartenders and icy cocktails waiting exclusively for us. Mugs for the first 500 riders. Our 12th Year!

title: Naked Sensual Body Painting
description:
Want to color up? Come by our colorful RV, brush and finger paint up any and every part of your and your friends bodies with body and MOOP safe paint.

We humans come in so many flavors, with such awesome variety! Join us as we decorate our bodies and visually proclaim who we are. With just a few splashes (daubs) of colorful paint, our living canvases become incredible expressions of our unique version of “human”, our personal “performance art.” Its a delight for the senses - especially touch - feeling brush or finger strokes over your skin can be a very sensual experience.

We will offer printed photo postcards to send a picture of your body art home to your friends, family or yourself as a fun memory.
print_description: With a few daubs of colourful paint our living canvases become an expression of who we are. Painting and being painted can be a sensual experience.

title: Midway Grand Opening Procession and Extravaganza
description:
When: Monday, August 31 from 5:45 - 9pm
Where: from Everywhere Pavilion to the Man

Come one, come all, step right up!  All are invited to the Grand Opening of the Midway! Engage with our global community and discover the exotic delights of our carnival sideshow around the Man.
The festivities will kick off with a grand parade procession starting at 5:45pm at the Everywhere Pavilion at 6:15 and Esplanade and leading into the Midway at the Man Base, where our opening party will begin at 6:15 pm. Performers of all stripes invited! Performances and shenanigans await!

title: Mikkeller Running Club
description:
A special edition of Mikkeller Running Club for those attending Burning Man 2015.

Time is TBA as it will depend on weather conditions; dawn is most likely for health reasons. We will meet at The Lost Penguin Cafe at 4:00 & Arcade. Mikkeller beer(s) are TBA.

Distance is 5 km (~3.1 miles). If you have a shirt from your local chapter, bring it with you so we can take a nice photo for Mikkel Borg Bjergsø.

We get fit through running while enjoying delicious beer and food. Come join us. We are a club for everyone. Bring your friends.
print_description: We get fit through running while enjoying delicious beer and food. We are a club for everyone. Bring your friends. Distance is 5 km.

Our discreet, enclosed, air-conditioned Army tent is fully outfitted for adult manplay. Wear your best camouflage, BDUs, 13-button pants if you like. Or not. Soldier? Sailor? Marine? Airman? Remember, what happens at Burning Man stays at Burning Man…

title: Mindful Hatha Yoga with CC
description:
I woud like to instruct 90-minute yoga sessions with an intention of self-exploration. I do not see myself as a teacher, rather a facilitator who
supports other people's journeys. I allow people room to be present and feel into their bodies, in that each posture is held for an extended period of time. It is not about appearances, our neighbors, the next posture. Each session would include an intention of focus that I would explain before beginning. What is more than being present? Presence itself.

title: Mind Melt
description:
Mind Melt lets your mind be changed from Fear of the unknown, to finding Hope in the Future, by experiencing 3-D Images of lights and sounds and the peace only found within the receptive mind and experience of every thought, feelings, sensations, and level of awareness through corresponding brain wave patterns.

Mind machines change your perception by stimulating balanced, abundant neurotransmitter production, expanding neural pathways, and programming desirable, ecologically sound behaviors. The use of mind melting can enhance physical healing and homeostasis, intellectual performance, and greatly improved a sense of well-being, which allows one to See beauty where others do not, and a new perception of life that is the Future for all Mankind.

Remember; nothing really exists, it’s all in the electrons of your mind.

title: Mirror Movie Mashup and Popcorn by Liminal Labs
description:
Do you wish there were some middle-of-the-night place where you could grab a seat and let your mind be doubly warped? Liminal Labs has you covered! After dark, all night long starting at 9:15, Tuesday through Friday, we invite you to Mirror Movie Mashup, where daring cinephiles grab a seat and watch TWO movies at once on our luxurious 53 foot wide double screen / trailer! Think of it, BARBARELLA & LOGAN’S RUN! THE HUNGER & ONLY LOVERS LEFT ALIVE! DUMBO & CAROUSEL! REPO MAN & PULP FICTION! ESCAPE FROM NEW YORK & THE WARRIORS! STAR WARS & STAR TREK! Or talk us into showing your own mirrored movie picks from our extensive roster of fine films, tv shows and ridiculous youtube videos. All this and free popcorn, too!  No playa cinephile will walk away unsatisfied.  A roster of movie pairings is available at: http://www.zorca.com/liminallabs/mirrormovies or goo.gl/pJy4Fh

Also, do mornings on the playa find you a little dazed and hazy? From 11AM-1PM on Tuesday - Saturday, we happily throw open the Liminal Pharmakon where you are invited to choose from an apothecary menu full of salubrious nostrums, elixirs and vitamin-rich restoratives.
print_description: All night long starting 9:15 T-F, let your mind be doubly warped watching 2 movies at once (i.e. Barbarella vs. Logan's Run). Schedule: goo.gl/pJy4Fh

title: More than just one word on Plastics
description: Plastics: we love them and hate them. Rebecca Braslau, organic chemistry professor at UC Santa Cruz, will discuss the history of plastics, what they are made of, health, environmental and societal issues, and exciting developments in emerging biosustainable and biodegradable plastics.

title: Morning Calm Meditation with Jhana
description: Unlock the heart, the mind and begin your playa day with us.  Jhana will lead a morning meditation session based on True Meditation by Adya Shanti from the Bay area.   This is a meditation method that honors primordial silence that is within us.  No fancy mantras or visualization techniques or lotus position required.  All we need is our sincerity and willingness to close our eyes, breathe and surrender.  We will dive deeply into the collective silence allowed by the group and gain new perspectives and vantage points in life.  Come join us and let go of the things and ourselves that hindered us.
print_description: Unlock the heart, the mind, and begin your playa day with us.

title: Navigating Altered States & Ayahuasca
description:
Imagine, you’ve just met someone you’re highly attracted to. You’re having a wonderful conversation and you feel the excitement building in your chest.  You’re at the point where you know you want to take it to the next level. It’s the moment of no return. This moment of tension is both one of the hottest moments of attraction and potentially one of the most awkward.  

How do you know if the other person is at the same desire level? How do you assess their openness to touch, to a kiss, or more? A kiss or initial touch is relatively low stakes, but what happens when things heat up? What happens when you’ve just overstepped a line and can feel their withdrawal?  

These nuanced moments of initial sexual attraction can be the hottest of our lives. But we’re never really taught how to navigate highly sexually charged moments with someone completely new.  What does it mean to fully take responsibility for these moments so that when we’re done everyone involved feels totally awesome?   

In this workshop you will get a much deeper understanding of the nuances of initiating and negotiating hot and sexy connections. 

-Boost your sexual self-confidence
-Know how to feel your “fuck yes!” and your “Oh no!” and everything in between.
-Understand when and how to bring up "the conversation" so you don’t deflate all the sexual turn-on!
-Gain clear sexy communication skills to keep it hot while still conveying important information.
-And learn the number 1 reason why these skills will make you the sexiest person on earth!
print_description: Meriana will share tools on navigating altered states of consciousness & Aya which will enrich your psychonautic tool kit & empower your inner shaman.

Discuss whether a robot could have a heart, grok the potential of alien social structures, consider what it would be like to be a Betazoid or bring up anything else your nerdy minds hunger for!

title: Neti's (naked) Nose Spa!

title: Nightly "Celluloid" Debauchery - Back Alley Cinema
description:
The Back Alley Cinema (located appropriately enough behind the Black Rock City Self Service Abortion Clinic) has been providing literally dozens of burners with nightly entertainment, intermittently, since 2009.  Now a part of the Cult of the Magic Lady!

Come plop yourself down on a couch... or on a fellow burner... or on a fellow burner ON a couch..  Enjoy fresh popped corn in the middle of nowhere.  Programming varies but, with a library of terabytes of entertainment onhand, is bound to be... entertaining to someone.  Bring a friend!  Or two!  Maybe even three, but let's not overdo it, we usually don't have THAT much room.

Everyone has to grow tired of nonstop raving now and again (I think... Do you?  Honestly, I wouldn't know... Never really was my thing...  Which is why I run a theater... in a desert..  Oh crap, I think I may have gotten off track...) so take a night off and JOIN US...

Free intoxicants for the kids!  (No, not really... I'm actually just amazed at how many characters I'm allowed to type in this section...  Really.  I've only just passed the halfway point.  Isn't that nuts?  How are you to be expected to come up with so much to say, really...?)

Previous nights have included: Dude Night (Tron, The Fisher King, The Big Lebowski), Musical Night (Repo: The Musical, Tommy, Suck)... Some nights we don't even HAVE themes!  (Because, you know... Burning Man...  Plans vaporize!)

So be sure to visit us at some point in your travels.  You can also get yourself loaded at the Koi Lounge, and of course HAVE AN ABORTION... Or two... Or three! (You slut, but we don't do shame because.... What's the point?)
print_description:
"Live people ignore the strange and unusual..."  Why be like them?
Nightly double/triple features of cult/oddities/what-have-you... MOVIES! POPCORN!

title: "Now we dance! Now we fight" Dance/Fight! Party!
description:
Come dance, (pillow) fight, and dance again on rapid rotation to high-energy flamenco according to the whims of our Dancefightmeister B Riles! Also, drinks during intermissions. 

It started with a vision. A vision of Germans in a slightly alternate dimension. A dimension where the only way to dance to German techno was under the strict supervision of a leader. The leader would announce "And now we dance!" and they dance dance dance, only to be followed by "And now we fight!" whereupon a raging fist fight would break out. Soon enough, the leader barks "And now we dance!", fists are dropped, and they stomp dance once more. 

It was a very silly vision. And now we bring this vision to you. Join us and alternate between internal states of joy and (joyful) rage as rapidly as we alternate between dancing and (pillow) fighting. Pillows provided.
print_description: Come dance, (pillow) fight, and dance again on rapid rotation to high-energy flamenco according to the whims of our Dancefightmeister!. Also, drinks.

title: NurtureDance
description: Nurturedance is a movement form that provides methods for making safe, loving, and nurturing connections between people. By holding, rocking, and cradling each other, a direct path is formed to deep and visceral experiences of nurturance. Some of the movements we do induce mutual trance states by using repetitive circular motion. A hug that evolves into a spiral that is so safe and supported that we enter graceful states of consciousness. If you are looking for ways to enhance your relationship with your partner, this may be useful. Relating in non-verbal, non-linear fashion can have an effect of breaking through barriers of relating on new and different levels. People report that using these methods deepens and re-invigorates their relationship.
print_description: Make safe, loving and nurturing connections in dance by holding, rocking and cradling eachother

title: Open Dungeon Play
description: we're very excited as this will be Playfully Yours 14th year on the playa. We have expanded our play area with more than doubling the size. We offer an outdoor play area, a covered open area, and new to our camp, an enclosed area offering privacy out of sight from passerbyers. We invite everyone but especially beginners and those curious about BDSM play to come and play in a safe, non-pressured, and supervised environment to learn and experience dungeon play. As our name implies (Playfully Yours), we focus on the lighter, more sensual, and playful side of BDSM. The dungeon is well equipped with 3 St Andrews Crosses, a seated cross, 2 benches, a kneeling spanking/flogging bench, a standing spanking/flogging bench, a suspension station, 2 padded saw horses, a standing/kneeling stock, an 8' chain spider web, and a petting cage. We offer several toys to come and experience and play with such as feathers, a variety of floggers, paddles, crops, pinwheels, fur gloves, and a violet wand. Our personnel are available to provide instruction and demonstration on the safe use of the equipment and will supervise all play. We also have a lounge area where you can relax and meet our campmates while checking out our camp. The lounge has a spanking bike, a corn hole bean bag game, lounge chairs, a mini bar serving our cherry bombs for those over 21 years old with id, as well as, a spinning wheel to facilitate participation.  There are also daily scheduled classes with demonstrations and audience participation. We'll have an Intro Into Dungeon Play and a Shibari Sexy Body Rope Tying classes. We also have gifting of collars, paddles and patches. Our hours accommodate those coming in an play both day and night, generally from noon to about 3 am.
print_description: Open dungeon play. We expanded our dungeon play area and equipment and can provide instruction, supervision, and facilitate play in a safe environment

title: Opening the Third Eye
description:
Clairvoyance (clear vision) is a natural soul talent. Most people spend a good deal of energy trying to ignore the images that flood their internal screens, clutter their minds and stir up their emotions. But throughout the ages, there will always be creative people who practice opening the third eye in order to see into the depths of this world and to explore other dimensions. Craig will teach powerful ways of opening up one's awareness to higher vision to receive insight and to shine with healing light.
This workshop will offer practical techniques for developing an enhanced ability to see psychically while being supported by intuitive sensing, the inner voice, and sensory feelings for verification. You will also learn methods for seeing energy, viewing facial changes that reveal past lives, perceiving spiritual beings, and gazing into a portal to higher dimensions - all with your eyes wide open. 

www.higherselfdiscovery.com
print_description: If your third eye hasn't opened any by Friday, then maybe we should pry it open...or Craig's approach is gentler - and more effective ;-)

title: Opening your Heart
description:
A powerful mini-workshop with Craig Junjulas. Just as opening the third eye center can bring about amazing positive changes in a person’s personal and spiritual life, the act of opening the heart center can bring about an increase in understanding, compassion, empathy, self healing and enlightenment. An open heart allows you to feel protected without shutting down your emotions or closing yourself off to others. By expanding your heart and filling your aura with light, you are actually more protected and more open to the higher frequencies in any environment. Metaphysical techniques and energy demonstrations for bringing the body, mind and spirit into heart centeredness will be offered. 
www.higherselfdiscovery.com
print_description: Come let Craig help you open your heart and smooth over any rough edges in life :-)

title: Open Relationships as a Path of Love and Truth
description:
This workshop will explore how open relationships can be way to transform the opposition between Freedom and Love into the mutual support of Love and Truth. 

Many people in relationships struggle to reconcile their Love for each other and desire for deep partnership with their desire for the Freedom to connect intimately with others. The default model for relationship in our society, monogamy, makes explicit the underlying belief that Freedom and Love exist in opposition with each other.

But what if our desire for Freedom in relationship is covering a deeper desire, namely that we want to know, and be assured, that we can speak and honor our deepest Truths, and Desires, even, and especially, while in we are in Loving committed partnerships. So what if, instead of talking about Freedom, we talked how to create a relationship where it's safe to speak our Truths, including all of our desires (even for others), and know that we will still be Loved?

Join us for a conversation about how open relationships can be created from a place deep Love and commitment to Truth.
print_description: This workshop will explore how open relationships can transform the opposition between Freedom and Love into the mutual support of Love and Truth.

title: OSHO Kundalini Meditation
description: Osho Kundalini Meditation is a 1-hour active meditation consisting of 4 stages. Being fully immersed in the shaking and dancing of the first two stages helps to “melt” the rock-like being, wherever the energy flow has been repressed and blocked. Then that energy can flow, dance and be transformed into bliss and joy. The last two stages enable all this energy to flow vertically, to move upwards into silence.

title: OUR FUTURE IS FEMALE
description:
The threat of nuclear war, the next extinction level event,
catastrophic climate change, corporate compromise of our
food supply, and economic enslavement, all point to the
unsustainability of our current trajectory. With all of
humanity's advances, why can't we achieve peace and
prosperity for all? The underlying cause of our failure might
be gender inequity: women are our most underutilized natural
resource. Past societies which overcame war and poverty
were governed similarly to ours, with one difference-- the
existence of a fourth branch, consisting of post-menopausal
women only. Following this historical precedent, how can we
restore women's voice in government? And, can we do it in
time?
print_description: How Women (and men) Will Save the World

title: OUR FUTURE IS FEMALE - Paradigm-shattering speech
description: Playa Nai`a NEWLIGHT elucidates the path to a sustainable trajectory of peace and prosperity, echoing successes of past civilizations.

Then join us at Camp Beaverton in our Beaver Dome for this workshop. We will open with heartfelt sharing about our relationships with masturbation, address the stigmas faced in society, and open ourselves to understanding why and how we pleasure ourselves. Once we are all comfortable, we will start exploring our bodies. We will keep our hands to ourselves and power up our bullets, magic wands, rabbits, or other fun battery-operated toys. We will not be able to provide much AC power for the Hitachis so if you have an extra generator, please bring it to help charge up those in need! title: Party like Royals Happy Afternoon
description:
Every day is a celebration! Come by the Champagne Lounge for your daily dose of bubbly fun. We’ll will be quenching your champagne thirst with a noon-3:00 happy afternoon. Not in the mood for bubbles? Grab some friends and take a shotski. 

WEDNESDAY: Kings and Queens come and go, but parties are forever. Come dressed as your favorite monarch (extra points if you have wings) and live the high life sipping champagne.

title: Party Naked and Get Lei'd
description: Party Naked Tiki Bar is a clothing optional bar returning to the Playa for our seventh year to provide “Tiki Punch” libations to thirsty Black Rock City citizens 21 and over. You must be 21 or over to Party here and we do ask for and check ID's (it's always good to carry your ID while at Burning Man). We start the mornings with Bloody Mary's at 9:00am until we run out. We then dispense our "Tiki Punch" (yes, it has a punch) well into the night. Nudity is never required but at Party Naked Tiki Bar it is rewarded. This year we have 1800+ hand painted commemorative leis to give to citizens that "do it" (get naked). Make sure to come by early and get lei'd. We promote a no pressure relaxed atmosphere where you can get naked or not. Nude is not lewd so uninvited touching is prohibited. Come by for a cool drink where you can sit and chat or meet new people. Enjoy our classic rock atmosphere music and a little shade in the heat of the day. Be LNT friendly and bring your own cup please.
print_description: Serving cold Tiki Punch to BRC citizens 21+ for 7 years. Have a seat, enjoy the rock, get naked here & you may get lei'd. Please bring own cup and ID.

title: Peace Letters and Prayer Flags
description:
Sit down and write a letter, the Art of Letter Writing is not dead!
 Write a letter to your younger self, your future self, a family
 member, politician, organization, corporation, a Letter for Peace,
 emotional purge what ails you... You can write anything.  When was the
 last time you sat down with a pen and paper and wrote a letter?  Just
 sit down, relax, and write. Then get your creative juices flowing and create a prayer flag for peace.
print_description:
Write a letter to your younger/future self, family member, whom ever.
A letter of peace; an emotional purge. Create a prayer flag for peace.

title: Peak experiences and non-ordinary conscious states
description: Love Bubble Camp invites you to join in this salon-style conversation around the many forms of non-ordinary states of consciousness as we explore meditation, shamanism, breathing techniques, psychedelics, sacred sexuality, yoga, and other pathways. What are they? How do they work? What are the experiences? What can we learn? And how do we integrate these rare peak experiences into our default daily life?
print_description: Explore meditation, shamanism, breathing techniques, psychedelics, sacred sexuality, yoga, etc. The practice, the experience, how to integrate?

title: PEDALBUMP Derby Races under the BIG TOP
description:
RED NOSE DISTRICT presents PEDALBUMP Demolition Derby Races under the Big Top Circus tent. Is it a race? Is it a demolition derby? IT's BOTH! Or Neither. 

Several Riders PEDAL AND DRIVE head-to-head around a 60 x 90 foot track under the gorgeous CIRCUS TENT with LIGHTS, MUSIC and ANNOUNCERS! Our BUMPER CARTS are custom designed and one-of a kind! It's like driving your own personal pedal powered art car for 3 minutes or however long you last. The TENT is a SHADY OASIS in the DAY and a LIT-UP BEACON of fun at NIGHT!

 Winners of each race are determined by a mysterious mix of whatever the announcers at the time deem worthy. Is it the number of rear end or T-bone collisions you make happen? or maybe how many crashes you nimbly avoid with expert driving skills. Or maybe your winning attitude. Or your crazy costume. Maybe you cross the finish line first. Maybe you cross it last or not at all. You might still be a WINNER. We're betting on it! KIDS tall enough to pedal are welcome. Adults of ALL AGES brave or timid welcome. ALL Spectators welcome too! Come into the center ring and heckle your friends in the races!

PEDALING is FUN but BUMPING is EVEN BETTER! Seriously, the bumpers keep you safe and you will laugh your ass off with every bump, crash, skid or pass. 

We also welcome volunteers who want to help with PIT CREW duties! Wrangle the crowds, heckle the riders, keep the pedal carts repaired. Sign up for our newsletter on our FB page or just stop by anytime we are live on Playa!
print_description: RED NOSE DISTRICT presents PEDALBUMP demolition Derby "Races" under the Big Top Circus tent. Is it a race? Is it a demolition derby? IT's BOTH!

title: Pedal Pie's Pizza Oven on wheels
description: Sing a song, act a skit, or get on your knees and proposition us to skip the lines that form around the block when our bicycle-towed mobile wood-fired pizza oven fires up and starts churning out authentic wood-fired pizzas when you are least expecting it, such as at Daft Punk's DJ set at the trash fence on Friday night, make-your-own pizza at BRC Farmer's Market, and at our village party in Home Rule Village on whatever the fuck night of the week that's happening. Voted #1 comfort food at the Burning Man event 21 years running, Pedal Pies are celebrating their 2nd year on Playa, and firmly believe in the following 3 principles of the event: Look good, have fun, profit.
print_description: Keep your eyes (and nose) peeled for our mobile pizza oven that churns out authentic wood-fired pizzas and is transported around the playa on bicycle.

title: Perceptual Modulation and Prosthetic Environments
description: Learn about ongoing research into Technology-Enabled Prosthetic Environments (TEPE) for the  severely autistic.  TEPEs use perceptual modulation, radical translation and human-AI teaming and have the potential to allow autistic individuals to become more independent, and the neuro-typical to better understand the unique and amazing minds of the neurally diverse.
print_description: Learn about ongoing research to support the neuro-diversity movement and create technology-enabled prosthetic environments for the  severely autistic.

title: Pharmakon Apothecary by Liminal Labs
description: Do mornings on the playa find you a little dazed and hazy? Liminal Labs has you covered! From 11AM-1PM on Monday - Saturday, we happily throw open the Liminal Pharmakon where you are invited to choose from an apothecary menu full of salubrious nostrums, elixirs and vitamin-rich restoratives.  Also, do you wish there were some middle-of-the-night place where you could grab a seat and let your mind be doubly warped?  After dark, all night long starting at 9:15, Tuesday through Friday, we invite you to Mirror Movie Mashup, where daring cinephiles grab a seat and watch TWO movies at once (i.e. BARBARELLA & LOGAN’S RUN)! http://www.zorca.com/liminallabs/mirrormovies

title: Pigmalions' Legendary Bacon & Bloody Mary Shindig
description: Don’t be a Boar all by yourself, come play with the Pigs! We’ve been hosting our famous daytime party on the Playa for well over a decade. Our fabulous bartenders hog-craft each and every Bloody Mary we make with over 10 different ingredients. Sizzling strips of pork are hoof-served to the squealing swine wallowing on our shaded sofas.  All vegetarians are welcomed (to be converted) at our event. Get your trotters tapping with DJ Julio playing some of the best (and obscure) disco you’ll ever hear. It kicks off around 11-ish in the morning. Just bring a cup and a smile.  It’ll be sooieet.
print_description: Dont be a Boar, come play with the Pigs. We hog-craft each Bloody Mary and hoof-serve bacon to the squealing swine. Just bring a cup. It'll be sooieet

title: Pig Roast [dance] Party
description:
Join us for the annual Preservation Society Pig Roast Party on Friday night -- slow-roasted 60 lbs hog, lamb grilled to savory perfection, and a cornucopia of succulent flora. Not to mention drink, DJs, dancing and excellent company into the night and beyond. This year's party is also a celebration of the wedding of two members of our amazing community. 

If you are lucky enough to have visited the Preservation Society as a young hooligan, then wherever you go it stays with you, for the Society is a movable feast.
print_description: Annual PS Pig Roast: 60 lbs hog+lamb grilled to perfection & cornucopia of succulent flora. Not to mention drink, DJs and dancing late into the night

Our gang of revelers will fashion one of a kind works of night light-art to attach to your ensemble or eccentric hairstyle (also created by us) to ensure you are well-lit and bewitching for the evening. The batteries and LED lights will last the entire week creating safer Burners when the Playa turns dark. What better way to get noticed and these artfully crafted pieces make the best Playa keepsakes. We will ensure our new friends and neighbors are safe and smoking hot for the evening. So come and enjoy our new Weinkeller - and get perfectly playafied and ready for the night to party! Monday: Sangria - Wednesday: White Wine - Thursday: Red Wine - Friday: Bubblies (Champagne). You have be twenty-one (21) to drink @ ShangriLaLa. Love & Light!

title: Pinhole Project
description:
The Pinhole Project exposes 30 x 40 inch sheets of light sensitive gelatin silver paper. We work with 12 pinhole cameras, created out of 50-gallon cardboard barrels. This size is uniquely suited for capturing the incredible scale and immense diversity of art and culture at Black Rock City. 

Under the red safelights of the darkroom, photosensitive paper is inserted into the camera body. Exposures range from 40 to 300 seconds, where concentrated beams of sunlight are funnelled through the pinhole and into the camera, creating a negative image of the recorded subject.

We maintain a desert darkroom in a shipping container, where we gather to processes, develop and fix about one hundred photographs each Burning Man. These unique images are then exhibited in Illumination Village, Center Camp Cafe, and off-playa.

The pinhole camp has been creating large-scale portraits with festival participants since 1999. The pinhole came about of the desire of four first time participants to contribute in a unique and lasting way to the ephemeral pleasures of the playa.

As we have grown, so too has our belief that this device is the reason that we make our annual pilgrimage. As we have evolved, so too has the camera, not only in functional and technical capabilities but also in its role as a seed of meaningful engagement with other participants.
print_description: Come and join the Pinhole Project expose huge 30 x 40 inch sheets of light sensitive gelatin silver paper in 50 gallon cameras.

title: Playa Scavener Hunt
description: Feeling adventurous? Think you can handle a quest through the treacherous land of Black Rock City? Then the Vagabonds & Tagalongs Scavenger Hunt is for you! The rules are simple: pick up your quest from camp, complete the quest, return to camp to collect your reward. This quest line has a series of tasks and questions to answer as you go. Some quest items will be silly, some reflective, some outright ridiculous. This perilous journey will challenge your creativity, courage, and perseverance as you battle the elements and experience all that the playa has to offer. Those who survive and return to V&T will be compensated in gifts and cherished as champions of the V&T community!

title: Ploetry I & II
description:
Come meet the artists AND create next year's Ploem. Ploetry is inspirational prose cut out from planks of wood, hung from a 5-sided city-shaped tower, with color-changing backlight and custom seating. This year there are two towers, "I Am But Wood", a poem written from the point of view of the Man, and "Voice of the Temple", written from the point of view of the Temple. Next year, we want to add more Ploems, scattered as Easter Eggs around the Playa. Forms available to write and submit your own ploem 24 hours a day, and we'll post it on the Ploetry website.
Write a ploem, build an installation, or both - we'll show you how. This is a workshop - all building is done off-season, off-playa. But take your inspiration to write your Ploem while in Black Rock City! *** Please note that this event takes place at the tower in the Cafe, not the tower on the open playa. *** MWF 11-noon, TT 5pm-6m, in the large Ploetry installation in Center Camp Cafe.
print_description: Ploetry (Playa Poetry) is cut from planks of wood hung from a backlit tower. Meet the artists, join the team, write next year's "ploem". In the cafe.

title: Polyamory – Does this really work?
description:
Two Globe traveling 5 Rhythms and Tantra teachers who are widely practiced in the poly lifestyle come together to share their highlights, low lights, what they have learned along the way and what they wish they had not!

Come learn some pro tips and bring your questions. This is about sharing and listening to each other. We are all figuring this out and doing the best we can. Eugene & Mackenzie are as eager to talk about the challenges as they are to share in the joys.

We will have a little movement exercise to ground into presence in our bodies, as that is the best way to open to the true questions which reflect our heart's yearning and fears.

This will be a thoughtful, provocative and fun gathering. Let us learn from each other and in the end open to the possibility of more love, however it looks for us individually.
print_description: Let's talk about Polyamory - Come listen, learn some pro tips & have YOUR questions answered! Bring your curiosity and let us learn together!

title: Poly Friendly Mixer/Social
description: A mixer for poly and like minded folks to meet, chat and make some new friends ... Or more. Beer – Wine- Soda provided. Come and hang out for a drink & a chat.
print_description: A mixer for poly and like minded folks to meet, chat and make some new friends ... Or more. Beer – Wine- Soda provided. Come and hang out for a drink.

title: Poly High Tea
description:
Just what is Poly High Tea? - First, it's a Tea Party. We will be serving Tea and Cookies...

All you Polyamorous, poly-curious, and poly-friendly folks out there on the playa are invited to join us for a discussion about the practical issues of loving more than one in an open, responsible multi-person relationship. There are many workable forms of Polyamorous relationship - polyamory is polymorphic! There is much wisdom in the poly community which can be helpful to people trying to make *any* relationship work, monogamous or Polyamorous. There will be a facilitated discussion in which you can get your questions addressed and some of the knowledge in our community can be shared.

If you'd like to cool off and de-dust yourself after our tea party, bring a water donation to enjoy PolyParadise's famous Human Carcass Wash.
print_description: All you Polyamorous-poly-curious, and poly-friendly folks out there on the playa are invited to join us for a discussion about the practical issues.

title: Poni Brendan Rockin On The Playa
description:
Female singer songwriter direct from Maui, playing upbeat funky tunes about love, partying, and living a semi normal life on planet earth. Poni Brendan approaches the guitar with a commanding attitude, while her femininity comes through in the raw truth, of her lyrics. From her personal love songs, to her thoughts of the world and its political turmoil. "Brendan has the ability to weave in and out of different styles not binding her to any one particular genre".

"Rarely do we find a female artist with both voice, and rhythm, who is also as prolific a songwriter."

title: Proper Fire Safety Discussion
description:
Some things really should be proper... stop by Camp Proper (7:15 and D) at 2pm on Monday for a short "Fire Safety" discussion. Want to learn what to wear before lighting up those new poi? Come on by! Want the best answer to the age old question -- my friend just lit someone on fire with his Dragon Staff, what should I do? We can help! Want to learn some tips on how to spin out properly on the playa? Or, here's an often-asked question: how far should I stand from my dip bucket while smoking? We've got you covered!

This will be an informal discussion and might be especially useful to those who are new to the fire arts.

title: Raving Stick Workshop At The Castle
description:
Have you ever been at a festival and looked on in awe as some guy raves to his heart’s content while carrying a glittery lampshade on a stick? Maybe it was a branch of a tree with a piece of tinsel wrapped around it? Possibly you’ve been mesmerized by one of those floating jellyfish on Burn Night?

Well – if the jellyfish is your thing then you probably need to come back for the advanced class next year. But random objects hanging from sticks covered in lights and glittery things… that’s totally our thing! That, my friend, is what we call a “raving stick” and no self-respecting raver should venture out onto the playa at night without one.

Come for an interactive, playa punch-infused lesson in the art of raving stick making, featuring group discussions and plenty of one on one time with our experienced teachers. We’ll round off the afternoon with a delightful presentation on the history of the raving stick - you simply won’t believe some of the famous names you’ll hear!

Raving stick materials will be provided on the day by Celtic Chaos, but attendees are more than welcome to bring along their own personal additions. And the best part is that each person gets to leave with the raving stick that they make... but not until they partake in a collective stick-shaking rave-off inside The Castle!
print_description: Raving stick: the art of hanging colorful objects on a stick and proceeding to rave. Come play make and do, drink punch and then rave in The Castle!

title: Reclaim Your Feminine Sexuality
description: This workshop guides women through a series of movements and offerings to reclaim sensuality and sexuality for themselves in a safe space, while rediscovering their personal experience of pleasure. Women's psyches are bombarded with notions of what sexy is, disconnecting us from the experience of what it feels like in our own bodies. No more shall we allow for our bodies to be used as marketing schemes to fulfill viewer‚Äôs fantasies. Now is the time to reclaim the power of our sexuality, to reconnect with our feminine sensuality and to offer ourselves the gift of deep pleasure and embodiment.
print_description: Reconnect with the power of your sensuality and sexual embodiment through a series of guided movements and offerings. Women only.

title: Recycle Your Aluminum Cans!!!
description: Black Rock City is a "Pack It In, Pack It Out", Leave No Trace city. There are no trash cans or recycling bins. You are responsible for disposing of waste properly. Do you want to reduce the amount of recycling you will have to pack out? Start by bringing all of your beverages in aluminum cans. Follow that by separating your your aluminum cans and other recyclables from any landfill trash. Bring your aluminum cans to Black Rock City Recycle Camp. We are located in Center Camp at 6:00, directly behind the Cafe. The camp is "Open" and ready to accept your aluminum cans Monday through Sunday, 9am to 5pm. Bring your clean, separated aluminum cans only. We definitely don't want your trash. We do not accept any other recyclables, you can take them to one of the 24 hour recycling stations on your way back to Reno, check out your Survival Guide for more information. We provide a sorting area to check your cans for anything that isn't aluminum. You can ride the bike powered can crusher and crush your cans. After your cans get crushed, you will put your crushed cans into the large containers at the camp. All proceeds from the aluminum are donated to the Gerlach K-12 School in Gerlach, NV. Come join in the fun while doing a good thing for the planet and Black Rock City..!!!
print_description: Recycle Camp is in Center Camp at 6:00, directly behind the Cafe. We are open & excited to accept your aluminum cans 9am to 5pm Monday through Friday.

title: RED NOSE DISTRICT presents PEDALBUMP
description: RED NOSE DISTRICT presents PEDALBUMP Demolition Derby Races under the Big Top Circus tent. Is it a race? Is it a demolition derby? IT's BOTH! Or Neither. Several Riders PEDAL AND DRIVE head-to-head around a 60 x 90 foot track under the gorgeous CIRCUS TENT with LIGHTS, MUSIC and ANNOUNCERS! Our BUMPER CARTS are custom designed and one-of a kind! It's like driving your own personal pedal powered art car for 3 minutes or however long you last. The TENT is a SHADY OASIS in the DAY and a LIT-UP BEACON of fun at NIGHT! Winners of each race are determined by a mysterious mix of whatever the announcers at the time deem worthy. Is it the number of rear end or T-bone collisions you make happen? or maybe how many crashes you nimbly avoid with expert driving skills. Or maybe your winning attitude. Or your crazy costume. Maybe you cross the finish line first. Maybe you cross it last or not at all. You might still be a WINNER. We're betting on it! KIDS tall enough to pedal are welcome. Adults of ALL AGES brave or timid welcome. ALL Spectators welcome too! Come into the center ring and heckle your friends in the races! PEDALING is FUN but BUMPING is EVEN BETTER! Seriously, the bumpers keep you safe and you will laugh your ass off with every bump, crash, skid or pass. We also welcome volunteers who want to help with PIT CREW duties! Wrangle the crowds, heckle the riders, keep the pedal carts repaired. Sign up for our newsletter on our FB page or just stop by anytime we are live on Playa! GUEST HOST CREWS SCHEDULED: GATE  CREW is Representing on Tuesday night. MYSTIKAL MISFITS are representing on Wednesday night!
print_description: RED NOSE DISTRICT presents PEDALBUMP Demolition Derby Races under the Big Top Circus tent. Is it a race? Is it a demolition derby? IT's BOTH!

title: Relating from Our True Nature
description:
Relating from Our True Nature

This workshop is designed to be simultaneously deep and playful. We begin with a deep dive into our truth—our true nature—which is simply a letting go and a knowing of who we always already are, beyond our ideas about ourselves and others: a simple direct undeniable knowing of our clear deep heart-mind-being. 
We will ground ourselves in this present moment and connect with our higher self and cultivate our intentions, desires, and wishes for the night.
Using movement, stillness, and humor we bring awareness and acceptance to ourselves and our conditioning.
Through simple spontaneous body movements you embody and express your truth(s) and your true being. 
Finally we move into connecting and relating with each other while staying connected with our self. This process will be facilitated with some simple relating exercises and is a chance to see through our ego and conditioned habitual ways of relating and being. We invite a sense of humor to simply seeing ourselves and the conscious and unconscious games we play. 
Bringing awareness to our patterns opens the possibility of playing with them and responding from our clear deep heart mind space, rather than reacting. Respond from awareness rather than react from habits. We live from our true nature rather than our conditioning. We dance.
print_description: Dive deep into your true Self beyond thoughts, words and emotions.Learn to live and relate from your truths and stop identifying with fear/lack.

title: Release Breathing Exercise
description:
Let the shade and soft music melt away the stresses of the week. We will move us through a relaxation exercise to help us gain ultimate relaxation. 
Experiencing this exercise in your birthday suit is amazing but we do understand that not everyone is comfortable that way. You will not be turned away for wearing clothing to class!
Prize wheel spin off after class!

As you enter the schoolhouse, make sure to stop and get a class time snack 	
and some refreshing H2O to fuel your mind and body. 
Each attendee will also receive a souvenir that will be used to help us randomly pick lucky class attendees to spin the prize wheel. Each lucky spinner is guaranteed a great prize! Class participation is strongly encouraged. The School is a judgment free zone where everybody is welcome!
print_description: Move through a group breathing exercise that will help take you reach ultimate relaxation. Please bring your own pillow & sheet if desired.

title: Release from Bondage of Self
description: Bondage of Self is being a slave to the ego chatter and narrative.  It isn't even you.  It may be a part of a False Self generated long ago so you could 'be good'. Learn ways to gain release from this sad story line and be ultra present and the person you really are under all that fear.
print_description: Bound to an inner narrative that isn't any fun, puts you down, says you cant or why bother? Or need to 'be good'? Come learn how to kick this shit.

title: Releasing Energy Blocks
description:
Develop your own methods for releasing old energy patterns in your subconscious mind, aura and physical body. Craig Junjulas shares techniques for gradually releasing the compressed energy that blocks us from our higher potential. Advanced souls, star people, wisdom seekers, light workers, consciousness explorer, burners (or whatever creative people are called these days) brought down an abundance of past life talents (merit) at birth. Needing to hide these spiritual powers from society, they also brought down problems from the past lives, and chose childhood experiences, to block and hide these powers until ready to use them level-by-level. 

www.higherselfdiscovery.com
print_description: By Weds night, you'll be ready to let go of some stuff...Craig will help you to release energy blocks that are no longer serving you :-)

title: Retour du Trebuchet
description:
One of the world's largest siege weapons makes it's triumphant return to Burning Man. "The Trebuchet" is about 40 feet tall and has enough power and countereight to throw a piano hundreds of feet. Watch these pianos fly and come smashing to the ground! Much to everyones amazement, PLAYA RESTORATION will demonstrate how fast they can LEAVE NO TRACE, and make the ruble dissapear.
[Monday and Wednesday and Friday 5pm]
print_description: The DPW and DPW Playa Restoration have brought back the Trebuchet.  Come witness a piano reach low orbit only to smash to the ground, and dissapear!

title: Reverbia Jam & Chai
description: When the Night starts to chill…the warmth will thrill... at After Hours Jam and Chai. After Reverbia's Black Rock Night's Live Concert ends…transport a few steps over with us into our cozy, warm Embassy tent structure..where one of our amazing bands will perform a set in jam session format…as Blue Mountain or Fabian mixes up their battle of the Chai’s. The vibes will be high…with Jam and Chai!! *1 giant pot of Chai will be made nightly…bring your own small cup.
print_description: When the night starts to chill...the warmth will thrill. In our warm Embassy structure...amazing bands perform jam style sets while you sip our chai.

It takes 3 people to operate, and to play you need "tokens" which will be crushed beer cans!! We'll be handing out beer, and the goal is to get prizes off the trampoline. Yes, the bottom is a trampoline! The catch is you need to drink the booze before you start playing!

title: Rise N Shine Yoga
description: Come get playa ready! Stretch out those crampy muscles and get all loosy goosy for your adventures out on the playa! Learn stretches you can take with you and break out on any dance floor: use as needed.

title: Ritual Movement Arts- Aradia Sunseri
description:
An innovative blend of Hathaway Yoga, Temple Fusion Belly Dance & Ritual through the art of women's vitality practices using yogic principles.

RITUAL MOVEMENT ARTS (R.M.A) With Aradia Sunseri
An innovative blend of Hatha Yoga, Temple Fusion Belly Dance & Ritual Theatre. 

We will explore the art of women’s vitality practices 
focused on:
~Creating, cultivating & nurturing your personal practice: 
~Inner yoga’s 
~ Temple Fusion Belly dance
~Breathe work
~Meditation
~Mudras
~Isolations, drills,Layering
~Theatrical presence, flourishes

Focusing on dancing from the core. Opening the body with yogic principles to deepen your connection to your dance. With presence fluidity and slinky theatrical moves. Exploring intricate mudras, and choreography while activating the creative soul seat of each individual’s personal transformative power. Tune in with your inner archetypal energy and the art of storytelling through the eyes, hips, & heart. These vitality practices offer connection to ones own essence and cultivate enjoyment of the body in motion while sharing in a community of sisterhood.
print_description: An innovative blend of Hathaway Yoga, Temple Fusion Belly Dance & Ritual through the art of women's vitality practices using yogic principles.

title: River of Life  Shamanic Journey
description: Come with us on a journey wIth your Power Animal on a very special voyage up the River of Life -- an opportunity for profound self-awareness, healing and actualization. You should already know your power animal and have journeyed shamanically before attempting this exercise.
print_description: Journey with your Power Animal on a voyage up the River of Life -- an opportunity for profound self-healing and actualization.

title: Roasted Breaux and Coffee Heaux
description:
Roasted Breaux & Coffee Heaux Coffee Camp will be open on Monday, Wednesday & Friday from 2-4 PM for your afternoon pick-me-up.  Create your own unique blend of coffee from our selection of international Playa-roasted coffee, grind your beans, and enjoy it served pour-over style.  Sit, relax and chill with friends new and old in our Arabian-inspired coffee house lounge. 
We will be roasting coffee at various times during the week so you won't find a fresher cup of coffee in BRC, or anywhere!!!  
If you would like, please join in and help us roast our next batch of Roasted Breaux and Coffee Heaux Playa-blend.  Ask about coming by and roasting your own on-the-Playa beans to bring back to the default world (a little Playa dust is the secret ingredient!), or help us gift coffee to the burners who serve our community.  
In the LNT (Leave No Trace) spirit, please remember to bring your own cup.  Or you may have to play a special carnival game to "earn" one...
print_description: Roasted Breaux & Coffee Heaux-Monday, Wednesday & Friday 2-4 PM. Create your own blend of international, Playa-roasted coffee. Join in roasting too!!!

title: Roasted Breauxs & Coffee Heauxs  Coffee Camp
description: Roasted Breauxs & Coffee Heauxs HalfAss CoonAss Coffee Company camp will be serving up fresh roasted coffee that we roast on the playa .  We serve our coffee pour over style and encourage our guest to select their roasted beans and grind up their own personal cup of after noon joe.
print_description: Roasted Breauxs & Coffee Heauxs HalfAss CoonAss Coffee Co. Camp  will serve up fresh roasted on the Playa coffee in the PM for your mid day bump.

title: Robot Santa vs Santa 3: THE FINAL BATTLE
description:
This is it! This is the last time these two will meet in battle. The conclusion! 3 years in the making! Who will live, die, and be changed forever! 

Last time Santa was beaten. What have been the results of that defeat? Will Black Rock be mechanized since Robot Santa has ruled Christmas?
print_description: This is it! This is the last time these two will meet in battle. The conclusion! 3 years in the making! Who will live, die, and be changed forever!

title: Rock and Roll HIIT
description: Get your HIIT on with this fun and intense workout.  High Intensity Interval Training involves doing 8 to 10 bodyweight exercises, 20 to 30 seconds each, at maximum performance level.  It is excellent for building athletic capacity and strength, improving metabolism, and burning fat.  Plus, with our sweet playlist of rockin' jams, this 30 minute workout will get you rocked and pumped!  Bring water, stay hydrated!
print_description: Get your HIIT on with this intense and fun workout.   Bring some water (and energy) and let's rock!

title: Roller Derby in the Dust

title: Rootist Yoga Practice
description:
"What is Rootism?" My response to this in short: Rootism is a belief that the truth of our learned existence lies in the Roots of all teachings/truths and beliefs. These truths are different for everyone based on how they we raised and what we resonate with at the time of our learning. As a Rootist, we take the roots of various truths and incorporate them into our own mantra, our own way of living, to become the well rounded person that we wish to be. When you resonate with more than one truth, you are a Rootist. There are many different types of Rootist's. You could be a Christian Rootist, a Buddhist Rootist, or any type of Rootist. The moment you resonate with more than one truth & take the roots of those teachings as your truths, you become a Rootist.

Rootism is a lesson that I have learned and come to resonate with over the last few years. I am grateful to share this information with each of you. Please feel free to share this with anyone with whom you feel might be interested.

As an offset of Rootism, we have The Rootist's Way. A style of yoga that is in-tentful in it's design and sequences to help to facilitate a certain type of energy clearing and calling in of new energies.

Thank you for reading this and for wanting to know more about Rootism.

The 8 Principles of Rootism:

∞Principles of Rootism™

1. Release what no longer serves - nurture yourself & ground yourself
2. Embrace a Creative Vision
3. Move forward on your journey -Take Steps Fearlessly
4. Empathize and Feel what is going on within you & others
5. Motivate yourself & others by Truth – Check the Ecology of the Whole
6. Bridge the Mind & the Heart
7. Evolve a Pro-Sociality Lifestyle & Manifest a Greater Humanity - help others and give back
8. Revolutionize - Reveal Yourself! Open UP! Inner Knowing is Outer Showing

The acronym is "Remember"
print_description: Rootism is a belief that the truth of our learned existence lies in the Roots of all teachings/truths and beliefs.

title: Root the Body, Release Ego, Ignite Power
description: Gift yourself the opportunity to flow through Burning Man from a place of groundedness, liberation and power. By tapping into the vulnerabilities experienced within our bodies, we can discover where pain and triggers are stored by the ego, allowing for us the ability to see them for what they are, liberate ourselves from them, and fully fill them with the light and power already existing within us. Release your greatest self out onto the playa through guided touch, divine creation and ecstatic movement.
print_description: Ground your body and liberate what separates you from its light and power through connection to touch, divine creation and ecstatic movement.

title: Rule-Breaking Evolutionary Love Relationships
description:
A practical guide to the shortest path to your higher self through the loving (and sometimes critical) eyes of your beloved.

Learn how to use romantic love to unwind and heal your historical pain (and your partners) to reveal your true self - more magnificent than you currently have the capacity to imagine - and dissolve the boundaries between purpose and money, sex and creativity, partnership and self, and unleash the power of dyadic leadership (using duality the way it was designed to be used!)

Taught by Jennifer Russell and Bryan Franklin, teachers and leaders-by-example of radical evolutionary love, as depicted by Android Jones in their now world-famous portrait and upcoming documentary by the same name, "Union."
print_description: A practical guide to the shortest path to your higher self through the loving (and sometimes critical) eyes of your beloved.

ALL WELCOME!

title: Sacred Hip Hop
description: Sacred Hip Hop is a special formula that combines a conscious spritual practice with a urban street style flow. Everything will kick off with a ceremonial ritual to open up the gateways for radical self-expression. We will be going over tutting, popping, breaking, waving, grooving, roboting and musicality. This class will break down these dance moves in a way all levels can reach. Together, we will build on the movements we’ve learn.

title: Salty Prom and Teen Pregnancy Practice Party
description:
By day Salty’s is your favorite neighborhood dive bar, but on Wednesday night things will get naughty-cal. The central dance floor will transform into a sea of grooving bodies at the inaugural Enchantment Under The Sea Party. You’ll enjoy our selection of cocktails at Salty Jack’s Oily Rig served up by the seamen and mermaids while DJs will be flooding the sound system with everything from midtempo breakbeat & electronic funk to classic soul, house & reggae. 

Stop by the on board “Bootie Bar” at Camp Salty where you make your own pearl necklace, or give one to that special someone (while supplies last). We’ve done the dirty work by digging up that rusty underwater treasure chest all you have to do is don your favorite seafoam bras and fish gill suits and get ready to go deep.
print_description: Things will be getting naughty-cal at Salty 's inaugural Enchantment Under The Sea Party! Join us for salty cocktails, groovy DJs & Bootie Bar treats

title: Salvador Dali Llama Live Psychedelic-Pop Band
description: Salvador Dali Llama is a psych-pop group from Sydney that formed in 2014 over a mutual love of wizard capes and Aretha Franklin. SDL have a reputation for a face melting live set and an eclectic mish mash of dreamy psych pop, gospel soul harmonies and eyeball spinning kraut jams. Whatever your vibe, SDL will help you float upstream.
print_description: Salvador Dali Llama: dreamy psych pop, gospel soul harmonies and eyeball spinning kraut jams. Whatever your vibe, SDL will help you float upstream!
