title: Samba Stilt Circus Sunset Jams at JankyTown
description:
Catch our sunset jams everyday. Samba Stilt Circus is back at Jankytown this year. JankyTown is an all-artist live-music and circus-arts village consisting of Samba Stilt Circus, Cirque du Cliché, Fou Fou Ha, and Ministry of Flow.  

This year we will feature a mobile stage epic art car - the Jankasaurus!!!   Catch our sunset almost jams everyday near the Esplanade (7ish) as well as roving live music and performance art. If we're not at camp, look for us on the Esplanade (around 7ish).
print_description: Catch our sunset jams everyday. If we're not at camp, look for us on the Esplanade (around 7ish), or on our mobile stage, The Jankasaraus.

title: Sanctuary of Self Unveiling
description: Come by and experience the Sanctuary of Self — an giant interactive wall of LED lights and sound. Ever wonder what a digital version of yourself would look like? Come gaze deeply in a mirror made of over 60,000 LED lights! Talk with the Deaf creators of the wall, sip on a margarita on the rocks, and shake your booty.
print_description: Come by and experience the Sanctuary of Self — a giant interactive wall of LED lights and sound.

title: Sand Ho Pyro Dept - Open Fire Spinning
description: Come get your spin on - Open call for all fire dancers to come make use of our interactive dance space! All props welcome, Please, bring your own fuel. We’ll have fueling stations set up, and our spin off structure is designed to keep the playa safe from excess fuel.
print_description: Come get your spin on - For all fire dancers to come make use of our interactive dance space! All props welcome, Please, bring your own fuel.

title: Sand Ho Pyro Dept - The Big Spin Party
description: It’s Friday night! Let’s burn some stuff! Bring out your biggest and baddest fire dancing props and show off your skills in our interactive dance space! Please, bring your own fuel. We’ll have fueling stations set up, plus our spin off structure is designed to keep the playa safe from excess fuel.
print_description: It’s Friday night! Let’s burn some stuff! Bring out your biggest & baddest fire dancing props & show off your skills in our interactive dance space!

title: Santa Cocktail Party
description: Are you a playa Santa?  Come on down to BMIR on Thursday from 4 to 6PM and be part of the biggest Santa gathering/cocktail party on the playa ever!
print_description: Are you a playa Santa?  Come on down to BMIR on Thursday from 4 to 6PM and be part of the biggest Santa gathering/cocktail party on the playa ever!
other_location: BMIR - Center Camp between Earth Guardians and Ranger HQ

title: Santa Rampage! to Camp Walter
description: Meet at Center Camp dressed in your best Santa Suit for the Santa Rampage to finish at Camp Walter's 5th Annual Pink Party!!
print_description: Meet at Center Camp dressed in your best Santa Suit for the Santa Rampage to finish at Camp Walter's 5th Annual Pink Party!!

title: Sarongs & Mai Tais
description: Early Burner Special! Join us to celebrate the Gate at the Tropical Treehouse.  Paddle up to the tiki torches Sunday night for a sarong, a hug, and a mai tai.  Just park it people, you can always unpack tomorrow!  Aloha!
print_description: Join us to celebrate the Gate at the Tropical Treehouse.  Paddle up to the tiki torches Sunday night for a sarong, a hug, and a mai tai.

title: Sauna Dome
description: Empty your mind, purify your soul, feel amazing and refreshed at the Geodesic Sauna Dome. Six experienced “sauneers” have traveled from the land of 2.5 million saunas, Finland, to bring this hot and burning Sauna experience.
print_description: Empty your mind, purify your soul, feel amazing and refreshed at the Geodesic Sauna Dome. Six experienced “sauneers” and four different experiences.

title: Sauna Dome for Virgins
description: Sauna and drinks for the first timers! Empty your mind, purify your soul, feel amazing and refreshed at the Geodesic Sauna Dome.
print_description: Sauna and drinks for the first timers! Empty your mind, purify your soul, feel amazing and refreshed at the Geodesic Sauna Dome.

title: Saving the Planet
description: Earth is losing over 27,000 species per year in rain forest habitats alone. Globally there may be over 100,000 species sent to the brink every year. This isn’t because of planetary forces; this is because of us. There is one simple thing everyone can do, or else humans will take the whole world down.
print_description: Between 27,000 and 100,000 species are going extinct each year. There is a simple solution that every person can participate in.

title: Sax and Beats with DragonFly (Arnaud Teisseire)
description: LIVE MUSIC! Sax and Beats with DragonFly (Arnaud Teisseire)
print_description: LIVE MUSIC! Sax and Beats with DragonFly (Arnaud Teisseire)

title: Scalp Massage Train
description:
Come join the train, and let your Playa stresses melt away.
Aromatherapy and essential oils will be present!
print_description:
Come join the train, and let your Playa stresses melt away.
Aromatherapy and essential oils will be present!

title: Schoolyard and Mutoscopes
description:
Come and view the flicks at the schoolhouse, ratings PG-R from 9:00am - midnight and R-XXX from midnight to 9:00am the next morning. Flicks will be changed and rotated during these times so stop by and check out the new eye candy daily. Don’t forget to check out the mutoscope at Center Camp!
The schoolyard is yours for playing. Have fun posing with the sexual position cutouts, jumping rope with the assortment of provided jump ropes and hula-hoop your heart out! Please be sure to leave the playground equipment in the schoolyard for the enjoyment of all school kids.
print_description: Come and play your heart out with the playground equipment! While there, check out our mutoscope films that are changed daily.

title: Science in the Shade
description: Join us inside Zooplankton for SCIENCE!! We'll have specimens of Calocyclas monumentum, a microscopic species of protozoa which our macroscopic art is based off of for you to look at through a microscope. Inside Zooplankton we'll host science lectures throughout the week at 11am. Topics to include biology, climate change, archaeology, and the process of combining art and science to build Zooplankton. Other workshops and class schedules will be posted daily outside of Zooplankton and on a board at Zooplankton Art Support camp.
print_description: View microscopic plankton in a microscope and hear science lectures inside our macroscopic model of the same plankton. SCIENCE! Subjects posted daily.

title: Scintillating Stellar Supernova Space Scavenger Ex
description: Meet at Space Jam to begin the exploration of a lifetime. Bring a digital camera & bike. Prizes for creative & thorough scavengers!
print_description: Meet at Space Jam to begin the exploration of a lifetime. Bring a digital camera & bike. Prizes for creative & thorough scavengers!

title: Scotch and Hopping
description: Come one, come all and play historical, foreign and our own invented version of Hopscotch celebrating the fun of a simple children's game that shares a related name to a wonderful adult beverage, Scotch. How silly can a simple children’s game be. All ages welcome, 21+ for Scotch.
print_description: Play Hopscotch & celebrate the fun of a childs game that shares its name with Scotch! Hoppers get a tipple of scotch after hopping the course!

title: Scotchfest
description: Entry requires a bottle of unique single malt scotch (no blends), where you’ll join other like-minded fanatics for a once-a-year massive tasting that’ll blow you away. Remember:  “Great minds drink alike.”
print_description: Entry requires a bottle of unique single malt scotch (no blends), once-a-year massive tasting that’ll blow you away. “Great minds drink alike"

title: Scotch Tasting
description: Whit dae Scotts taste like? Na hauld yer horses that's th' other boozer ... Whit does Scotch taste like? Jyne us 'n' find oot.
print_description: Whit dae Scotts taste like? Na hauld yer horses that's th' other boozer ... Whit does Scotch taste like? Jyne us 'n' find oot.

title: Scrabble on Playa meeting at 6E
description:
Maybe play a few games near the corner and then head out to the Esplanade - see where the fun takes us. If you have a letter and can bring it, please do.  Come Play with us!!!  Any one who is willing to pARTicipate by taking photos would be greatly appreciated.

cya in the dust
print_description: Lit up scrabble letters to meet at 6E, Silicon Village Arch at 9ish Friday night the 4th.

title: Screw Top Wine Party
description: Sample the finest wines that screw. No corkers allowed. Bring your own screw top wine to share.
print_description: Sample the finest wines that screw. No corkers allowed. Bring your own screw top wine to share.

title: Sculpt Your Cock
description: Do you have a prize cock that is a work of art and should be on display? Get your penis cast and turned in to a sculpture by artist Lily Priest. All penises: sizes, shapes should be celebrated. Needed: hard cocks and fluffers. Participants only. 18+ bring ID
print_description: Do you have a prize cock that is a work of art and should be on display? Get your penis cast and turned in to a sculpture by artist Lily Priest. 18+

title: Sean and Alannas Wedding
description: Hi Everyone! alanna and I will be tying the knot in front of our dome at 8:00pm on Wednesday. We're planning to have a short ceremony with reverend Bobo followed by the flower toss, toasts, cake and dancing. Everything is bring your own cup bowl fork BM style
print_description: Wedding celebration and dance With a burning man twist

title: Sea Prom
description: Third annual lost city of Camp Atlantis prom. Dress in your mer-best and come to the deep sea for some deep house.
print_description: Third annual lost city of Camp Atlantis prom. Dress in your mer-best and come to the deep sea for some deep house.

title: Sea Shanty Singing
description: Because songs about the ocean are exactly what we need in the desert! Lyrics and songs provided, both from our own repertoire and from Rise Up Singing. Songs are all ages for the 1st hour.
print_description: Because songs about the ocean are exactly what we need in the desert! Lyrics and songs provided. Songs are all ages for the 1st hour.

title: Seattle Fire Conclave Demo[lition]stration
description: The Emerald City Fire Conclave is going to practice their man burn routine in front of our porch! Usually we host a Sunset Naked Happy Howl at this time, so show up naked and howl at the incredible performances put on by this talented group.
print_description: The Emerald City Fire Conclave is going to practice their man burn routine in front of our porch!

title: Second Annual Alien Costume Party
description: Join us for a party that is sure to be an "Out of this World" experience. Earthlings and aliens age 21 and over are welcome to dress up and attend our second annual alien party. Come by before the party begins to participate in our antennae making craft party. Be sure to dress astronautical! Party is open to earthlings and aliens 21 years of age and older. Please, bring ID and your own cup.
print_description: Have an “Out of this World” good time at our 2nd annual alien costume party. Open to aliens and earthlings 21+. Be sure your dress is astronautical!

title: Secret Society
description: Look for our yellow-and-black wristbands. Tell us anything, no matter how secret, inappropriate or T.M.I. We will be happy to know what's on your mind. (We'll be handing out our wristbands in Center Cafe if you want in on the Society!)
print_description: Look for our yellow-and-black wristbands. Tell us anything, no matter how secret, inappropriate or T.M.I. (Get your own band in Center Cafe!)

title: See Saturn!
description: View Saturn’s rings and up to 6 of it’s moons through our giant hand-made telescope at Black Rock Observatory! You’ll see a billion miles into the outer Solar System with our precision parabolic mirror that brings Saturn’s beautiful ring system and moons to deep playa. Stargazing till dawn. Saturn is visible to the naked eye after Sunset in the SW until about 10:30pm PST.
print_description: Peer across a billion miles to see the majestic rings of Saturn. Glimpse it's distant moons and  transport from deep playa to the outer solar system.

title: Self-Care Station
description: Stop by our Self Care Station for a moment of calm in this busy desert - stocked with sunscreen, earplugs, lipbalm, condoms, electrolyte drinks, flavored water and more. DanceSafe harm reduction services available throughout the week.
print_description: Stop by our Self Care Station stocked with sunscreen, earplugs, lip balm, condoms, electrolytes and more. DanceSafe harm reduction services available.

title: Sensual Butterfly Transformation Yoga
description: The Butterfly is a high-vibrant, spiritual creation. It is sensitive to its surrounding and is vibrating in the same wavelength as the particles of niverse, as well as the life on earth. It lives in symbiosis with nature, mostly in flowers, becoming one with the Beauty All Around. The Butterfly symbolizes the Universal Spiritual knowledge and deep Wisdom, and creates its life in the perfect alignment of non-attachment, in a dance of flow and Ease. It has a life filled of transformation, from the day of birth until re-birth, between stages, outer and inner form, with ease and grace moving further, without attaching to its old shape, heart wide open for the life in front of Her. This Yogic Journey is dedicated for you to connect with YOUR inner Butterfly, through a travel of transformation, through your body and senses. Bring a Mat (if you have), soft clothing, yourself, as the beautiful and whole being you are.
print_description: Yogic Journey for you to connect with YOUR inner Butterfly, through a journey of transformation through your body and senses

title: SenseDrink @ Panda Lounge (9:30&A)
description:
You are a social entrepreneur or one of their supporters? You had a tough year trying to make the world a better place? MakeSense invites you to its first SenseDrink on the Playa to connect & chill out on groovy beats at Panda Lounge :-) Much Panda Love!

(MakeSense - www.makesense.org - is a worldwide open movement that connects social entrepreneurs with supercool individuals ready to solve their challenges)
print_description: You are a social entrepreneur or one of their supporters? MakeSense invites you to have a drink to connect & chill out on groovy beats at Panda Lounge

title: Sensory Toys Playtime
description: Awaken all your senses with our different toys (or bring yours!) - feathers, ice, leather, paddles, scratchy rope, vampire gloves, hot wax + more. Blindfolds for the advanced! We facilitate negotiations about boundaries, so you can explore your play limits and be safe.
print_description: Awaken all your senses with our different toys - feathers, ice, leather, paddles, scratchy rope, hot wax + more. Blindfolds for the advanced!

title: Sensual Dance Class
description:
Come and learn the art of sensual dance on your own or with a partner. No experience required and everyone welcome. Prize wheel spin off after class!

As you enter the schoolhouse, make sure to stop and get a class time snack 	
and some refreshing H2O to fuel your mind and body. 
Each attendee will also receive a souvenir that will be used to help us randomly pick lucky class attendees to spin the prize wheel. Each lucky spinner is guaranteed a great prize! Class participation is strongly encouraged. The School is a judgment free zone where everybody is welcome!
print_description: Come and learn the art of sensual dance with a partner or on your own. No experience required! Prize wheel spin off after class, everybody wins!

description: Traditional outfits and dances, modern Serbian music and shots of Rakija.

title: Settle This Like Men Kinetic Dispute Resolution
description: Come and participate in our Kinetic Dispute Resolution Workshops. Learn to use your hands, not your words when confronted with a difficult problem. Jiu Jitsu, Muy Thai, MMA, wrestling, whatever tickles your fancy. Enjoy classes in grappling, striking, take downs, then use those new found skills to explain your position in a more, erm, direct manner. Explain how the evap pond works to that guy who thinks it's a urinal in a way he won't see forget. Demonstrate that No means No aren't just words! Fight for status and win the love of that Sparkle Pony!
print_description: Learn to use your hands, not your words when confronted with a difficult problem. Punch, kick and choke your way to an understanding with your fellow.

title: Sexcessful tripping
description: We all know "yes means yes, no means no." Join us for a more complex discussion about navigating sex, consent, and drug use. We hope to create a friendly, safe, non-judgmental, sex-positive space. People of all genders, sexual orientations, and relationship orientations are welcome!

title: Sex Magic + Cosmic Orgasms for Women
description:

title: Sexploration! A Gender Blender Play Party
description:
Get your Sexploration on! Its time to get hot and sexy with other fabulous gender queer, trans, and queer folks!

This party is a safe space for trans, gender queer, gender variant, queer, open minded, unidentified folks to get their freak on. Sexy, hot, & off the hook. We practice safer sex and in order to play you must also. This party is designed with queer folks in mind. It is specifically a safe space for gender blenders, gender benders, trans, and gender questioning folks. It also is a safe space for cis-gendered queer folks. Feel free to bring toys, condoms, gloves, lube, and cute people - of course we will also be providing. Consent in our GenderBlender dome is a must. Keep it safe, sane, and consensual. We take our consent and safety seriously, if you are not interested in fun safe play, don't show up. If you can't play safely then you can't play in our dome. If you are ready for an amazing fabulous glittery kickin play party then this is the spot for you! All levels of play are welcome from first timers to sexperts. Respect in our dome is paramount. We are creating a unique space that is not found anywhere else on playa. This party is for people of all genders with a priority on creating safety for communities that are normally marginalized or exoticized. We can't wait to see your hotness shine at this phenomenal event.

All genders welcome all ways.

title: Shabbat Celebration
description:
Join us to welcome Shabbat with ecstatic singing, creative ritual, and a hot veggie meal.  All denominations are welcome to join hands and hearts. BYO plate!

Come to our large dome as the sun sets; you welcome the sabbath while a sea of twinkling stars envelopes you, our public shade structures transforming from daytime misting cloudscapes to light installations. We fire up our sound responsive LED beacon to help guide anybody who hasn’t found their way, and our singing voices set it to a communal pulse of light.

After the service we guide you to our dining area and seat you at a communal bedouin-style table. We fill your cup, nourish you with a multi-course meal, and ease you into the embrace of a subtle sound environment. Later, once our souls and stomachs have been nourished, we transition into celebratory dance.
print_description: Join us to welcome Shabbat with ecstatic singing, creative ritual, and a hot veggie meal. Everyone is welcome to join hands and hearts. BYO Plate.

title: Shady Lady Saloon Happy Hour
description: Come meet the neighborhood and get acquainted with the Shady Lady Saloon! We'll be fixing up delicious bourbon cocktails to kick off the week! Venture back in time to the early 1900’s and get a peak into how prostitutes lived in the red light district of New Orleans. We’ll showcase real “ladies of the night” by having framed pictures of women hung throughout the bar. We’ll ask insightful questions of our guests in hopes to get them thinking about the lives and personalities that inspired our beloved camp theme. Also, we value Radical Inclusion and it is our hope to build a cohesive and connected neighborhood. In an attempt to establish community, we’ll promote our first happy hour as a “get to know your neighbors” event. Throughout the day, SLS members will venture out into the community, greet the neighbors and request their presence and attendance at our first event.
print_description: Come meet the neighborhood and get acquainted with the Shady Lady Saloon! We'll be fixing up delicious bourbon cocktails to kick off the week!!

title: ShART Tank - get funding for your art project
description:
Step up in front of a panel of millionaires and pitch your next art piece! Suggestions, comments, and funding will be offered. This is your chance to get in front of some of this year's most famous millionaires and sell yourself! This is one of the many services that millionaires can offer the playa and we are happy to host this event without requiring a wristband for access.

We understand you - you are a millionaire. People complain about you. You're vilified in burner media, and you just don't get it. Well, good news...*we get you*! You've paid your $15,000 camp dues, flown into the desert, and want service dammit! We at millionaire camp understand your expectations and are here to provide you with the amenities you deserve while you are out here in the desert.

Millionaire lounge is open 24/7 to provide you the latest in playa pampering. From our exclusive reserved seating, complimentary fragrances, Segway parking, free wifi, phone charging stations, and secured location only accessible by wristband, Millionaire lounge offers the amenities you deserve while you are in the desert.

Please stop by one of our exciting hosted events over the week, or join us for a cocktail anytime, day or night. You never know who you'll meet at Millionaire Lounge!

title: Shut Up and have a better Relationship!
description:
Quit thinking that talk will improve your relationship.  We are way more advanced and ready to understand each other without so many words. Words are dangerous, but assumptions... WAY MORE DANGEROUS! and, MORE FUN!! So we will be exploring where assumptions come from and creating different pathways that have a much better chance for accuracy, and.... wait for it.... INITMACY! (yes that pot of gold we are looking for at the end of those playa rainbows!) In this space of curiosity, experimentation and practice, YOU WILL LEARN the emerging art of SUBTLE COMMUNICATION. You will be able to describe your month in Bali in seven (7) words or less in a way that creates more understanding, more curiosity and, yes, more intimate connection (every time) than your 90 minute slide show and endless stories. Really... 
Answer the tiresome question "How are you?" in three (3) words that will say more, build immediate trust and help you to purge more friends on facebook than ever before! We all have the ability to 'know' more without using the left side of our brain. We just aren't so practiced. So, with a bit of science, a measure of technique, the willingness to try a 'different way' and a whole workshop of practice! we will be ready to immediately upgrade any relationship, including the one with the hottie you will meet tonight outside the Pleasure Dome! Ready!?
print_description: Talk is cheap, but silence is golden. OK, not complete silence, but we WILL SEE how LESS (talk) CAN BE MORE (meaning)!

Keep your eyes peeled for the weird and wonderful Wandering Maneads, roving Ali Bar Bars, Suanadomes and mystical Mindwerks. Carnival time means the Ski Patrol doesn't have to be in hiding!  Yes, those no-good-niks are ready for the good citizens of Black Rock City!

Let Zoltar tell your fortune!  Toss a Cock Ring at the Scrotisserie!  Take aim at nipple darts!  And other games of chance await you at Ignited States Ski Patrol.

title: Skitzophreniation

title: Slapdash Sesshin
description:
Hello! My playa name is Turtle.

Burning man is amazing. You'll find yourself running around, completely absorbed by the flashing lights and the chaos, and yet completely unable to experience it all. Do you ever feel like you never quite got what you wanted, that you kept missing this or that you'd promised yourself to do? I do, and I love it.

I propose we set aside a time at the Harmonic Convergence Camp to sit together in silence, and in an intentional abandonment of pursuit. I did it once last year. I practically kidnapped a couple people who were spontaneous enough and kind enough to play along with the silliness. It was quite fun. Immediacy, right?

I'm no zen master but I can give you a couple simple pointers if you've never meditated before. I think it will be rejuvenating, relaxing, and pleasantly weird.
print_description: Learn a technique for meditation...

Overall we'll be demonstrating how to safely and effectively slap in the following scenarios:
Hand to Hand
Hand to Ass
Hand to Face (the classic slap)

Bring a friend and come get slapped.

Limited to 10 that can make a stove but open to all for instructions. Sign up at Earth Guardians.

Our lovely fashion consultants will be happy to help you find your best new look so you can leave with a fun new costume for the Playa. Come early for the best selection.

What walks down stairs, alone or in pairs and makes a slinkity sound?

We have stairs. We have slinkys.  Let's do this.

print_description: Celebrate coming home to Black Rock City with Camp88! We've got yummy snow cones and down-tempo, drum & bass boogie with a DC twist.

title: Snow Cones @ Paradise Motel
description: Step right up, ladies and gents, children of all ages, for the best refreshment you’ll find in this entire Carnival!  Look out for the palm trees and pink flamingoes which tell you that you’ve discovered none other than the infamous Paradise Motel, where weary carnival goers are invited to stop by for the best snow cones in the world while lounging in the shade in our chill lounge enjoying the melodic beats of our world class digital music purveyors.   This year, you’ll find as our roadside attraction none other than a purveyor of prognostications as a teller of fortunes has set up a tent where you can find out what your future has in store!  Our opulent Motel will also include a concierge desk where you can discover all the goings on in this most flamboyant section of the carnival.  Gifts of (unopened) bags of ice are always appreciated.  And as always, if you show your junk, you get to cut to the front (of the snow cone queue).
print_description: Enjoy a snow cone and music while lounging in our shade. Gifts of (unopened) bags of ice welcomed. Remember, if you show your junk, cut to the front!

title: Snowshoe Race & Ramble, Noon
description: Snowshoe Race & Ramble meet at noon at the Black Rock City Snowshoe Team's camp located at Alternative Energy Zone for a short Ramble. We loan you the snowshoes (limited to 10 ramblers daily) and ramblers are gifted our team t-shirt. Experience the Playa on 4 foot shoes. Ramblers and Spectators try our pure maple syrup shooters over crushed ice! The ramble will be postponed in the event of rain / mud.
print_description: Snowshoe Race & Ramble meet at noon at the Black Rock City Snowshoe Team's camp located at Alternative Energy Zone for a short Ramble on 4 foot shoes
other_location: Black Rock City Snowshoe Team at AEZ Villlage

print_description: Archetypes & Allegory of the Modern Self. Discover, share & heal your innocence, self hatred & desire for love in a circle of compassion.

title: So Bright, So Tight, So Reflective
description: Come party with the brightest and the tightest as Mystopia brings back its annual masquerade. Polish off those reflective boots and come get down in a night filled with booze & beats. Glam’s glittery stomp reigns supreme as our Mystopia DJs and friends turn it out with an eclectic mix of danceable tracks.

title: Soca/ Dance Session
description: Think you know how to twerk? Learn hot tips to dancing the world's sexiest style: Soca, also known as Soul Of Calypso. Explore your body's curves and experience the finer points of working, rolling, bouncing, ticking and popping that bootie. After this all-levels session, you'll know how to butterfly, willy bounce, jiggy, Nah Linga, hot wuk, and of course, twerk. Come for the class, stay for the ass (After Super-Session party..what did you think I meant?).

title: Social Artists: How Our Creations Impact The World
description: As artists, we remake the world in our image - our imaginings. Given that we have this gift, how do we receive it in a way that allows us to create a more connected, open-hearted, and spiritually authentic world? A full-body/heart/soul experiential workshop through the four realms of human consciousness, where we will unlock our imaginal bodies, meet some of our "inner crew," become our own superheroes, and experience the oneness of our good ol' friend, the Universe.
print_description: A full-body/heart/soul experiential workshop through the four realms of human consciousness, where we will unlock our imaginal bodies...

title: Socially Appropriate Boner Day
description: Today, if you get a boner, you get to keep it--for as long as it wants to be a boner. Grow it naturally, or strap it on. You don't have to suppress it just so someone doesn't judge you for being a pig or get jealous because it's not for her or him. Today it's okay to have just woken up in the morning, okay to be stimulated by your own silky boxers, and okay to be TURNED ON, because you have a right to your feelings and you get to do whatever you want with your body.
print_description: Today, if you get a boner, you get to keep it--for as long as it wants to be a boner. Grow it naturally, or strap it on!

title: Socially Appropriate Burp Day
description: What's the big deal? Burping is fun and it's free! Who gets to decide the acceptableness of burping? You do! Just for today, let all burping be considered socially appropriate. Buuuuuuuurp!!!
print_description: What's the big deal? Burping is fun and it's free! Who gets to decide the acceptableness of burping? You do! Buuuuuuuurp!!!

title: Socially Appropriate Eat-With-Your-Mouth-Open Day
description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon. And that's why our natural inclination is to eat with our mouths open. What's the big deal about what it looks like? You're willing to put it in your mouth and chew but you're not willing to look at it? That's like a carnivore who's unwilling to kill their own cow. So, go ahead and taste what you've been missing—today you can eat with your mouth OPEN!
print_description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon.

title: Socially Appropriate Fart Day
description: It's not like you have to pack it out or anything. You don't even have to go down the block with a spare roll of toilet paper. Just do it right where you are. It's time to celebrate our farts and acknowledge that it's about time we got over that harmless smell. What's the big deal? You're human for christsake! Today you can feel free to fart any old time as loudly and as smellily as you want!
print_description: It's not like you have to pack it out or anything. Today you can feel free to fart any old time as loudly and as smellily as you want!

title: Socially Appropriate Menstruation Day
description: Hey, menstruation is totally natural—you don't have to be embarrassed just because you have a naturally occurring blood flow. Give yourself permission to go without a tampon or pad for once. Wear white pants with no underwear. Embrace freedom! Let the blood make its artistic mark! Today is the day to feel like a natural Womyn!!!
print_description: Hey, menstruation is totally natural—skip the pad and tampon for once. Wear white pants with no underwear. Let the blood make its artistic mark!

title: Socially Appropriate Nose Picking Day
description: Who wants to suffer with a bunch of dried up gunk and crust in their nose? Get those dried up playa boogers out of there already! Don't worry if anyone's watching you go deep with that index finger! Why not give that thumb a try! It's time for each of us to get the relief we deserve and to breathe just a little freer. And go ahead, flick it on the ground because that's where that stuff came from.
print_description: Don't suffer with a bunch of dried up gunk and crust in your nose. Go ahead and have the relief you deserve and breathe just a little freer.

title: Socially Appropriate Yawn Day
description: Hey, it's been a long, fun week. Everyone knows you're tired. We're all tired too. You don't have to suppress that yawn today. That's right—celebrate one of the great mammalian mysteries and let out a big old yawn even when someone is talking right at you. No need to suppress today because today is Socially Appropriate Yawn Day!
print_description: Hey, it's been a long, fun week. Everyone knows you're tired. We're all tired too. You don't have to suppress that yawn today.

title: “Soil and Water” Yoga
description: The focus of this class is in the First and the Second Chakra. Digging the feet into the ground, dipping the toes deep into the soil, feeling the earth. By Rooting down and stabilizing our ground we will slowly get ready for the rising up to our second chakra, following the watery juiciness of sexual energy in our hips. Stepping into our sensual Animal  with softness and care. Bring a Mat (if you have), soft clothing, yourself, as the beautiful and whole being you are
print_description: First and the Second Chakra‚ Plant your root,  Step into your sensual Animal with softness and care

title: SORNE at Burning Man 2015
description:
Morgan Sorne, known in his solo music project as SORNE, is an American singer-songwriter, composer, multi-media artist, music producer, and actor. He is known for his supernatural vocal range and utilization of homemade instruments and found sounds to create sonic tapestries of layered vocal samples and unconventional instrumentation. His performances often feature an construct of self-made visual art pieces inspired by personal and cultural archetypes, a continual thread woven throughout his performance aesthetic.
SORNE performs and tours with a revolving cast of dancers, musicians and artists while working with local communities of peoples around the world to create unique participatory live experiences of his work, thus blurring the line between performer and audience member.  His musical style has been described as a combination of tribal, electronica, avant-garde, avant pop, alternative rock, and opera.
print_description: SORNE, known for his supernatural vocal range and mesmerizing performances sings at Burning Man.

title: Soul Garden - Music and Cocktail Lounge
description:
Throughout the week, Heroes & Super Villains operates our bar, Skullicious, a piece of artwork for the Burning Man community to enjoy, during afternoon and evening hours. We are a slow bar, designed to help the weary Burner take a load off, tell us some stories and make some new friends while we diligently craft signature cocktails. 

Concurrently, our resident sound curators spin smooth vibes that start off soothing our community from the daytime heat before energizing the revelers for the bacchanal of the Playa at night. 
Music & Cocktail Theme:
-Tuesday: Midsummer Night’s Playa Dream
-Wednesday: Space Dust - Outpost HSV
-Thursday: Mad Hatter’s Sunset Cocktail Party
print_description: Relax from the heat before recharging for the nighttime revelry with sounds from internationally renowned DJs. A new musical and drink theme each day.

title: Soulmate Search: Old & New
description:
What is your favorite virtue? What is your most treasured memory? Come see if you can find a soulmate in 36 questions (or fewer!)

We will investigate 2 approaches to soulmate searching, one old and one new. Come alone, come with a friend, and see if a soulmate is waiting for you on the playa
print_description: What is your favorite virtue? What is your most treasured memory? Come see if you can find a soulmate in 36 questions (or fewer!)

title: Soul Sister Circle
description: The soul sisters' path is deep and sweet...and sometimes, it's a little lonely too.  Are you longing to connect with more mystic sisters of our illuminated Black Rock City?  Do you need your deepest heart's desire witnessed, held and cherished by other women?  Come dive into the experience of soul-sisterhood at Camp Mystic and plant your dreams in our fertile loving soul.
print_description: Women come connect with your soul sisters and share your deepest heart's desires and bask in the vision, nourishment and delight of mystic sisterhood.

title: Spankings and Cookies
description: What better way to participate at Burning Man than to get not only a spanking, but a fresh baked chocolate chip cookie* on the playa. All spankticipants must be 18 years of age or older**. We have a variety of tools to spank you with and a crew of trained fun loving campers to help you out. We are here for a fun experience, not to bruise your bum (unless that’s what you really want). All of this within the privacy of our spanking dome.
print_description: Come for the spanking, stay for the cookie. 18 and over only.

description: The infamous Spanky’s Wine Bar has created the most diabolical, perverted, kinky, and hilarious carnival midway on the playa.  Come try your hand at our games of skill, like our cock-ring toss, or condom-balloon darts.  Bet on the vibrator races, or the “round spinning thingy of bad luck”.  Have your Mis-Fortune told. title: Spanky’s Wine Bar
description: Spanky's is the infamous crown-jewel of Burning Man bars.  We are an interactive group of theme camps focused around our Wine Bar.  This year, we are home to The Camp for Sensual Pleasures, Illumelodie and their Eros Tangeré Erotic Sensation Performance , Camp Stupid, Hello Camp, Mischievous Ambitions, The Buffer Zone, Body Painting, Pope DB's Hairwash and Massage, Camp Lola Massage and so much more, along with a portion of The Burning Band.  And new this year... Spanky's Carnival Midway!  Spanky's is also the host of myriad events and activities, including (but not limited to); classes and demonstrations, MPR (Morning Painjoy Radio), many great DJs, The LBD (little black dress parade), The Festival of Bubastis, Spank-dat-Bootie, and The Post-Temple Wine-Down Party.  Spanky's is also home to an amazing array of toys, such as the Spank-o-Matic machine, the Latex Vac-u-Bed, the Orgasamator and other adult-themed toys.!
print_description: The infamous crown-jewel of Bman bars (21+).  Too many events/toys/fun to list.  Just come by and see what we’re up to!

title: Spiritual Erotic Massage for Men + their Lovers
description:
This is Dharma's famous hands-on, clothes-off erotic massage workshop in its 11th year on the playa, now at Milk+Honey.  Over the course of 75 minutes, you'll experience how to give or receive a full-body orgasm using breathwork, music, and non-ejaculatory erotic massage, screaming along with 40 or so other burners.  This is the form of massage taught by the Body Electric School, though in a very condensed format.

Bring a towel/sheet, and water.  Best to come with a partner; we're in a group, but this is a 1-on-1 practice.  Come early: we will fill up.  ALL gender & sex combos are welcome.  The massage practice focuses on the penis, so it is helpful (but not essential) if the receiver has one; the giver's junk doesn't matter at all.  More info here: http://playajoy.org/?p=2758
print_description: This is Dharma's famous hands-on, clothes-off erotic massage workshop in its 11th year on the playa, now at Milk+Honey.

title: Stardust Lounge Chapel: Playa Weddings
description: Welcome to the Chapel of Love at the Stardust Lounge Casino! We will be open daily for drop-in weddings between Monday, 8/31, and Saturday, 9/5. Our hours are noon -- 6pm (sunset) and by appointment. Visitors of all genders can experience the joy of matrimony in a (non-legally-binding) ritual. Elvis, Drunk Elvis, or Mr. Stardust might serenade you as our beautiful showgirls celebrate your nuptials in Vegas fashion.  Not sure what kind of Playa wedding you want? Spin the Wedding Roulette wheel and find out! Need your Playa wedding annulled? We'll do that too! Don't forget to take a commemorative photo in our fabulous "head in hole" wedding cutouts before you leave. Note: please feel free to contact us if you want to schedule a special Note: please feel free to contact us if you want to schedule a special ceremony outside our "regular" daytime hours. We're here for you!

Come enjoy all things space, war and trek in our swanky outdoor lounge cinema or hang inside the dome Cantina for some lively chat or dance with our infamous barkeeps where break out Lightsaber fights are common place!

Fanboy videos. The Force will cure what ails you!

title: Steely Dan Happy Hour
description: Need reprieve from robot music? Tired of techno? Done with dubstep? Come get your fill of smooth music with dark sarcastic lyrics at Steely Dan Happy Hour! Any Major Dude Will Tell You...it's gonna be good. We will be serving refreshing adult libations, good company, and of course, The Dan, all under our beautiful shade structures...no static at all.

title: Stellar Dusty Moon Tuesday Party!!
description:
We love the dust, we love to moon, and we love dusty moons! 
Come start of the week right and get down with us!

Featuring Juan Travolta, Kevin Dayspring (Kevlar), Pu$$y Pete, Nick McCracken, and TROPO!!!!
print_description:

title: STILT BAR COSTUMED COCKTAIL SUNSET PARTY
description:
ENHIGHTENED BEINGS OF LEISURE Infamous Costume cocktail party @ sunset daily @ Red Nose District! Come by on stilts (or off) to revel in the beauty of ENHIGHTENED BEINGS on the Esplanade. This year, our Stilt Bar crew celebrates with a variety of circus/carnival themes from around the world and throughout time! Bring your Playa Cocktail cup (and your ID) and stilt up  to our tall bar for a refreshing cocktail. Gaze upon the beauty of stilters in costume against the backdrop of the beautiful sunset. All non-stilters welcome too. Come in costume. Those stilters need some short people to gaze up at them in wonder and their bravery and dexterity!

MONDAY- Our traditional formal night we celebrate the origins of the circus with a Commedia Del Arte party! Think Masks, gowns, pantaloons, jessters and harlequin!

TUESDAY- Menagerie-Circus Animals and their Trainers-We realize animal circuses aren't PC but they are historical and the trainer costumes..well hilarious!

WEDNESDAY- Freaks, FUN HOUSE and Side Show Carnies. We KNOW you have a FREAK in there somewhere!

THURSDAY- Classic Clown Brigade! Be Whatever style clown you like. Happy, sad, joyous, mad, funny, magical, slutty, evil....All Clowns and Klowns welcome! SPECIAL GUESTS our own Professional Clown Brigade! 

FRIDAY- The Devil’s Carnival- remember this creepy 2012 Movie? (yeah we don't either) but it combines circus and the & 7 DEADLY SINS!...what could be better?? Lost souls enter The Devil's Carnival where they are each faced with the sins they committed in life.
print_description: ENHIGHTENED BEINGS OF LEISURE Infamous Costume Cocktail Party @ sunset daily! CALLING all STILTERS to revel with other tall ilk of your kind!

title: Stone-soup pancake brunch
description: Join us for Sunday Brunch! We provide LOTS of pancakes and some other breakfast fare. Extra food to share? Bring it with you!
print_description: Join us for Sunday Brunch! We provide LOTS of pancakes and some other breakfast fare. Extra food to share? Bring it with you!

title: Stories We Tell Our Selves
description: Bring stories of an experience in which you learned something new about your self, for a Moth-like storytelling slam. Prize awarded for second place!
print_description: Bring stories of an experience in which you learned something new about your self, for a Moth-like storytelling slam. Prize awarded for second place!

title: Story Circle: House of Mirrors
description:
Have you ever encountered yourself, as if for the first time? Emerged from a maze to discover that really, nothing is as it seems? 

Each of us has a main stem of how we interpret our life story -- family, location, school, work, and religion are often included in this story -- this circle is about the moments when get a glimpse of some part of what that stem looks like, discovering ourselves through an encounter with another. 

Participants can think of a story before coming, and we'll also have a moment of reflection at the beginning, to help spark good stories, filled with the moments that make up great stories.
print_description: Have you ever encountered yourself, as if for the first time? Emerged from a maze to discover that really, nothing is as it seems?

title: Story Hour
description: Get out of the desert heat and into Grahampa’s cottage, where people in absurd granny costumes will help you choose your own adventure. 645&D
print_description: Get out of the desert heat and into Grahampa’s cottage, where people in absurd granny costumes will help you choose your own adventure.

Check the schedule daily on-site and join us in our 26' stretch DangerYurt, complete with a sofa, stuffed animals, pillows, inflatable mattresses and crash space, and two hours each day of great conversation, advice, and presentations.

title: Talk it out
description: Sometimes, we all just need to be listened to. Come and talk it out, have a cold rum, sit in the shade and share whatever is on your mind with our beautiful therapist. Advice only given if you ask for it.

title: Song Dust Sing
description: Song, Dust, Sing is the premier open mic, singer/songwriter showcase at Burning Man...featuring amazing guest artists from Reverbia…as well as other artists from the furthest reaches of Black Rock City. Located on Reverbia's Shade Stage, under the large shaded and sheltered tent called The Embassy structure…performances will be shine, dust, or rain! For artists, the sound system is high quality and for the audience...the chill factor with the carpeted shade space, while listening to music...is the place for a most enjoyable afternoon. Doug Abrahams of Sunrising Artists talent agency hosts. *note to all sign up artists…SDS has a 1-2 song limit pending time and number of participants

title: Strangers With Candy
description: We learned a few years ago that Gummi Bears don't hold up too well in the summer heat - but hard candies like Runts, Sprees, and others do pretty well. So come by anytime, and help yourselves to some tasty sugary stuff at our Strangers With Candy free vending machine! We've got plenty.
print_description: Come by anytime, and help yourselves to some tasty sugary stuff at our Strangers With Candy free vending machine! We've got plenty.

title: Straya Day
description:
Straya Day is an Australian themed BBQ party with Australian food and drinks to try, fun games to play and some rocking Aussie tunes. 


Whether you’re one of us or just enjoy our silly accents come and enjoy some fair dinkum Australian culture, dinky-di beer and ridgy-didge food on us. Play some Goon of Fortune, give cricket a burl, hug a koala or belt out some Aussie pub anthems with Aussie Karaoke.


We will be throwing bangas on the barbie until sundown. You’d have to be mad as a cut snake to miss the official Aussie meet up on playa!
print_description:
Join us for an Aussie themed BBQ party with food, drinks & games from down under.

It's the official playa meet up for Aussies but all are welcome!

title: Strengthening Relationship & Expressing Desires
description:
Enjoy group conversation and participation while talking about emotional intimacy, boundaries, listening, and how to express your sexual desires and fantasies to your partner without fear.
Prize wheel spin off after class!

As you enter the schoolhouse, make sure to stop and get a class time snack 	
and some refreshing H2O to fuel your mind and body. 
Each attendee will also receive a souvenir that will be used to help us randomly pick lucky class attendees to spin the prize wheel. Each lucky spinner is guaranteed a great prize! Class participation is strongly encouraged. The School is a judgment free zone where everybody is welcome!
print_description: Group discussion about emotional intimacy, boundaries, listening and expressing sexual desires without fear.

And, if you find yourself in need of a pair of pants, grab a random pair before you head back out into Black Rock City. See you on the playa!

title: Summer Camp Afternoon Activity Hour
description:
No summer camp is complete with afternoon activity hour! Join the camp staff at 8:15 and C as we recreate the most magical summer camp on earth complete with daily activities including: Block printing! Postcard writing! Black Rock Scavenger Hunt! 

Win prizes & camp swag by completing the Black Rock scavenger hunt - a hunt that will take you on the most adventurous "hike" through BRC you have ever been on. PG & R rated versions available.

title: Summer Camp Arts & Crafts

Daily arts & crafts activities include: Lanyards, Friendship Bracelets, Hemp Jewelry, Face Painting!

title: Summer Camp: Camp Fire & Songs
description: No summer camp is complete with a round of camp fire songs with your closest friends! Join the camp staff at 8:15 and C as we recreate the most magical summer camp on earth right here at BRC. Cozy up in the "woods" with your playa friends and family, sing songs, eat smores and enjoy each others company. Campers of all ages welcome! Bring songs/beverages to share!
print_description: A summer camp tradition... sing songs, eat smores, warm by the fire and most of all, enjoy the company of your closest friends..

title: Summer Camp Quiet Hour
description: "QUIET HOUR: In your tent or out of camp please!" That is right campers.. quiet hour is mandatory at Back to Camp. Join the camp staff at 8:15 and C in our air conditioned tent as we rest and re-energize for the afternoon activity hour.
print_description: Quiet Hour: in your tent or out of camp please!  Join the camp staff at 8:15 and C in our air conditioned tent as we rest and re-energize.

description: No summer camp week is complete without a dance. Join the camp staff at 8:15 and C as we recreate the most magical camp on earth right here at BRC for the ultimate end to your summer camp experience... something we refer to as "theme day dance". Join us for dance lessons - electric slide, hustle, and more - and a dance floor to groove the night away with your best camp friends. Bring out those short shorts ladies and gents because DJ Chedda da Shredda and DJ Kiwi Herman gonna have yo' booty shakin'.
print_description: No summer camp week is complete without a dance! Join the camp staff at 8:15 and C for dance lessons and a booty shake down.

title: Summer Camp: Tuolumne Tuck In

Join the camp staff at 8:15 and C as we recreate the most magical camp on earth right here at BRC. Kids and adults join the camp staff as we tuck you in with milk and cookies and some bedtimes stories. PG and R rated stories depending on age/interest......

Naked volleyball you say? Why yes, this BRC summer camp is also the camp you always fantasized about.....

Music will range from soul to jazz to funk to motown to blues and much much more. Come relax, meet great people, and get inspired through music and creativity. Let's get funky!

title: Sunset Playa Bike Tour
description: The playa under our feet seems featureless, but this vast lake bed is a dynamic, complex environment. Join desert experts to discover the subtle wonders that form the backdrop to Black Rock City. How does our temporary city and art affect the environment? See how Burning Man endeavors to Leave No Trace.
print_description: Join desert experts to discover the subtle wonders that form the backdrop to Black Rock City. See how Burning Man endeavors to Leave No Trace.

title: Sunset Playa Cruise
description:
Enjoy the sun setting over the playa while sipping on salty cocktails and grooving to some dancey DJ sets atop Gracie Pleasurebarge. Camp Salty's nightly sunset cruises are a great way to transition into the night. 

Hop aboard Gracie as we set sail into the deep playa with evening departures from 7:45 & G.
print_description: Enjoy the sun setting over the playa while sipping on salty cocktails and grooving to some dancey DJ sets atop Gracie Pleasurebarge. All aboard!

title: Sunset Serenade
description: Get transported from the day's sultry sunbath to moonlit galaxies with transcendent music from our DJ's Seth & Jan! Gather 'round the campfire at Sunset Portal's biggest party for ethereal beats, craft cocktails, and a few other delicious surprises.
print_description: Get transported from the day's sultry sunbath to moonlit galaxies with cocktails, campfire & transcendent music from our DJ's Seth & Jan!

title: Sunset Temple Drum Circle
description:
It's a DRUM CIRCLE Revival hosted by Camp STEEP!
Join us at 7:00PM in front of the Temple on Wednesday for Drumming, Dancing, Howling, and TEA!
We aim to restore and revive those Tribal Roots by drumming up the heart and soul of Black Rock City! Wear your white, bring your drum, your dancing feet, a stool, your cup (for tea!) and your sunset howl!
We will drum the sun down, howl as he slips behind the mountain ridge, drum and drink tea until its dark and then disperse into the night!
We look forward to meeting you there!

-Camp STEEP

Camp STEEP is located at 7:45 and Ersatz (and this event is at the Temple, not our camp, just to be clear!)
Stop by M-Sa 12-4pm (and whenever else we feel like it) for a hot, iced, creamed or straight cup of customized herbal tea for your hangover, hydration and heart! Drink in the love!
print_description: Bring your Drum, a stool/chair, your Dancing' Feet, a cup (for tea) and all that SOUL! Its a Sunset Drum Circle Revival in front of the Temple!

title: Sunset Whisky Tasting
description: Sunset Whisky Tasting.  Bring your best Scottish accent, and your worst Scottish Whisky to our sunset deck.  Bottles will be placed on a giant map of Scotland according to where they were distilled.    Much conjecture and beard stroking anticipated. Other stroking optional.
print_description: Bring your best Scottish accent, and your worst Scottish Whisky to our deck on top of Sparkles the Bus. Much conjecture and beard stroking anticipated

title: Sun Tower Burn
description:
Friday 4 September at 1 PM
Come join us for the Daylight Burn of the Sun Tower

Bring a mirror of any size & dark sunglasses or goggles.

Just before burn time, we will be handing out some additional mirrors. When the word is given, the citizens of Black Rock City will use their mirrors to reflect sunlight at the center of the sun mandala at the top of the tower to try to start a fire in the cannon fuse placed there that will then set the rest of the tower ablaze.

It’s going to be BRIGHT! 
Bring Dark Sun Glasses
print_description:
Come join us for the Daylight Burn of the Sun Tower
Bring a mirror of any size & dark sunglasses or goggles.

title: Super-duper Serious Photo Essay: Hosted by Josh
description: Last year the BRC-itizens were awestruck by the emotional constructs from a collection of French portraits Barrington presented that showcased previous burns. This year, it’s being stomped all over and instead will be taking Barrington’s photos and assembling to prepare an onslaught against White Trash Superstars. Scotch will be provided, as photos and plans will be curated.
print_description: Come be awestruck by the emotional constructs that are reassembled to prepare an onslaught against White Trash Superstars. Scotch will be provided.

title: Super Hero Happy Hour with DFT
description: Make your very own super hero outfits while drinking refreshing cocktails and shaking your booty to house beats from our resident and guest DJs. Free Dancing!

title: Superhero/Villain Booze Battle
description:
Every day is a celebration! Come by the Champagne Lounge for your daily dose of bubbly fun. We’ll will be quenching your champagne thirst with a noon-3:00 happy afternoon. Not in the mood for bubbles? Grab some friends and take a shotski. Bring your own cup!

THURSDAY: Champagne and shotskis will give you super powers! Superheroes are cool, but super villains make Burning Man a reality. Choose a side for the booze battle!
print_description: Champagne gives you super powers! Superheroes are cool, but super villains make Burning Man a reality. Choose a side for the booze battle!

title: Sustainable Garden Practices
description: Learn how to have a beautiful, healthy, lush garden without the use of pesticides. Learn how to attract beneficial insects and why they are so important. With a few simple steps, no matter where you live, you can grow a beautiful, sustainable & abundant garden to enjoy!
print_description: Learn how to have a beautiful, healthy, lush garden without the use of pesticides and attract beneficial insects and why they are so important!

title: SWAG Workshop
description: Bring all the charms/SWAG you’ve been gifted and we will work together to put them on a chain so you can wear them all without being a tangled mess of necklaces!
print_description: Bring all the charms/SWAG you’ve been gifted and we will help you put them on a chain so you can wear them all without being a tangled necklace mess!

title: Swap Meat! with the Trustable Sluts
description:
Welcome to Swap Meat!

This event is organized by The Trustable Sluts: a community of sexually liberated socially responsible women.

This is a mixer for sexually liberated, socially responsible women* and the men and women (and everyone in between) who love them.

With Swap Meat, we turn traditional gender dynamics on their head and invite both men and women who want to date, relate and have sexual connections with women who identify as women* who are self-aware, sex-positive, love warriors.

WHO ARE WE: trustablesluts.com

There will be little structure and much fun. We will bring something to identify the "meat" and identify Trustable Slut Members.

# 1 rule of SWAP Meat is
you bring someone AWESOME
to SWAP Meat.

We want to be introduced to more amazing people who want to meet fun, playful, and open women, who are in alignment with our values.

Bring someone who you would recommend to date your best friend. Bring someone who is "available" to date. Bring someone who has good boundaries and knows how to communicate. Bring someone who YOU are 100% okay with sharing.

Who NOT to bring:
-Some random person off the playa
-Someone who is overly eager to hook-up (aka desperate).
-Someone who isn't emotionally available or at least self-aware.

Official Meat Policy:

1) Meat can be of any gender.
2) We encourage "available" meat. That word has many interpretations...it is whatever it means to you. However, here are some ways it means to us:
+ is single or in an open relationship.
+ their relationship agreements allow for dating.
+ has time to date, meaning not just interested in hooking-up.
+ has experience in our or some other community of sexy tribe.
+ has emotional intelligence and communication skills.

*NOTE: We are open to all gender orientations and sexual orientations. We are LGBTQ friendly.
print_description: The Trustable Sluts host a sex positive dating meet-up. Come have a drink and meet some lovely people. Maybe you'll get your meat swapped.

title: Swarm the dHive Bar @ the BuzzInn!
description: Swarm by for lavender lemonade & cranberry ice water, spelling bees, honey tastings, beengo, & deep tech house beats via DJ Drone. Learn about honeybees and other pollinators. Got no antennae?  We'll feeler you up!  Bee buzzy, pollinate your mind & get your proboscis wet! Hydrate before you playa-date! We bee inviting you to learn about nature's indicator species the pollinators--bats, bees, birds, & butterflies.  Waggle dance with us in the dust.  >'='<
print_description: Hydrate w/lavender lemonade & cranberry H20, beengo, spelling bees, flower hair-braiding, & deep house via DJ Drone.  Bee buzzy & pollinate your mind!

title: Sweat Your Prayers w/Huggy Bear @ RhythmWave
description: Begin your journey to Burn night and Sweat Your Prayers with Huggy Bear at RhythmWave! There are no steps to follow, no choreography to learn, and no way to do it wrong. The only requirements are a body that's still breathing, a heart that's still beating, and a mind that's still curious.
print_description: Begin your journey to Burn night and "Sweat Your Prayers" with Huggy Bear at RhythmWave!

title: Sweat Your Prayers w/Huggy Bear @ RhythmWave
description: Kick off your Burn on the right foot (even if it’s your left). Sweat Your Prayers with Huggy Bear at RhythmWave as we bring this beautiful and dynamic dance/meditation to BRC for our 9th consecutive year! There are no steps to follow, no choreography to learn, and no way to do it wrong. The only requirement is a body that is still breathing, a heart that is still beating, and a mind that is still curious.
print_description: Kick off your Burn on the right foot. Sweat Your Prayers with Huggy Bear at RhythmWave as we bring this beautiful and dynamic dance/meditation!

title: Sweet and Sour Treats (With Sausage!)
description: You know you love any grilled meat on the playa. But, you haven't lived until you have had the sweet succulent taste of Merguez lamb sausage and the sour crunchy taste of kimchi in the same bite. The Pickle Me Elmo crew will be serving this delicious combination to the lucky first few hundred guests from our gypsy wagon Tuesday afternoon.
print_description: Nothing beats the combination of sweet Merguez lamb sausage and kimchi. Served hot off the grill from our gypsy wagon. Yes, I said sausage!

title: Sweet or Savory Crepes!
description: Sweet or Savory?  We always aim to please with more than just filings…  With dozens & dozens of fresh eggs, 3 different kinds of flour and our secret French ingredient, Camp D’s crepes are by far, hands down, the best in Black Rock City!  You'll never know when our fabulous troupe, “Les Briquettes Coquettes” perform, but if you miss them, you'll certainly be treated with groovy beats from one of the many resident DJ's in the house.
print_description: Our international crew of Burners will show off their mad culinary skills serving crepes for 3 days (Wed – Fri), 9ish – noonish!

title: Swing/Lindy Hop Time Hop
description: A rift to 1927 will be opened this week. Time colonists will direct you in locating the rift's day, time, & place. Stop by today for details about where/when the dance is happening.  We'll also be able to teach you the Lindy Hop, so you're ready to partake in the festivities when the rift opens.

title: Tango In the Desert
description: Come dance with us!  Argentine Tango is a vibrant dance that came from the salons of Buenos Aires.  Stalk around the floor in a partnership, be elegant, precise, and passionate - and hopefully walk out of the class carrying some of that with you into your everyday life.  Our world class teachers will get you started, and you can bring your newfound dance skills to our evening parties!
print_description: Argentine Tango is a vibrant dance that came from the salons of Buenos Aires. World class teachers will get you moving beautifully.

title: Tantric AUM
description: The AUM (Awareness Understanding Meditation) Workshop is based on the understanding that in order to find its silence, the western mind first needs to express its tension and stress.The aim of the AUM Meditation is to consciously transform stress and negative emotions into positive creative energy, and to create personal well being and peace through a social process of Awareness, Understanding and Meditation.It is divided in twelve stages that allows you to experience all shades of your emotional life ‚Äì anger, love, sadness, laughter ‚Äì and to express these emotions in a protected and safe environment.Once emotional awareness and intelligence are mastered, it becomes easier to express emotions in a healthy way, resulting in more effective communication skills and a greater sense of personal empowerment. The fear of expressing all our feelings diminishes, freeing us to make a genuine choices about how we act. Unspoken positive and negative feelings can create blocks in our relationships with friends, colleagues and loved ones.Through experiencing the AUM, relating becomes clearer, more honest and more fun. the AUM also allows you to reclaim to joy of simply being alive.Bring a pillow or cushion
print_description: A high energy social meditation that allows you to express the full rainbow of emotions AND taste the deep awareness that holds it all of it

title: Tantric Massage for Intimate Partners
description: Experience the power of sacred sexuality in this HandsOn/ClothesOff workshop. Must come with a partner you're willing to go deep with. This is about true intimate connection.
print_description: Experience the power of sacred sexuality in this HandsOn/ClothesOff workshop.Must come w a partner you can go deep with. This is about true intimacy.

title: Tantric Puja
description:
Join us for a sultry and playful exploration of intimacy in its different embodied forms and flavors including sound, touch, and movement.  We will co-create a sacred container that honors and celebrates the divine masculine and feminine that lives within each of us. This puja is inclusive, and welcoming of all gender orientations and both pairs and singles. 
Please wear a sarong 
(if possible!) and bring your open heart!
print_description: Tantric Puja

title: Tantric Puja
description: This is a space to see, feel, smell, touch the divine in ourselves and others. Choose to embody the masculine or feminine for this play and bring a partner of the opposite polarity just to balance the numbers - you have the choice to "see the one in the many" if you decided to move around partners to experience "seeing the One in the Many" or to stay with the same partner and go deeper into "seeing the Many in the One" - this will be a puja style ceremony unfolding deeper layers of intimacy.
print_description: Discovering deeper intimacy, love and awareness in this Tantric ceremony. Choose to meet many partners or remaining with one love partner.

title: Taste of Lithuania - Pancakes Afernoon
description:
In Lithuania we have a saying that 'men's love comes through stomach' but the truth is that every Burner will fall in love with Lithuanian culture after tasting Lithuanian potato pancakes.

Together with Lithuanian pancakes Burners will be asked to try other traditional Lithuanian snacks: fried bread or cucumbers with honey. Fresh cucumbers and honey are the best refreshment during hot afternoon at the Playa.
print_description: If You want to fall in love with Lithuanian Burners come and taste what they have prepared this special afternoon.

The infamous LiL' CrackWhores are joining forces with the Tectonic volcano to bring you a full night of dancing, community, body & sex-positivity, and ground-shaking, face-melting beats. Featuring an all-star showcase of Black Rock City's finest queer DJs, this is a Burning Man kick-off party you do not want to miss. 

Bring your ID, cup, twerkin' skillz & smiles!

Come sample the delicious treats, delightful eats, and delectable beats of Tasty at Tasty Gone Fishin' a Tasty Takeover of Darwin Fish Tank (4:30 and D)!  We'll be serving up Kimchee Grilled Cheese and Boba Tea from 10pm until we run out!  Snack and sip while you dance to the beats of our selectors.

And don't forget to dress up!  Whether a narwhal, a mermaid, Captain Jack or a hanger of ten, Life Aquatic attire will make for a swimmingly slippery and stupendous time and get you to the front of any line!

title: TEDxBlackRockCity
description:
“Imagination is the only weapon in the war against reality.” ~ Lewis Carroll (1871)  “Through the Looking Glass, and What Alice Found There” 

To peer “Through the Looking Glass” is to seek alternative perspectives, to imaginatively approach a traditional problem or line of reasoning in order to illuminate impossible solutions. This often requires a willful transformation of ourselves — a creative shape-shifting — so that we see the world with new eyes, new senses, a new consciousness. It is only in this way that a new world reveals itself — as strange, yes, but perhaps also closer to world in which we dream.

In 2015, TEDx BlackRockCity will be an opportunity to open and reflect ourselves in new ways, to a new world, in which we are all transformed by ideas that matter.
print_description: "Through the Looking Glass" - Lewis Carroll (1871) - TEDxBRC features Ideas Worth Spreading while celebrating our 5th year of this important program.

title: Telescope Viewing
description: Come to Black Rock Observatory to view the universe through our giant hand-made telescope or get your hands on a real meteorite. Using a precision parabolic mirror, we’ll show you space and time. Photons are travelling billions of miles at light speed through space just to meet you at the Observatory, will you be there to meet them? Get the big picture in the Macro Dome or see inner space in the Micro Dome. See Saturn’s rings, craters on the Moon and deep-sky wonders live with your own eyes after Sunset every night. Science talks, exhibits and special events happening all week.
print_description: View the universe through a giant hand-made telescope or get your hands on a real meteorite.  See Saturn’s rings or craters on the Moon live!

title: Tell-tale Reflections
description:
What do you see when you look in the mirror? What do you desire? What do you loathe? Take it all in...exhale, and again….What do you SEE when you look in the mirror?
 
A cascade of images, music and performance awaits as we gaze outward from the Esplanade and inward to our soul. Join members of the Vau de Vire Society, Bad Unkl Sista and Dustfish for a performance fusion evening like no other: ritual, fire, physical theater, circus all woven together. You don’t want to miss this show. Starts promptly at 8pm! Bring a small mirror.
print_description: What do you see when you look in the mirror? Vau de Vire Society, Bad Unkl Sista and Dustfish join for a performance fusion evening like no other.

title: The 1st Annual BRC Gateway Garden Party!
description: Join the Hanging Gardens for it's first ever Gateway Garden Party! First time on the playa? Seasoned Burner looking for an adventure with a new friend? The Gardeners are excited to invite you to our desert oasis to meet your neighbors and play our mysterious adventure game! We want to be your gateway to the playa! So come, hang out in the Garden, pair up with a stranger and find out what random adventure awaits! (Examples: "Have a lovely romantic walk along the esplanade until you find free food" or "Save the Man from the invading Aliens by neutralizing anyone wearing neon … here's your pew pew gun!”). Music, drinks and general revelry to ensue!
print_description: Join the Hanging Gardens for it's first ever Gateway Garden Party!

title: The 17th Annual "Little Black Dress Parade"
description: Led by the world famous “Burning Band”, we will once again take to the streets of Black Rock City in our sexiest LBD's (both men and women).  Be a part of history!  Were you in the marching-band in school?  Bring your instrument!  All are welcome.  We begin a Spanky's at 3pm and parade around the city, winding up at Center Camp where we put on our bunny ears and join the billion bunny march.
print_description: Led by the Burning Band, all are welcome to march/play/sing. Males/Females, wear you sexiest LBD. Bring a musical instrument if possible.

title: The #1 Shortcut to Emotional Intelligence
description: If your emotions ever get the best of you, come learn the #1 shortcut to emotional intelligence so you can get the best out of them.
print_description: If your emotions ever get the best of you, come learn the #1 shortcut to emotional intelligence so you can get the best out of them.

title: The 4 'Missing' Laws of Attraction- Glimmer
description:
Explore the laws of Detachment, Polarity, Pure Potentiality, Sufficiency & Abundance. Put these laws into use to manifest what you desire.
Glimmer began her coaching experience as a HR Rep at Cisco Systems, Inc. She has now found a natural extension of her passion in supporting individuals with articulating their ideal life and creating a plan to achieve it. Through this work, Glimmer assists people in bridging the gap between their current existence and their dream life.

In addition to holding a BS in Psychology, Glimmer is earning her coaching certification through the QSCA. Through this year long program, her focus has been Law of Attraction and Light Body work.

Glimer sees her special talents as the ability to extract visions out of her clients and get them on paper where they can be evaluated and converted into working life plans and guides for daily decision-making.
print_description: Explore the laws of Detachment, Polarity, Pure Potentiality, Sufficiency & Abundance. Put these laws into use to manifest what you desire.

title: The Art and Heart of Striptease
description: Begins with a discussion on striptease, its history, purpose and method. Activated shakti energy in a group dance setting. Here we will "strip" the taboos around stripclubs and nudity to reclaim our sexual, seductive power. Ecstatic, exotic striptease to celebrate the divine feminine form at its best. With intention and groundedness, a lovingly performed striptease is the ultimate celebration of love... and of self-love.
print_description: Here we "strip" taboos around this art form to reclaim our sexual, seductive power. Celebrate the divine feminine form at its best! With Flying Astrid

title: The Art of Sensation Play with Philippe Lewis
description: In this fun, hot and playful class, you will begin to expand your repertoire of touch skills and role play. First you will learn simple yet powerful embodied ways to interact somatically with others such as caresses, nails, bites/nibbles, light hair pulling, grabbing, kissing, light spanking, pushing/pulling, wrestling/pinning, flirting/teasing, and more. Next, you will learn and practice simple fun roles to use these skills with, such as the inner animal, the god/goddess, the nymph, and the fairy. All skills and roles will be taught in a container of consent to make all engagements pleasurable and powerfully transformative for everyone.Looking forward to playing with you!
print_description: Join us to create the most pleasurable sensations in another person’s body using only your hands, teeth, skin, and other items close at hand!

title: The Art of Sensual Play
description: In this fun, hot and playful class, you will begin to expand your repertoire of sensation skills and role play. First you will learn simple yet powerful embodied ways to interact physically with others such as caresses, nails, bites/nibbles, light hair pulling, grabbing, kissing, light spanking, pushing/pulling, wrestling/pinning, flirting/teasing, and more. Next, you will learn and practice simple fun roles to use these skills with, such as the inner animal, the god/goddess, the nymph, and the fairy. All skills and roles will be taught in a container of consent to make all engagements pleasurable and powerfully transformative for everyone. Looking forward to playing with you!

title: The Canopy Tribe: Sleep in Temple Trees
description:
Remember the most majestic tree you have ever experienced?

Did you have enough time to celebrate it? To dream with it?

Majestic trees give living form to the most diverse places on Earth. When they disappear, unseen, the world flattens. These trees are becoming rare. And valuable.

The Canopy Tribe helps others to sleep in majestic trees. To have time to dream – and radically self express.

Three-minute crash courses in tree hunting, tree climbing, tree campouts, tree house building and tree circus.

Acrobats, architects, artists, arborists, tree huggers welcome.

title: The Dusty Beavers’ Maple Taffy Stickeasy
description: Come all ye playa dappers, dames and ragamuffins and indulge in our beloved Quebecois spring ritual: the sugaring-off party. The Dusty Beavers will recreate the jovial, old-time Cabane à Sucre (Sugar Shack) tradition on the Playa. Maple syrup will be boiled to amber-hued perfection, drizzled on snow (crafted in secrecy, but with love), then artistically twirled into a sticky sweet gem-like glob. Don your dustiest glad rags to chill out in our maple-icious speakeasy and indulge your sweet tooth with nature’s sweetest sap. No beaver pelt trade expected or required in return. Come and experience this unique, sugar fueled ‘joie de vivre’.

title: The Four Faces Of Incorruptible Personal Power
description:
"Where are the positive archetypes of feminine power? Kali, who cuts off your head? Hera, who is the god form of holly homemaker: basically “Zeus’ wife” with a goddess-sized jealous streak? Wonder Woman, who battles evil but has no family and no love in her life? It’s time for us to tell a new story of femininity, with our choices, with our self-expression, and with our lives. There are too few positive examples of women who are in full command of their sexuality and its attractive powers. There are too few healthy stories of women who’s full creative expression is unbridled and uncontrolled.

Learn how to harness the dual feminine forms and dual masculine forms of power in each of your interactions and become a true manifestor - brining your highest vision into reality through your being, your words, and your actions.You will learn an unforgettable map of your own sources of power, some of which have been lying dormant for your entire life. Once you can locate and allow all four faces of incorruptible power to move through you, you can lead, inspire, and serve almost anyone.  For Men and Women who want to bring their full spiritual presence into the material world and be the bridge between our present reality and the future vision only you can see."
