title: The Game!
description:
LIke most carnival games, the risk is part of the fun.. This is a game with a simple premise; Draw a card from the deck and the player does what is written.  Is it ever really simple?  “The Game” requires a high degree of interactivity among all those involved, even those walking by may become drawn into the action and be participants. “The Game” has a tendency to create possibilities where there were once boundaries.  Choices where there were once obstacles.  “The Game”: the love child of truth or dare, charades, post office, twister, spin the bottle, and American's Got talent.. 
“The Game” is perfect for letting that INNER freak come out. Watch what happens when permission is given to the darker, more playful side of one's self. That part that stays just out of sight, watching from the sideline, wanting to take part, but doesn't due to social constraint or peer reprisal.
“The Game” is both a game of chance and boundaries.  Winning is all a matter of perspective. Everyone wins with the upside of personal insight, everyone loses what may have been a self-limiting perspective.  A new episode with each draw is guaranteed to amaze and astound!
print_description: Created for the 2013 burn, this is a game, played at the bar, has a simple premise; Draw a card from the deck and the player does what is written.

title: The Monkey Tantra - an interactive fun mix of voic
description: In the story of Hanuman (the mighty monkey deity of Hinduism) is a being with numerous gifts, and a faulty memory. On his path, he connects with others who remind him of his magical abilities. We are indeed mirrors for each other, with opportunity to reflect as the embodied unique contribution and how to bring more love and gratitude in the world. The Monkey Tantra is an experimental application of this idea, connecting together via loving human contact, vocalizing, visualizing, and inhabiting fearless graces through movement play and voice. Elements of dance, yoga, breath, chanting, and more combing to engage the body as a complete sensory organism. A sensory body is alert, animated, and alive. It resonated safety, security, and competence. It is ready for anything! This is an investigation, an exploration, a collaboration, a seriously FUN limitation-busting experiential living as we are - as ONE.

title: The Olfactorium
description: Burdened with useless swag?  How about something useful?  Stop by the Olfactorium and have a custom perfume created just for you by professional perfumer, Agent 11.  Scent evokes memories directly through the limbic system in a way no mere memento ever could.  You will leave with a mini perfume that is tailored to your tastes—something you can take back to the default world as an everyday reminder of your experiences at Burning Man.
print_description: Come to the Olfactorium for a custom perfume created just for you by our Mistress of Scent, Agent 11 so your beautiful burner-self will smell great!

title: The Orgasamator Experience
description: The legendary Orgasmatron first came to the playa in 2002, and it provided exceptional physical pleasure to thousands of women in an environment that was safe, comfortable, sensual and private.  Five years ago we completely redesigned the machine for even greater intensity and enjoyment, and gave it a new name: The Orgasamator.  When you visit, you will be in a private room with an operator who is experienced, very sensitive to your needs and concerns, who listens well and is deeply dedicated to giving you an amazing experience.  Your specific needs and desires will be discussed at the beginning, and the experience will be fine-tuned to give you exactly what you want.  No penetration is involved, but sexy talk and sensual touch are available options.  We want everyone to feel refreshed and respected when they leave.  We are strongly focused on cleanliness and health, along with fun.  Come solo, or bring a good friend (male or female) to add another dimension to this deeply immersive and wonderfully personal experience.  Wear as much or as little as you would like, you can stop any time if the pleasure becomes too intense.  If you are a woman, 18+, the Orgasamator Experience is something you won't want to miss. Lines are shortest early in the week, and early in the day.
print_description: The Orgasamator gives intense physical pleasure in a setting that's safe, comfortable, sensual & private. Exit refreshed & smiling. Female18+ only.
other_location: Located in Spanky's Village and Wine Bar at 4:00 and Carny

title: The Outer Body Paradigm
description:
Who are you?  Could it be possible that you are far greater than you imagine yourself to be?  What if you could connect with the entire World as your Self?  

What I've discovered thru practicing this very simple paradigm has rooted me far more deeply than I'd ever dug, to the taproot of our collective Source.  We'll do some simple exercises together that will shift your relationship with the World in deeply powerful ways, generating more and more synchronistic synergies around you.
print_description: The Outer Body Paradigm -- Synchronistic, Synergistic Connection with Your True Self.

title: The Path of Forgiveness:  Returning to Love
description: Come immerse yourself in the healing energy of forgiveness. A time for healing and returning to your essence, your soul, your true self.
print_description: Come immerse yourself in the healing energy of forgiveness. A time for healing and returning to your essence, your soul, your true self.

title: The People's Fashion Show
description: A BRC tradition- starring you! On Center Camp Café's Big Stage! Show off your Playa Fashions! Walk our Runway! Your hosts Dr. H.Owll & JustinCredible

title: THE PEOPLE'S FASHION SHOW @ Center Camp Cafe
description:
Saturday, Day of the Burn, 5:30 - 7:00 PM

In Black Rock City there is much to see, always, in the way of art-- buildings and structures, Art Cars and installations... but there's another kind of art to see, as it strolls around the Playa...
It's the often unique way each of us dress (or undress) for the event!
And each year, there's one gathering place where Playa Fashions shine their brightest.
That's the Big Stage in Center Camp Café. The day is Saturday, and the time right before the Burn, starting around 5:30 PM.
The PEOPLE'S FASHION SHOW, a tradition since 1987, is the place to see and be seen, as the amazing creations worn on the Playa have their moment before our audience on our Runway.
Join your hosts, Dr. Howland Owll and DJ Justin Credible, as we present this year's highlights of YOUR Incendiary Couture!
Fantastic outfits, puppets, body decoration or just one's signature Playa clothing-- anything and anyone may appear. Models assemble backstage.
Come and watch... or even better, be a part of it!
print_description:
THE PEOPLE'S FASHION SHOW @ Center Camp Cafe
Saturday, Day of the Burn, 5:30 - 7:00 PM

title: The Protest Against Problems
description: Have you ever had a problem? Well, now you can march to end all problems, in the PROTEST AGAINST PROBLEMS! Come yell into the loudspeaker, chant, march, or just make a sign and hang out because that’s what a protest really means. If you’ve ever had a problem in your life stop by Freestyle Palace this Wednesday to make sure it doesn’t come back.
print_description: Have you ever had a problem? End Problems Now! Yell, chant, march, sign The Petition to make sure your problem never comes back.

title: The Randomized Postcard Project
description: In the lead up to the burn we'll be collecting names and addresses of folks who would like to receive a postcard from the playa. Then once we're out in the dust we'll be recruiting random passersby to write a message on those pre-addressed postcards. Once you've written a postcard to a random you'll be able to fill your own address in (or a friend's) so that someone can write you a postcard! Feel free to get in touch with us to submit your info or just come find us on playa.
print_description: Send a postcard to someone completely random and leave your address so someone completely random can send you one too!

title: The Red Party
description:
Join Flirt Camp for our 1st Annual Sexy 'Red Party'. 

Grab your creative red outfit and come dance, flirt, play and enjoy a special cocktail on the last night at Flirt Camp 2015.  

We have excellent music, beautiful people and a sweet Bar-&-Lounge. 

Something you won't want to miss is our EPIC flash mob dance by the Sky Dancers. It's amazing.  ;)

This party is designed to travel!  We will walk out to the Man Burn together and for our "4th Annual Hot Dog Cookout", where we will grill hot dogs while we watch the greatest pyrotechnic show on earth!  The MAN BURN!

We will continue with the Red Party after the MAN BURN and play more excellent music.  Look out for the red LED light balloons strand.
print_description: Join Flirt Camp for our 1st Annual Sexy 'Red Party'.

title: The Red Tent
description: Ladies, don’t weather the playa in misery: get your pads, tampons, and iron here!
print_description: Ladies, don’t weather the playa in misery: get your pads, tampons, and iron here!

title: The Reincarnation Location
description:
Come be reborn into the world of the Playa.  Confess your sins, then spin the Wheel of Penance!  This will indicate what you must do, as detailed in the Book of Penance - though you will be able to choose a G, R or NC-17 rated version.  Once completed, you will have been cleansed of all your sins and can be reborn anew.  You'll then rid yourself of all your worldly belongings (take your clothes off), and from within our dome with a pair of legs - you'll crawl out through a 6' vagina, where someone in hospital scrubs will spank you and give you a rebirth certificate - onto which you'll put your thumbprint and Playa name before we laminate it.
This will be our 5th year on the Playa since 2000.
print_description: Come be reborn into the world of the Playa.  Confess your sins, spin the Wheel of Penance then be reborn through the 6' vagina.

description: In our library on the Playa, we have collected several notable volumes for aloud recitations, including classical and modern, in the soft porn genre.  These include Victorian era, Anais Nin, Letters to Penthouse, and more. Are you a reader or a listener or both? Or might you bring your own offerings?  Adults only, please.

title: The Science of Happiness
description: Do you want to be happier? Come learn and practice simple, scientifically proven tools to increase your emotional well-being. The core of this program is taught to corporate audiences across the country and adapted with Karpo's 15 years on the playa!
print_description: Do you want to be happier? Come learn and practice simple, scientifically proven tools to increase your emotional well-being.

description: Our cozy huts each house fascinating exhibits that will take you on a journey through the creative process itself:  Preparation, Incubation, Illumination, and Verification.  You will be rewarded with a bindi that reflects upon your journey.
print_description: Our cozy huts each house fascinating exhibits that will take you on a journey through the creative process itself and you'll be offered a bindi reward

title: The Wisco
description: Tired of the monotony that is Black Rock City? Stop by Hamster Camp and let The Wisco boost your spirits. Have and old fashioned and take a rest, or put your dancing shoes on and get down with the best little camp around. Join us as we bring you a taste of the great northwoods.
print_description: A little taste of the Northwoods. Let the Wisco boost your spirits. Come get your drink on in the best little bar in the best little camp on the playa

title: The World Congress for a New Civilization
description: The United Nations, for all its good, it not enough.  We need a new, more representative global meeting ground for those seeking to replace our current civilization with something better. In 2016, delegations of current and future leaders from every nation on Earth will gather together for a week to develop a set of common principles for a politically and environmentally sustainable society in the 21st Century. Come learn more from Jim Clark, the founder of the World Congress for a New Civilization. Jim is the founder of the World Technology Network, a former director of a Bill Clinton presidential campaign, a former Harvard faculty member, and TEDx Black Rock City speaker.
print_description: COME CHANGE THE WORLD! In 2016, global delegates will meet to develop principles for a politically/environmentally sustainable world. Get involved.

title: The Worst Comedy Show Ever
description: Are you looking for lolz, hahas and punchlines? Well then for sure don't come to our terrible comedy show! We'll have jokes, we'll have stand-up comedians, we'll have microphones. Okay, we're gonna have one microphone. Find out if that one microphone works and more if you come on down to The First Annual Worst Comedy Show Ever on Tuesday and Thursday at 7pm at The Space Between, located at 7:45 and Hanky Pank. Comedians looking to perform welcome.
print_description: Are you looking for lolz, hahas and punchlines? Well then for sure don't come to The First Annual Worst Comedy Show Ever.

title: Throwing, spinning and Flinging
description:
Ever wanted to impress the crowd with juggling? Want to spin a staff or poi without bashing yourself in the head? How about hoop like a gradeschool girl?

Then join us at the bar and watch the pros from Sacramento FireSociety spin on top of our 2 story bar as the sun sets!

title: Tie a Shemagh
description: Any time, day or night, bring a large square scarf or pashmina and we’ll show you how to wrap and tie it to make an effective dust mask/head covering. This traditional Arabian headdress is perfectly suited for Black Rock City – serving as a fashion accessory between the occasional playa dust storms.
print_description: Learn how to wrap and tie a traditional Arabian headdress/dust mask to double as a fashion accessory between occasional dust storms.

Your knockers will be a knock out! We will of course also be featuring some pollinator costuming and serving up honey deliciousness along with refreshing infused teas and libations. title: (Touch) Rugby in the Buff
description: Rugby is a rough game, but it's not only for buff dudes – just no touchy-feely please, even though it's a touch rugby we'll play. Join us if you please! Why naked? For a great bonding experience, plus it's hot on the playa... and your costume would be destroyed in the game otherwise! The Ancient Greeks always trained and competed naked – in fact the ’gym’ comes from the word ‘gymnos’, meaning ‘naked’ in Greek. Come experience the amazing freedom of running and jumping and exercising free of clothing! Or at least come and see what a great spectator sport it is :) Come to the playa around 7:30 Portal and look out for bouncing balls!

title: Transcending Shame, Guilt & Envy
description:
There are many things you 'could' do, but there's nothing you 'should' do. I suspect there's no such thing as a 'should'. A should is a 'could' with shame smuggled on top of it. Come explore shame and its cousins: guilt, envy, anger and jealousy. All these emotions have one thing in common, they usually hide their tracks and are hard to admit. Learn to transcend your shame with cutting edge subjective tools. We'll investigate the nature of shame & shaming, look at the adaptive advantages of them and how they serve & do not serve our development.

Join love coach Annie Lalla for some powerful exercises that will help you move beyond past shames and show you how desist from laying down new ones. This is a forum to discuss how to experience our emotions, especially the difficult ones, so they stop haunting your psyche.  You will leave shameless or at least shamelessly.
print_description: Learn to transcend these often hidden emotions using cutting edge tools from Annie Lalla. You will leave shameless or at least shamelessly.

title: Transformational TEA TIME!
description: Join Camp STEEP for afternoon tea! Hot, Iced, Creamed, Straight, for your heart, hangover and hydration! We've got all your tea and apothecary needs covered! Come by for a totally customized cup of tea or pick from one of our signature blends. Along with a great cup of tea we are a space for transformational conversation; we might also have some other fun things going on to keep you entertained while you steep and sip. Art projects, card readings, body painting... you never know what might be happening around STEEP! We look forward to seeing you! Open Daily M-Sa 12-4pm and whenever the heck else we want. Drink in the Love!
print_description: Stop by for a hot, iced, creamed, or straight cup of tea for your heart, hangover and hydration! Drink in the love!

description: Peer into the carnival mirror and reflect upon a whole new YOU! Our Transformation Station offers four festival booths, with opportunities for corporeal, sartorial, psychological, or sensual reinvention with our happy helpers -- we offer advice, costuming, hair and makeup, and even a kissing booth for your transformational relation, elation, satiation and osculation. title: TransTalks Hosted by Gender Blender
description: Gender is a challenging topic for almost any community to talk about. We as a community often let assumptions and misunderstandings trump compassion and empathy. Gender Blender will lead an open discussion about trans life and experiences, exclusion.
print_description: Gender Blender will lead an open discussion about trans life and experiences, exclusion. Bring an open mind.

title: Trans Tea Time
description: This is a classic Gender Blender event. Join us for a cup of tea and meet other trans, genderqueer, agender, gender nonconforming, and gender variant folks. Let's talk about our trans experiences on and off the playa. Let’s share our stories and support each other. Our goal is to create a space to feel comfortable being our true selves; we will listen, share, hold heart space, and bring our fullest selves.
print_description: Over tea let’s talk about our trans & genderqueer experiences on & off playa. Share stories, receive support, and enjoy our safe space.

title: TRAPEZE electroswing & burlesque dance party
description: San Francisco’s infamous electroswing/burlesque party returns to the playa for a feverish full-throttle freakeasy of highfalutin fulsomeness and low-down dirty deco bass. Doll up and dance to the haunting hoopla of the West Coast’s premier electroswing pioneers: DELACHAUX, THE KLOWN and The GENTLEMEN CALLERS of LOS ANGELES. And indulge in hypnotic undulations with international burlesque sensations TOSCA RIVOLA, IDA FOCHT, KITTY OAKS, VIOLET D’VINE, IVIZIA DAKINI, TANA THE TATTOOED LADY, BRITTANY WALSH, and those fabled fiends and floozies FOU FOU HA! Plus ferocious Femcee MISS EMMMA! This joint WILL jump. Equal parts Weimar cabaret and wild speakeasy rave, Trapeze lures a bevy of underworld flappers, vipers, vamps and villains to a bass-fueled night of jazz age abandon. The jungle drums are getting louder…
print_description: Internationally acclaimed electroswing dance party and burlesque showcase takes the playa by storm. Details & add'l BRC dates: TrapezeSF.com

Meet in front of our Porch and then we will all ride together to the 2:00 point on the fence for a race around the perimeter of our fair city. Prizes and honor for the first three to place and guaranteed shenanigans.

title: Tribal Tantra Heart Opening & Devotional Puja
description:
There is power in making a choice to be present. To witness. To be witnessed. A choice to see and be seen as we are and in our highest self

When we gather with intention, we gather and increase in said powers. This will be such a gathering...

...and in such times and at such gatherings true magic, transformation, renewal and clarity through spaciousness are even more possible, even more accessible, for that tribal heart intention is an almost irresistible force for ourselves individually and collectively. 

This heart centered gathering is a simple but profound Puja (Devotional) ceremony of seeing and being seen first in silence, then with witnessing, listening and sharing, so that we may open to the possibility of falling in love with ourselves either directly or through the eyes of another. 

I invite you to be vulnerable. To see and be seen in this moment. To open to the beautiful reflections in each other. 

Come to this gathering because you are READY to step up into your full expression. Ready to be the Strong Man and a Powerful Woman who has the right to be met, and the right to love and be loved.
print_description: Tantra Heart Puja (Devotional) ceremony of seeing & being seen. Open to the possibility of falling in love with yourself through the eyes of another.

title: Tribal Tantra Medicine Dance
description: Intuitive Movement Practice which invites us to tap into our innate magic & embody our capacity to heal & be healed. Come dance your divine!
print_description: Intuitive Movement Practice which invites us to tap into our innate magic & embody our capacity to heal & be healed. Come dance your divine!

title: Tribal Tantra w/Eugene Hedlund @ RhythmWave
description:
We will warm up with Movement Meditation to arrive in our bodies and listen to the wisdom within. As we dance, we will awaken the elemental spirits within our physical bodies as we invite that sacred tremor which frees our hearts to love to move us so that we may release that which has held us back and shed any limiting beliefs so that we may invite new gifts and possibilities into the empty space within. 

By embodying this ritual, we attune our body to tend toward our highest good while making space to step with clarity into what is next. 

Then we will offer the healing practice of Medicine Dance to melt some of the walls to giving and receiving that love within.

From that place, we will dance in the cultivated energy of the tribe - a full wave to ground all the gifts, shake loose any layers ready to release and make even more space to be empowered to our birth right to love and be loved, starting with the Self.
print_description: Ground your gifts, shake loose the layers ready to release, and make space to love and be loved, starting with the Self.

title: U2 Batterd And Brused Tour Of Sadness MemorialBurn
description: The art piece of the band U2 will be moved to the burn foot print of the man for a memorial burning on Sunday September 6th at 12 noon.  Our team will have food and beverages for all,  please come and bring a friend to honor the loss of the bands tour manager Dennis Sheehan.  Drummer Larry Mullin JRs father passed away this year also.  Last year Bono had a bike wreck in NYC and sufferd many injurys and is unable to play the guitar on this years tour,  lead guitarist "The Edge" fell off the stage in Canada this year and was hurt also.  The burning of the art piece will lift the bad luck the band has had to endure and also honor the memories of those who have pass away.   We are going to produce a video of the event for the U2 nation to share in the event on youtube.  Thank you,  Viper.

title: UPROARIOUS FIRE ORCHESTRA
description: Unleash your flowing originality in the Uproarious Fire Orchestra! Let the unfathomable talent of our flame wielding performers overjoy and inspire as music and movement marry into one unparalleled sensory feast. Fire acrobats, artists, funambulists, twirlers and even performance novices alike please heed this call! For you can flourish your unabashed flame obsessions in the orchestra nightly. Unceasing fuel, undeniable fun and lessons with opulent flare will be provided.

title: Up Your Game with Sexy Skills!
description:
Imagine, you’ve just met someone you’re highly attracted to. You’re having a wonderful conversation and you feel the excitement building in your chest.  You’re at the point where you know you want to take it to the next level. It’s the moment of no return. This moment of tension is both one of the hottest moments of attraction and potentially one of the most awkward.  

How do you know if the other person is at the same desire level? How do you assess their openness to touch, to a kiss, or more? A kiss or initial touch is relatively low stakes, but what happens when things heat up? What happens when you’ve just overstepped a line and can feel their withdrawal?  

These nuanced moments of initial sexual attraction can be the hottest of our lives. But we’re never really taught how to navigate highly sexually charged moments with someone completely new.  What does it mean to fully take responsibility for these moments so that when we’re done everyone involved feels totally awesome?   

In this workshop you will get a much deeper understanding of the nuances of initiating and negotiating hot and sexy connections. 

-Boost your sexual self-confidence
-Know how to feel your “fuck yes!” and your “Oh no!” and everything in between.
-Understand when and how to bring up "the conversation" so you don’t deflate all the sexual turn-on!
-Gain clear sexy communication skills to keep it hot while still conveying important information.
-And learn the number 1 reason why these skills will make you the sexiest person on earth!
print_description: Navigating New Sexy Connections: From “Fuck Yes!” To “Oh No!” and all those "Maybes" In Between! Held in the Chakralicious Camp Temple Dome.

title: Vinyasa Flow
description: Take a deep breath in. Fill the space between the earth and the sky with the light of your energy. Let the rising and falling of the breath move you in and out of postures both high and low, fast and slow, light and dark. Come find your voice, your rhythm and your dance through vigorous movements, grounding stillness and heart opening chanting. Guided meditation and breath work weaved in and out of this movement we call vinyasa yoga will open doors to parts of your body and mind unknown and will create a little more space both physically and subtly. Come take the leap, the ever graceful rise and fall and ascension into the sky. Come sweat it out and get ready for all the night has to offer.
print_description: Fill the space between the earth and the sky with the light of your energy. Let the rising and falling of the breath move you in and out of postures.

title: Vinyasa Flow by Lisa
description: We will be going through a series of poses that will move you through the power of inhaling and exhaling. Vinyasa movements are smoothly flowing and almost dance-like, with synchronized breath and movements. Vinyasa has both mental and physical benefits. Physically, sweat expels toxins and re-energizes your body and can be an easy to challenging physical workout, mostly depending on you and where you take your practice. Mentally, the synchronized breathing relaxes your mind and helps to release any blockage of energy flow throughout your body.

title: Vow of Promise
description: Experience the creation and renewal of vows at the Temple of Promise!  The Temple Guardians would like you to come share your joy with us as we host a ceremony for those who wish to commit and promise themselves, either newly or renewing, at the Temple of Promise.  The ceremony will be just in time for sunset on Thursday September 3rd.  We’ll have a ceremony with live music, a welcome group message, individual and/or group vows, exchange of rings, an embrace (plenty of photo opportunities!), and a closing.  Don’t forget a meaningful gift that you can exchange with other participants who stood next to you during this ceremony.  Participate or come to celebrate with others, it’s open to all.

title: We Are Evolution with Samantha Beers
description: We Are Evolution:  How does evolution function as the sure intelligence of life?  How are you, as a human being, a key part of shaping the future?  Why are people (and our unique, yet not special, souls) particularly important to the patterns of biological and consciousness evolution in our Galaxy at this time?  Join High Priestess and Regenerative Design Expert, Samantha Sweetwater for this interactive playshop where you will learn how to surf the integral & biological mechanisms of evolution.  Find and amplify your unique place and point of leverage in the soul ecology of Life.  Uplevel your present sense of purpose.  And, together with all others present, discover how to co-cause the future we want.
print_description: We Are Evolution:  Surf the integral & biological mechanisms of evolution. Uplevel your present life.  Discover how to co-cause the future we WANT.

title: We are Not Your Freak Show
description: Have you ever noticed that BM is not really a safe space for everyone? Have you ever felt like you are being treated like a freak because of your gender identity? Are you over people asking why your body looks the way it does? Are you interested in creating real safe spaces for people whether they fit in the binary or not? Are you troubled by cultural appropriation on playa and the way some folks are treated as other or freaks in a way that doesn't feel good? Then this workshop is for you. This workshop is also for you if you want to delve into the intersections of race, gender, class and how these identities affect our experience at BM and beyond. Many of us come to playa to be free and our full liberated selves yet when we pass through the gate we have not dropped our baggage of racism, transphobia, sexism, abelism, and classism at the gate.  So let's be real and talk about how these isms affect our time on playa and off and what we want to do to create the world we want to live in. This workshop will be interactive, engaging, fun, and educational. Let's define what we want the word freakshow to me and let's reclaim ourselves and whole people who all deserve respect.
print_description: Are you curious how to create a safe and inclusive space for people of all backgrounds? Come, learn, explore, and share

title: Weather Reporter vs. The Author
description:
To put it very simply; when someone is being a Weather Reporter, it is as if they have no control over the circumstances that exist, it just is the way it is because of influences out of their control. Being an Author is looking at things as the creator and being responsible for outcomes. 

This is especially valuable in a group like this where people are counted on to produce serious results, as the conversation is about clearing away self-limiting thoughts and replacing them with positive and proactive ones. However, this isn’t a one-time cheerleading session, but rather an introduction to a simple yet revolutionary way of thinking about things that people can take with them. Each person will begin to redefine a new and powerful context from which 
to run their professional and personal life.
print_description: Learn to be the master of your circumstances.

title: What are those 5Rhythms anyway? w/Marcia
description: Just like light, sound, or ocean waves, a dancing body moving freely passes through five distinct rhythmic patterns. These patterns continuously repeat themselves in a wave of motion. The 5Rhythms are: FLOWING – the fluid, continuous, grounded glide of our own movements; STACCATO – the percussive, pulsing beat that shapes us a thousand different ways; CHAOS – the rhythm of letting go, releasing into the catalytic wildness of our dance that can never be planned or repeated; LYRICAL – the rhythm of trance, where the weight of self-consciousness dissolves, where we lighten up and disappear into our own uniqueness; and STILLNESS – the quiet emptiness, where gentle movements rise and fall, start and end, in a field of silence. Please join Marcia Dancing Heart for an introduction to the 5Rhythms at RhythmWave.
print_description: A dancing body moving freely passes through five distinct rhythmic patterns. Please join Marcia Dancing Heart for an introduction to the 5Rhythms.

title: Why Festivals are Important for Humanity
description: Festivals have been with us since man and woman started to gather, but there's been a big uptick in global festival attendance in the 21st century. The more digital we get, the more ritual we need. Chip Conley will explore why festivals are making such a comeback and how festivals are a foundational part of humanizing society and creating more cultural curiosity.

title: Wine Tasting @ ShangriLaLa
description: Art Cars were so 2014, this year ShangriLa is bringing ART BARS to the Playa. The new ShangriLaLa Weinkeller will bring a little bit of the Orient and a whole lot of whimsy to the Playa with its painstaking design details and solid recycled wood construction. Camp members are asked to dress in formal attire. Throw in a little flogging with a cat-o-nine tails and it will be a night to remember. Please dress in your formal wear for this evening. Bring a bottle of your favorite wine and wine glass as well. In Vino Veritas - in Wine lies the truth. There are four (4) recognized stages to wine tastings: Appearance, The Aroma of the Wine, Sensations of the Mouth and The Finish (aftertaste). Please make sure you have your ID ready - you have to be twenty-one (21) years old to drink @ ShangriLaLa. We will check your ID - Namaste.

title: Working with Spirit Guides
description:
We are all connected to the same Source of all life, but as individuals, the experience of contact with inner guidance and spiritual beings will be different for everyone. Whether we consider these forms of intelligence to be higher aspects of our own selves or independent entities, the challenge is the same: how do we access and validate this wisdom? Our spiritual guides communicate with us through intuition, and we only need to refine our ability to receive. Craig will teach his unique methods, which include powerful ways of opening up one’s awareness to the realm of divine guidance. You will learn to trust the, information you receive, to control and direct your psychic energy and to explore new ways of creative problem solving.

For more info, see:

description:
We are exploring an exhibition / fun event in the temple on Thursday for a wrestling event Indian Style (East Indian called Kushti). But any kind of wrestling in an inflated rubber tub filled with mud. Wrestlers are welcome to wear a traditional wrap, speedo, shorts or ...nothing.

This is for fun and not to be taken too seriously. An official and first aide person will be present. Participants can be any gender and an audience will surround the tub and are encouraged to bring playa gifts for the winners. Reward your warriors.

WANT TO PARTICIPATE? Stay engaged here on this event. If you want to camp with Sun Guardians follow the links in the about section. We are exploring the idea and encouraging people to come join in on the fun as a participant!

Audience or Wrestler... come have fun and tell us what you think.

title: Zendo Project
description:
The Zendo is a community outreach project at Burning Man that offers education and psychological support, with the goal to help reduce the potential harms involved in drug use. Volunteers provide peer-to-peer harm reduction support for individuals having a difficult drug-related experience and who don't require medical care. Guests are sometimes actively on substance, and other times are seeking integration support, or education about the risks involved in drug use. We staff the space 24/7 with trained mental health and medical professionals who provide oversight, as well as individuals experienced in crisis response.

If you'd like to come to the training to learn more about volunteering, it will take place at Something Freaky This Way Foams, near 2:00&G, on Tuesday September 1 at 11AM. 

The four principles of psychedelic harm reduction include: 

1. Create a safe space - If someone is having a challenging experience try to move them into a comfortable, warm, and calm environment. If possible, try to avoid noisy or crowded spaces. Ask what would make them most comfortable. Offer blankets and water. 

2. Sitting, not guiding - Be a calm presence of acceptance, compassion, and caring. Promote feelings of trust and security. Let the person's unfolding experience be the guide. Don't try to get ahead of their process. Explore distressing issues if they want, but know that simply being with the person is supportive and talking may not be helpful.

3. Talk through, not down - Invite the person to explore what's happening and encourage them to try not to resist it. Remind them that they are safe. 

4. Difficult is not the same as bad - challenging experiences can wind up being our most valuable and lead to learning and growth. Help the person integrate the experience, and remind them the experience will continue to unfold.
print_description: Feeling out of sorts? Visit Zendo where you'll find a calm space and volunteers who are available 24/7 to help with difficult psychedelic experiences.

title: Harness the Source Qigong
description: Harness the Source Qigong:  Access the infinite field of create potential that pervades the entire Universe, underlies all creation and resides within you. Activate your innate healing abilities, ground into the present moment, and feel your connection to all of life.Nourish the flow of source energy inside of you.Integrate your mind, body and spirit into wholeness.Cultivate your natural state of health, vitality, awareness and compassion, with this gentle practice of movement, sound and visualization.The ancient art of Qigong, pronounced 'Chee Gong', which translates as the 'Cultivation of Life Energy', combines elements familiar to Yoga, Meditation, Reiki, Martial Arts and Quantum Physics to provide feelings of presence, peace, relaxation, connectedness and well-being.Give your human mechanism/energy body and 'oil change', and charge yourself up for your next Playa adventure.
print_description: Access the infinite field of potential underlying all creation and residing within you. Give your human mechanism/energy body an upgrade.

title: Healing the Broken Altar of the Heart
description: "Healing the Broken Altar of the Heart:  Guided Meditation and Ceremony"  In this journey, Colby will guide us into our inner sanctuary within and deep into the recesses of our heart space where the altar of wholeness resides.  Here we will be given the opportunity to accept our injustices, reclaim our disowned aspects, and renew our awareness and devotion to wholeness and love.  As the Light of Truth and Divine Love radiates from our hearts we will share in group and anchor in our bodies with physical relating exercises and dance.
print_description: Guided meditation to the altar of the heart to reclaim what has been disowned and to celebrate wholeness.

title: Naked Heart Care Yoga
description: This Yoga Class has its focus in the Heart Chakra. We will Be in OUR heart, through asana, mantra, breathing and total presence. We will come back, to this space, again and again- to remember and re-discover: What is your deepest longing? Where is it andhow does it feel in your body and soul? Back Home, to the chamber of the HEART, lets meet there. Bring a Mat (if you have), soft clothing, yourself, as the beautiful and whole being you are.

title: Radical Reboot
description:
Join us for a 90-minute journey that will radically reboot your system.

Through gentle restorative asanas, breathwork, guided meditation and specialized Reiki techniques, this Yogic approach toward healing will calm the mind, open the body and invite you into a deep state of relaxation that will release blocked, stuck or stagnant energy and dissolve physical tension or stress.
print_description: An invitation to explore the dynamic relationship between the mind and the body.

title: Reclaim Your Feminine Sexuality
description: This workshop guides women through a series of movements and offerings to reclaim sensuality and sexuality for themselves in a safe space, while rediscovering their personal experience of pleasure. Women's psyches are bombarded with notions of what sexy is, disconnecting us from the experience of what it feels like in our own bodies. No more shall we allow for our bodies to be used as marketing schemes to fulfill viewer‚Äôs fantasies. Now is the time to reclaim the power of our sexuality, to reconnect with our feminine sensuality and to offer ourselves the gift of deep pleasure and embodiment.
print_description: Reconnect with the power of your sensuality and sexual embodiment through a series of guided movements and offerings. Women only.

title: Root the Body, Release Ego, Ignite Power
description: Gift yourself the opportunity to flow through Burning Man from a place of groundedness, liberation and power. By tapping into the vulnerabilities experienced within our bodies, we can discover where pain and triggers are stored by the ego, allowing for us the ability to see them for what they are, liberate ourselves from them, and fully fill them with the light and power already existing within us. Release your greatest self out onto the playa through guided touch, divine creation and ecstatic movement.
print_description: Ground your body and liberate what separates you from its light and power through connection to touch, divine creation and ecstatic movement.

title: Sensual Butterfly Transformation Yoga
description: The Butterfly is a high-vibrant, spiritual creation. It is sensitive to its surrounding and is vibrating in the same wavelength as the particles of niverse, as well as the life on earth. It lives in symbiosis with nature, mostly in flowers, becoming one with the Beauty All Around. The Butterfly symbolizes the Universal Spiritual knowledge and deep Wisdom, and creates its life in the perfect alignment of non-attachment, in a dance of flow and Ease. It has a life filled of transformation, from the day of birth until re-birth, between stages, outer and inner form, with ease and grace moving further, without attaching to its old shape, heart wide open for the life in front of Her. This Yogic Journey is dedicated for you to connect with YOUR inner Butterfly, through a travel of transformation, through your body and senses. Bring a Mat (if you have), soft clothing, yourself, as the beautiful and whole being you are.
print_description: Yogic Journey for you to connect with YOUR inner Butterfly, through a journey of transformation through your body and senses

title: “Soil and Water” Yoga
description: The focus of this class is in the First and the Second Chakra. Digging the feet into the ground, dipping the toes deep into the soil, feeling the earth. By Rooting down and stabilizing our ground we will slowly get ready for the rising up to our second chakra, following the watery juiciness of sexual energy in our hips. Stepping into our sensual Animal  with softness and care. Bring a Mat (if you have), soft clothing, yourself, as the beautiful and whole being you are

title: Tantric AUM
description: The AUM (Awareness Understanding Meditation) Workshop is based on the understanding that in order to find its silence, the western mind first needs to express its tension and stress.The aim of the AUM Meditation is to consciously transform stress and negative emotions into positive creative energy, and to create personal well being and peace through a social process of Awareness, Understanding and Meditation.It is divided in twelve stages that allows you to experience all shades of your emotional life ‚Äì anger, love, sadness, laughter ‚Äì and to express these emotions in a protected and safe environment.Once emotional awareness and intelligence are mastered, it becomes easier to express emotions in a healthy way, resulting in more effective communication skills and a greater sense of personal empowerment. The fear of expressing all our feelings diminishes, freeing us to make a genuine choices about how we act. Unspoken positive and negative feelings can create blocks in our relationships with friends, colleagues and loved ones.Through experiencing the AUM, relating becomes clearer, more honest and more fun. the AUM also allows you to reclaim to joy of simply being alive.Bring a pillow or cushion
print_description: A high energy social meditation that allows you to express the full rainbow of emotions AND taste the deep awareness that holds it all of it

description: The AUM (Awareness Understanding Meditation) Workshop is based on the understanding that in order to find its silence, the western mind first needs to express its tension and stress.The aim of the AUM Meditation is to consciously transform stress and negative emotions into positive creative energy, and to create personal well being and peace through a social process of Awareness, Understanding and Meditation.It is divided in twelve stages that allows you to experience all shades of your emotional life ‚Äì anger, love, sadness, laughter ‚Äì and to express these emotions in a protected and safe environment.Once emotional awareness and intelligence are mastered, it becomes easier to express emotions in a healthy way, resulting in more effective communication skills and a greater sense of personal empowerment. The fear of expressing all our feelings diminishes, freeing us to make a genuine choices about how we act. Unspoken positive and negative feelings can create blocks in our relationships with friends, colleagues and loved ones.Through experiencing the AUM, relating becomes clearer, more honest and more fun. the AUM also allows you to reclaim to joy of simply being alive.Bring a pillow or cushion
print_description: A high energy social meditation that allows you to express the full rainbow of emotions AND taste the deep awareness that holds it all of it
